                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do attend here on the general;</div>
                     <div class="line">And think it no addition, nor my wish,</div>
                     <div class="line">To have him see me woman'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, I pray you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not that I love you not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">But that you do not love me.</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, bring me on the way a little,</div>
                     <div class="line">And say if I shall see you soon at night.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis but a little way that I can bring you;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I attend here: but I'll see you soon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis very good; I must be circumstanced.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. Before the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  Another room In the castle.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. Before the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter OTHELLO and IAGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you think so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Think so, Iago!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What,</div>
                     <div class="line">To kiss in private?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">An unauthorized kiss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Or to be naked with her friend in bed</div>
                     <div class="line">An hour or more, not meaning any harm?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Naked in bed, Iago, and not mean harm!</div>
                     <div class="line">It is hypocrisy against the devil:</div>
                     <div class="line">They that mean virtuously, and yet do so,</div>
                     <div class="line">The devil their virtue tempts, and they tempt heaven.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">So they do nothing, 'tis a venial slip:</div>
                     <div class="line">But if I give my wife a handkerchief,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then, 'tis hers, my lord; and, being hers,</div>
                     <div class="line">She may, I think, bestow't on any man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">She is protectress of her honour too:</div>
                     <div class="line">May she give that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Her honour is an essence that's not seen;</div>
                     <div class="line">They have it very oft that have it not:</div>
                     <div class="line">But, for the handkerchief,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, I would most gladly have forgot it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou said'st, it comes o'er my memory,</div>
                     <div class="line">As doth the raven o'er the infected house,</div>
                     <div class="line">Boding to all--he had my handkerchief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, what of that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's not so good now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What,</div>
                     <div class="line">If I had said I had seen him do you wrong?</div>
                     <div class="line">Or heard him say,--as knaves be such abroad,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who having, by their own importunate suit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or voluntary dotage of some mistress,</div>
                     <div class="line">Convinced or supplied them, cannot choose</div>
                     <div class="line">But they must blab--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath he said any thing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath, my lord; but be you well assured,</div>
                     <div class="line">No more than he'll unswear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What hath he said?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, that he did--I know not what he did.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What? what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lie--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">With her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">With her, on her; what you will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lie with her! lie on her! We say lie on her, when</div>
                     <div class="line">they belie her. Lie with her! that's fulsome.</div>
                     <div class="line">--Handkerchief--confessions--handkerchief!--To</div>
                     <div class="line">confess, and be hanged for his labour;--first, to be</div>
                     <div class="line">hanged, and then to confess.--I tremble at it.</div>
                     <div class="line">Nature would not invest herself in such shadowing</div>
                     <div class="line">passion without some instruction. It is not words</div>
                     <div class="line">that shake me thus. Pish! Noses, ears, and lips.</div>
                     <div class="line">--Is't possible?--Confess--handkerchief!--O devil!--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Falls in a trance</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Work on,</div>
                     <div class="line">My medicine, work! Thus credulous fools are caught;</div>
                     <div class="line">And many worthy and chaste dames even thus,</div>
                     <div class="line">All guiltless, meet reproach. What, ho! my lord!</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, I say! Othello!</div>
                     <p>Enter CASSIO</p>
                     <div class="line">How now, Cassio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord is fall'n into an epilepsy:</div>
                     <div class="line">This is his second fit; he had one yesterday.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Rub him about the temples.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, forbear;</div>
                     <div class="line">The lethargy must have his quiet course:</div>
                     <div class="line">If not, he foams at mouth and by and by</div>
                     <div class="line">Breaks out to savage madness. Look he stirs:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you withdraw yourself a little while,</div>
                     <div class="line">He will recover straight: when he is gone,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would on great occasion speak with you.</div>
                     <p>Exit CASSIO</p>
                     <div class="line">How is it, general? have you not hurt your head?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou mock me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I mock you! no, by heaven.</div>
                     <div class="line">Would you would bear your fortune like a man!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">A horned man's a monster and a beast.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">There's many a beast then in a populous city,</div>
                     <div class="line">And many a civil monster.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Did he confess it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good sir, be a man;</div>
                     <div class="line">Think every bearded fellow that's but yoked</div>
                     <div class="line">May draw with you: there's millions now alive</div>
                     <div class="line">That nightly lie in those unproper beds</div>
                     <div class="line">Which they dare swear peculiar: your case is better.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'tis the spite of hell, the fiend's arch-mock,</div>
                     <div class="line">To lip a wanton in a secure couch,</div>
                     <div class="line">And to suppose her chaste! No, let me know;</div>
                     <div class="line">And knowing what I am, I know what she shall be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, thou art wise; 'tis certain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stand you awhile apart;</div>
                     <div class="line">Confine yourself but in a patient list.</div>
                     <div class="line">Whilst you were here o'erwhelmed with your grief--</div>
                     <div class="line">A passion most unsuiting such a man--</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio came hither: I shifted him away,</div>
                     <div class="line">And laid good 'scuse upon your ecstasy,</div>
                     <div class="line">Bade him anon return and here speak with me;</div>
                     <div class="line">The which he promised. Do but encave yourself,</div>
                     <div class="line">And mark the fleers, the gibes, and notable scorns,</div>
                     <div class="line">That dwell in every region of his face;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I will make him tell the tale anew,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where, how, how oft, how long ago, and when</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath, and is again to cope your wife:</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, but mark his gesture. Marry, patience;</div>
                     <div class="line">Or I shall say you are all in all in spleen,</div>
                     <div class="line">And nothing of a man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou hear, Iago?</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be found most cunning in my patience;</div>
                     <div class="line">But--dost thou hear?--most bloody.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's not amiss;</div>
                     <div class="line">But yet keep time in all. Will you withdraw?</div>
                     <p>OTHELLO retires</p>
                     <div class="line">Now will I question Cassio of Bianca,</div>
                     <div class="line">A housewife that by selling her desires</div>
                     <div class="line">Buys herself bread and clothes: it is a creature</div>
                     <div class="line">That dotes on Cassio; as 'tis the strumpet's plague</div>
                     <div class="line">To beguile many and be beguiled by one:</div>
                     <div class="line">He, when he hears of her, cannot refrain</div>
                     <div class="line">From the excess of laughter. Here he comes:</div>
                     <p>Re-enter CASSIO</p>
                     <div class="line">As he shall smile, Othello shall go mad;</div>
                     <div class="line">And his unbookish jealousy must construe</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor Cassio's smiles, gestures and light behavior,</div>
                     <div class="line">Quite in the wrong. How do you now, lieutenant?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The worser that you give me the addition</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose want even kills me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ply Desdemona well, and you are sure on't.</div>
                     <p>Speaking lower</p>
                     <div class="line">Now, if this suit lay in Bianco's power,</div>
                     <div class="line">How quickly should you speed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, poor caitiff!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look, how he laughs already!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I never knew woman love man so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, poor rogue! I think, i' faith, she loves me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now he denies it faintly, and laughs it out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you hear, Cassio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now he importunes him</div>
                     <div class="line">To tell it o'er: go to; well said, well said.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">She gives it out that you shall marry hey:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you intend it?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you triumph, Roman? do you triumph?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I marry her! what? a customer! Prithee, bear some</div>
                     <div class="line">charity to my wit: do not think it so unwholesome.</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">So, so, so, so: they laugh that win.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, the cry goes that you shall marry her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, say true.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a very villain else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Have you scored me? Well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the monkey's own giving out: she is</div>
                     <div class="line">persuaded I will marry her, out of her own love and</div>
                     <div class="line">flattery, not out of my promise.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Iago beckons me; now he begins the story.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">She was here even now; she haunts me in every place.</div>
                     <div class="line">I was the other day talking on the sea-bank with</div>
                     <div class="line">certain Venetians; and thither comes the bauble,</div>
                     <div class="line">and, by this hand, she falls me thus about my neck--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Crying 'O dear Cassio!' as it were: his gesture</div>
                     <div class="line">imports it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">So hangs, and lolls, and weeps upon me; so hales,</div>
                     <div class="line">and pulls me: ha, ha, ha!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now he tells how she plucked him to my chamber. O,</div>
                     <div class="line">I see that nose of yours, but not that dog I shall</div>
                     <div class="line">throw it to.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I must leave her company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Before me! look, where she comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis such another fitchew! marry a perfumed one.</div>
                     <p>Enter BIANCA</p>
                     <div class="line">What do you mean by this haunting of me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Let the devil and his dam haunt you! What did you</div>
                     <div class="line">mean by that same handkerchief you gave me even now?</div>
                     <div class="line">I was a fine fool to take it. I must take out the</div>
                     <div class="line">work?--A likely piece of work, that you should find</div>
                     <div class="line">it in your chamber, and not know who left it there!</div>
                     <div class="line">This is some minx's token, and I must take out the</div>
                     <div class="line">work? There; give it your hobby-horse: wheresoever</div>
                     <div class="line">you had it, I'll take out no work on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, my sweet Bianca! how now! how now!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, that should be my handkerchief!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">An you'll come to supper to-night, you may; an you</div>
                     <div class="line">will not, come when you are next prepared for.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">After her, after her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, I must; she'll rail in the street else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you sup there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, I intend so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I may chance to see you; for I would very fain</div>
                     <div class="line">speak with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, come; will you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go to; say no more.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit CASSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Advancing</span>  How shall I murder him, Iago?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Did you perceive how he laughed at his vice?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O Iago!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">And did you see the handkerchief?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Was that mine?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yours by this hand: and to see how he prizes the</div>
                     <div class="line">foolish woman your wife! she gave it him, and he</div>
                     <div class="line">hath given it his whore.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I would have him nine years a-killing.</div>
                     <div class="line">A fine woman! a fair woman! a sweet woman!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, you must forget that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, let her rot, and perish, and be damned to-night;</div>
                     <div class="line">for she shall not live: no, my heart is turned to</div>
                     <div class="line">stone; I strike it, and it hurts my hand. O, the</div>
                     <div class="line">world hath not a sweeter creature: she might lie by</div>
                     <div class="line">an emperor's side and command him tasks.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that's not your way.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hang her! I do but say what she is: so delicate</div>
                     <div class="line">with her needle: an admirable musician: O! she</div>
                     <div class="line">will sing the savageness out of a bear: of so high</div>
                     <div class="line">and plenteous wit and invention:--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">She's the worse for all this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, a thousand thousand times: and then, of so</div>
                     <div class="line">gentle a condition!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, too gentle.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that's certain: but yet the pity of it, Iago!</div>
                     <div class="line">O Iago, the pity of it, Iago!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">If you are so fond over her iniquity, give her</div>
                     <div class="line">patent to offend; for, if it touch not you, it comes</div>
                     <div class="line">near nobody.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will chop her into messes: cuckold me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, 'tis foul in her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">With mine officer!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's fouler.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Get me some poison, Iago; this night: I'll not</div>
                     <div class="line">expostulate with her, lest her body and beauty</div>
                     <div class="line">unprovide my mind again: this night, Iago.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do it not with poison, strangle her in her bed, even</div>
                     <div class="line">the bed she hath contaminated.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good, good: the justice of it pleases: very good.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">And for Cassio, let me be his undertaker: you</div>
                     <div class="line">shall hear more by midnight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Excellent good.</div>
                     <p>A trumpet within</p>
                     <div class="line">What trumpet is that same?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Something from Venice, sure. 'Tis Lodovico</div>
                     <div class="line">Come from the duke: and, see, your wife is with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, and Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Save you, worthy general!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">With all my heart, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">The duke and senators of Venice greet you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Gives him a letter</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I kiss the instrument of their pleasures.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Opens the letter, and reads</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">And what's the news, good cousin Lodovico?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am very glad to see you, signior</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome to Cyprus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you. How does Lieutenant Cassio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lives, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Cousin, there's fall'n between him and my lord</div>
                     <div class="line">An unkind breach: but you shall make all well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you sure of that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Reads</span>  'This fail you not to do, as you will--'</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">He did not call; he's busy in the paper.</div>
                     <div class="line">Is there division 'twixt my lord and Cassio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">A most unhappy one: I would do much</div>
                     <div class="line">To atone them, for the love I bear to Cassio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fire and brimstone!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you wise?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is he angry?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">May be the letter moved him;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, as I think, they do command him home,</div>
                     <div class="line">Deputing Cassio in his government.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Trust me, I am glad on't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Indeed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am glad to see you mad.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, sweet Othello,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Striking her</span>  Devil!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have not deserved this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, this would not be believed in Venice,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though I should swear I saw't: 'tis very much:</div>
                     <div class="line">Make her amends; she weeps.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O devil, devil!</div>
                     <div class="line">If that the earth could teem with woman's tears,</div>
                     <div class="line">Each drop she falls would prove a crocodile.</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of my sight!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not stay to offend you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Going</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Truly, an obedient lady:</div>
                     <div class="line">I do beseech your lordship, call her back.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What would you with her, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who, I, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay; you did wish that I would make her turn:</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, she can turn, and turn, and yet go on,</div>
                     <div class="line">And turn again; and she can weep, sir, weep;</div>
                     <div class="line">And she's obedient, as you say, obedient,</div>
                     <div class="line">Very obedient. Proceed you in your tears.</div>
                     <div class="line">Concerning this, sir,--O  well-painted passion!--</div>
                     <div class="line">I am commanded home. Get you away;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll send for you anon. Sir, I obey the mandate,</div>
                     <div class="line">And will return to Venice. Hence, avaunt!</div>
                     <p>Exit DESDEMONA</p>
                     <div class="line">Cassio shall have my place. And, sir, tonight,</div>
                     <div class="line">I do entreat that we may sup together:</div>
                     <div class="line">You are welcome, sir, to Cyprus.--Goats and monkeys!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is this the noble Moor whom our full senate</div>
                     <div class="line">Call all in all sufficient? Is this the nature</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom passion could not shake? whose solid virtue</div>
                     <div class="line">The shot of accident, nor dart of chance,</div>
                     <div class="line">Could neither graze nor pierce?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">He is much changed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are his wits safe? is he not light of brain?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">He's that he is: I may not breathe my censure</div>
                     <div class="line">What he might be: if what he might he is not,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would to heaven he were!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, strike his wife!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, that was not so well; yet would I knew</div>
                     <div class="line">That stroke would prove the worst!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it his use?</div>
                     <div class="line">Or did the letters work upon his blood,</div>
                     <div class="line">And new-create this fault?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, alas!</div>
                     <div class="line">It is not honesty in me to speak</div>
                     <div class="line">What I have seen and known. You shall observe him,</div>
                     <div class="line">And his own courses will denote him so</div>
                     <div class="line">That I may save my speech: do but go after,</div>
                     <div class="line">And mark how he continues.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am sorry that I am deceived in him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter OTHELLO and EMILIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">You have seen nothing then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor ever heard, nor ever did suspect.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, you have seen Cassio and she together.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">But then I saw no harm, and then I heard</div>
                     <div class="line">Each syllable that breath made up between them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, did they never whisper?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Never, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor send you out o' the way?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Never.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">To fetch her fan, her gloves, her mask, nor nothing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Never, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's strange.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I durst, my lord, to wager she is honest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lay down my soul at stake: if you think other,</div>
                     <div class="line">Remove your thought; it doth abuse your bosom.</div>
                     <div class="line">If any wretch have put this in your head,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let heaven requite it with the serpent's curse!</div>
                     <div class="line">For, if she be not honest, chaste, and true,</div>
                     <div class="line">There's no man happy; the purest of their wives</div>
                     <div class="line">Is foul as slander.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Bid her come hither: go.</div>
                     <p>Exit EMILIA</p>
                     <div class="line">She says enough; yet she's a simple bawd</div>
                     <div class="line">That cannot say as much. This is a subtle whore,</div>
                     <div class="line">A closet lock and key of villanous secrets</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet she'll kneel and pray; I have seen her do't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter DESDEMONA with EMILIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord, what is your will?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray, chuck, come hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your pleasure?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me see your eyes;</div>
                     <div class="line">Look in my face.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">What horrible fancy's this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To EMILIA</span>  Some of your function, mistress;</div>
                     <div class="line">Leave procreants alone and shut the door;</div>
                     <div class="line">Cough, or cry 'hem,' if any body come:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your mystery, your mystery: nay, dispatch.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit EMILIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon my knees, what doth your speech import?</div>
                     <div class="line">I understand a fury in your words.</div>
                     <div class="line">But not the words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, what art thou?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Your wife, my lord; your true</div>
                     <div class="line">And loyal wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, swear it, damn thyself</div>
                     <div class="line">Lest, being like one of heaven, the devils themselves</div>
                     <div class="line">Should fear to seize thee: therefore be double damn'd:</div>
                     <div class="line">Swear thou art honest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven doth truly know it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven truly knows that thou art false as hell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom, my lord? with whom? how am I false?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O Desdemona! away! away! away!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas the heavy day! Why do you weep?</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I the motive of these tears, my lord?</div>
                     <div class="line">If haply you my father do suspect</div>
                     <div class="line">An instrument of this your calling back,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lay not your blame on me: If you have lost him,</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, I have lost him too.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Had it pleased heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">To try me with affliction; had they rain'd</div>
                     <div class="line">All kinds of sores and shames on my bare head.</div>
                     <div class="line">Steep'd me in poverty to the very lips,</div>
                     <div class="line">Given to captivity me and my utmost hopes,</div>
                     <div class="line">I should have found in some place of my soul</div>
                     <div class="line">A drop of patience: but, alas, to make me</div>
                     <div class="line">A fixed figure for the time of scorn</div>
                     <div class="line">To point his slow unmoving finger at!</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet could I bear that too; well, very well:</div>
                     <div class="line">But there, where I have garner'd up my heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where either I must live, or bear no life;</div>
                     <div class="line">The fountain from the which my current runs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else dries up; to be discarded thence!</div>
                     <div class="line">Or keep it as a cistern for foul toads</div>
                     <div class="line">To knot and gender in! Turn thy complexion there,</div>
                     <div class="line">Patience, thou young and rose-lipp'd cherubin,--</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, there, look grim as hell!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope my noble lord esteems me honest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, ay; as summer flies are in the shambles,</div>
                     <div class="line">That quicken even with blowing. O thou weed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who art so lovely fair and smell'st so sweet</div>
                     <div class="line">That the sense aches at thee, would thou hadst</div>
                     <div class="line">ne'er been born!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, what ignorant sin have I committed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Was this fair paper, this most goodly book,</div>
                     <div class="line">Made to write 'whore' upon? What committed!</div>
                     <div class="line">Committed! O thou public commoner!</div>
                     <div class="line">I should make very forges of my cheeks,</div>
                     <div class="line">That would to cinders burn up modesty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Did I but speak thy deeds. What committed!</div>
                     <div class="line">Heaven stops the nose at it and the moon winks,</div>
                     <div class="line">The bawdy wind that kisses all it meets</div>
                     <div class="line">Is hush'd within the hollow mine of earth,</div>
                     <div class="line">And will not hear it. What committed!</div>
                     <div class="line">Impudent strumpet!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, you do me wrong.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you not a strumpet?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, as I am a Christian:</div>
                     <div class="line">If to preserve this vessel for my lord</div>
                     <div class="line">From any other foul unlawful touch</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not to be a strumpet, I am none.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, not a whore?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, as I shall be saved.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't possible?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, heaven forgive us!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I cry you mercy, then:</div>
                     <div class="line">I took you for that cunning whore of Venice</div>
                     <div class="line">That married with Othello.</div>
                     <p>Raising his voice</p>
                     <div class="line">You, mistress,</div>
                     <div class="line">That have the office opposite to Saint Peter,</div>
                     <div class="line">And keep the gate of hell!</div>
                     <p>Re-enter EMILIA</p>
                     <div class="line">You, you, ay, you!</div>
                     <div class="line">We have done our course; there's money for your pains:</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, turn the key and keep our counsel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, what does this gentleman conceive?</div>
                     <div class="line">How do you, madam? how do you, my good lady?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, half asleep.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good madam, what's the matter with my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">With who?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, with my lord, madam.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is thy lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">He that is yours, sweet lady.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have none: do not talk to me, Emilia;</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot weep; nor answer have I none,</div>
                     <div class="line">But what should go by water. Prithee, tonight</div>
                     <div class="line">Lay on my bed my wedding sheets: remember;</div>
                     <div class="line">And call thy husband hither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's a change indeed!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis meet I should be used so, very meet.</div>
                     <div class="line">How have I been behaved, that he might stick</div>
                     <div class="line">The small'st opinion on my least misuse?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter EMILIA with IAGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your pleasure, madam?</div>
                     <div class="line">How is't with you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot tell. Those that do teach young babes</div>
                     <div class="line">Do it with gentle means and easy tasks:</div>
                     <div class="line">He might have chid me so; for, in good faith,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a child to chiding.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter, lady?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, Iago, my lord hath so bewhored her.</div>
                     <div class="line">Thrown such despite and heavy terms upon her,</div>
                     <div class="line">As true hearts cannot bear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I that name, Iago?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What name, fair lady?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Such as she says my lord did say I was.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">He call'd her whore: a beggar in his drink</div>
                     <div class="line">Could not have laid such terms upon his callat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why did he so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I do not know; I am sure I am none such.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do not weep, do not weep. Alas the day!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath she forsook so many noble matches,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her father and her country and her friends,</div>
