                     <div class="line">To be call'd whore? would it not make one weep?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is my wretched fortune.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Beshrew him for't!</div>
                     <div class="line">How comes this trick upon him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, heaven doth know.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will be hang'd, if some eternal villain,</div>
                     <div class="line">Some busy and insinuating rogue,</div>
                     <div class="line">Some cogging, cozening slave, to get some office,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have not devised this slander; I'll be hang'd else.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie, there is no such man; it is impossible.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">If any such there be, heaven pardon him!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A halter pardon him! and hell gnaw his bones!</div>
                     <div class="line">Why should he call her whore? who keeps her company?</div>
                     <div class="line">What place? what time? what form? what likelihood?</div>
                     <div class="line">The Moor's abused by some most villanous knave,</div>
                     <div class="line">Some base notorious knave, some scurvy fellow.</div>
                     <div class="line">O heaven, that such companions thou'ldst unfold,</div>
                     <div class="line">And put in every honest hand a whip</div>
                     <div class="line">To lash the rascals naked through the world</div>
                     <div class="line">Even from the east to the west!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak within door.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, fie upon them! Some such squire he was</div>
                     <div class="line">That turn'd your wit the seamy side without,</div>
                     <div class="line">And made you to suspect me with the Moor.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">You are a fool; go to.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">O good Iago,</div>
                     <div class="line">What shall I do to win my lord again?</div>
                     <div class="line">Good friend, go to him; for, by this light of heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">I know not how I lost him. Here I kneel:</div>
                     <div class="line">If e'er my will did trespass 'gainst his love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Either in discourse of thought or actual deed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or that mine eyes, mine ears, or any sense,</div>
                     <div class="line">Delighted them in any other form;</div>
                     <div class="line">Or that I do not yet, and ever did.</div>
                     <div class="line">And ever will--though he do shake me off</div>
                     <div class="line">To beggarly divorcement--love him dearly,</div>
                     <div class="line">Comfort forswear me! Unkindness may do much;</div>
                     <div class="line">And his unkindness may defeat my life,</div>
                     <div class="line">But never taint my love. I cannot say 'whore:'</div>
                     <div class="line">It does abhor me now I speak the word;</div>
                     <div class="line">To do the act that might the addition earn</div>
                     <div class="line">Not the world's mass of vanity could make me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, be content; 'tis but his humour:</div>
                     <div class="line">The business of the state does him offence,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he does chide with you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">If 'twere no other--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis but so, I warrant.</div>
                     <p>Trumpets within</p>
                     <div class="line">Hark, how these instruments summon to supper!</div>
                     <div class="line">The messengers of Venice stay the meat;</div>
                     <div class="line">Go in, and weep not; all things shall be well.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt DESDEMONA and EMILIA</p>
                     <p>Enter RODERIGO</p>
                     <div class="line">How now, Roderigo!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do not find that thou dealest justly with me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What in the contrary?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Every day thou daffest me with some device, Iago;</div>
                     <div class="line">and rather, as it seems to me now, keepest from me</div>
                     <div class="line">all conveniency than suppliest me with the least</div>
                     <div class="line">advantage of hope. I will indeed no longer endure</div>
                     <div class="line">it, nor am I yet persuaded to put up in peace what</div>
                     <div class="line">already I have foolishly suffered.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you hear me, Roderigo?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Faith, I have heard too much, for your words and</div>
                     <div class="line">performances are no kin together.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">You charge me most unjustly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">With nought but truth. I have wasted myself out of</div>
                     <div class="line">my means. The jewels you have had from me to</div>
                     <div class="line">deliver to Desdemona would half have corrupted a</div>
                     <div class="line">votarist: you have told me she hath received them</div>
                     <div class="line">and returned me expectations and comforts of sudden</div>
                     <div class="line">respect and acquaintance, but I find none.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well; go to; very well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well! go to! I cannot go to, man; nor 'tis</div>
                     <div class="line">not very well: nay, I think it is scurvy, and begin</div>
                     <div class="line">to find myself fobbed in it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I tell you 'tis not very well. I will make myself</div>
                     <div class="line">known to Desdemona: if she will return me my</div>
                     <div class="line">jewels, I will give over my suit and repent my</div>
                     <div class="line">unlawful solicitation; if not, assure yourself I</div>
                     <div class="line">will seek satisfaction of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">You have said now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and said nothing but what I protest intendment of doing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, now I see there's mettle in thee, and even from</div>
                     <div class="line">this instant to build on thee a better opinion than</div>
                     <div class="line">ever before. Give me thy hand, Roderigo: thou hast</div>
                     <div class="line">taken against me a most just exception; but yet, I</div>
                     <div class="line">protest, I have dealt most directly in thy affair.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">It hath not appeared.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I grant indeed it hath not appeared, and your</div>
                     <div class="line">suspicion is not without wit and judgment. But,</div>
                     <div class="line">Roderigo, if thou hast that in thee indeed, which I</div>
                     <div class="line">have greater reason to believe now than ever, I mean</div>
                     <div class="line">purpose, courage and valour, this night show it: if</div>
                     <div class="line">thou the next night following enjoy not Desdemona,</div>
                     <div class="line">take me from this world with treachery and devise</div>
                     <div class="line">engines for my life.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, what is it? is it within reason and compass?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, there is especial commission come from Venice</div>
                     <div class="line">to depute Cassio in Othello's place.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is that true? why, then Othello and Desdemona</div>
                     <div class="line">return again to Venice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, no; he goes into Mauritania and takes away with</div>
                     <div class="line">him the fair Desdemona, unless his abode be</div>
                     <div class="line">lingered here by some accident: wherein none can be</div>
                     <div class="line">so determinate as the removing of Cassio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">How do you mean, removing of him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, by making him uncapable of Othello's place;</div>
                     <div class="line">knocking out his brains.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">And that you would have me to do?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, if you dare do yourself a profit and a right.</div>
                     <div class="line">He sups to-night with a harlotry, and thither will I</div>
                     <div class="line">go to him: he knows not yet of his horrorable</div>
                     <div class="line">fortune. If you will watch his going thence, which</div>
                     <div class="line">I will fashion to fall out between twelve and one,</div>
                     <div class="line">you may take him at your pleasure: I will be near</div>
                     <div class="line">to second your attempt, and he shall fall between</div>
                     <div class="line">us. Come, stand not amazed at it, but go along with</div>
                     <div class="line">me; I will show you such a necessity in his death</div>
                     <div class="line">that you shall think yourself bound to put it on</div>
                     <div class="line">him. It is now high suppertime, and the night grows</div>
                     <div class="line">to waste: about it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I will hear further reason for this.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">And you shall be satisfied.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>3. SCENE III.  Another room In the castle.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter OTHELLO, LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, EMILIA and
Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do beseech you, sir, trouble yourself no further.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, pardon me: 'twill do me good to walk.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Madam, good night; I humbly thank your ladyship.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Your honour is most welcome.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you walk, sir?</div>
                     <div class="line">O,--Desdemona,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Get you to bed on the instant; I will be returned</div>
                     <div class="line">forthwith: dismiss your attendant there: look it be done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt OTHELLO, LODOVICO, and Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">How goes it now? he looks gentler than he did.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">He says he will return incontinent:</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath commanded me to go to bed,</div>
                     <div class="line">And bade me to dismiss you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Dismiss me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">It was his bidding: therefore, good Emilia,.</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me my nightly wearing, and adieu:</div>
                     <div class="line">We must not now displease him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I would you had never seen him!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">So would not I my love doth so approve him,</div>
                     <div class="line">That even his stubbornness, his cheques, his frowns--</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, unpin me,--have grace and favour in them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have laid those sheets you bade me on the bed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">All's one. Good faith, how foolish are our minds!</div>
                     <div class="line">If I do die before thee prithee, shroud me</div>
                     <div class="line">In one of those same sheets.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come you talk.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">My mother had a maid call'd Barbara:</div>
                     <div class="line">She was in love, and he she loved proved mad</div>
                     <div class="line">And did forsake her: she had a song of 'willow;'</div>
                     <div class="line">An old thing 'twas, but it express'd her fortune,</div>
                     <div class="line">And she died singing it: that song to-night</div>
                     <div class="line">Will not go from my mind; I have much to do,</div>
                     <div class="line">But to go hang my head all at one side,</div>
                     <div class="line">And sing it like poor Barbara. Prithee, dispatch.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall I go fetch your night-gown?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, unpin me here.</div>
                     <div class="line">This Lodovico is a proper man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">A very handsome man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">He speaks well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I know a lady in Venice would have walked barefoot</div>
                     <div class="line">to Palestine for a touch of his nether lip.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Singing</span>  The poor soul sat sighing by a sycamore tree,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sing all a green willow:</div>
                     <div class="line">Her hand on her bosom, her head on her knee,</div>
                     <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow:</div>
                     <div class="line">The fresh streams ran by her, and murmur'd her moans;</div>
                     <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow;</div>
                     <div class="line">Her salt tears fell from her, and soften'd the stones;</div>
                     <div class="line">Lay by these:--</div>
                     <p>Singing</p>
                     <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow;</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, hie thee; he'll come anon:--</div>
                     <p>Singing</p>
                     <div class="line">Sing all a green willow must be my garland.</div>
                     <div class="line">Let nobody blame him; his scorn I approve,-</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that's not next.--Hark! who is't that knocks?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">It's the wind.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Singing</span>  I call'd my love false love; but what</div>
                     <div class="line">said he then?</div>
                     <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow:</div>
                     <div class="line">If I court moe women, you'll couch with moe men!</div>
                     <div class="line">So, get thee gone; good night Ate eyes do itch;</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth that bode weeping?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis neither here nor there.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have heard it said so. O, these men, these men!</div>
                     <div class="line">Dost thou in conscience think,--tell me, Emilia,--</div>
                     <div class="line">That there be women do abuse their husbands</div>
                     <div class="line">In such gross kind?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">There be some such, no question.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, would not you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, by this heavenly light!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor I neither by this heavenly light;</div>
                     <div class="line">I might do't as well i' the dark.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">The world's a huge thing: it is a great price.</div>
                     <div class="line">For a small vice.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">In troth, I think thou wouldst not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">In troth, I think I should; and undo't when I had</div>
                     <div class="line">done. Marry, I would not do such a thing for a</div>
                     <div class="line">joint-ring, nor for measures of lawn, nor for</div>
                     <div class="line">gowns, petticoats, nor caps, nor any petty</div>
                     <div class="line">exhibition; but for the whole world,--why, who would</div>
                     <div class="line">not make her husband a cuckold to make him a</div>
                     <div class="line">monarch? I should venture purgatory for't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Beshrew me, if I would do such a wrong</div>
                     <div class="line">For the whole world.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why the wrong is but a wrong i' the world: and</div>
                     <div class="line">having the world for your labour, tis a wrong in your</div>
                     <div class="line">own world, and you might quickly make it right.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I do not think there is any such woman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, a dozen; and as many to the vantage as would</div>
                     <div class="line">store the world they played for.</div>
                     <div class="line">But I do think it is their husbands' faults</div>
                     <div class="line">If wives do fall: say that they slack their duties,</div>
                     <div class="line">And pour our treasures into foreign laps,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else break out in peevish jealousies,</div>
                     <div class="line">Throwing restraint upon us; or say they strike us,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or scant our former having in despite;</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, we have galls, and though we have some grace,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet have we some revenge. Let husbands know</div>
                     <div class="line">Their wives have sense like them: they see and smell</div>
                     <div class="line">And have their palates both for sweet and sour,</div>
                     <div class="line">As husbands have. What is it that they do</div>
                     <div class="line">When they change us for others? Is it sport?</div>
                     <div class="line">I think it is: and doth affection breed it?</div>
                     <div class="line">I think it doth: is't frailty that thus errs?</div>
                     <div class="line">It is so too: and have not we affections,</div>
                     <div class="line">Desires for sport, and frailty, as men have?</div>
                     <div class="line">Then let them use us well: else let them know,</div>
                     <div class="line">The ills we do, their ills instruct us so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good night, good night: heaven me such uses send,</div>
                     <div class="line">Not to pick bad from bad, but by bad mend!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. A street.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. A street.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter IAGO and RODERIGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, stand behind this bulk; straight will he come:</div>
                     <div class="line">Wear thy good rapier bare, and put it home:</div>
                     <div class="line">Quick, quick; fear nothing; I'll be at thy elbow:</div>
                     <div class="line">It makes us, or it mars us; think on that,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fix most firm thy resolution.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Be near at hand; I may miscarry in't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, at thy hand: be bold, and take thy stand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Retires</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no great devotion to the deed;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet he hath given me satisfying reasons:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis but a man gone. Forth, my sword: he dies.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have rubb'd this young quat almost to the sense,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he grows angry. Now, whether he kill Cassio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or Cassio him, or each do kill the other,</div>
                     <div class="line">Every way makes my gain: live Roderigo,</div>
                     <div class="line">He calls me to a restitution large</div>
                     <div class="line">Of gold and jewels that I bobb'd from him,</div>
                     <div class="line">As gifts to Desdemona;</div>
                     <div class="line">It must not be: if Cassio do remain,</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath a daily beauty in his life</div>
                     <div class="line">That makes me ugly; and, besides, the Moor</div>
                     <div class="line">May unfold me to him; there stand I in much peril:</div>
                     <div class="line">No, he must die. But so: I hear him coming.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter CASSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I know his gait, 'tis he.--Villain, thou diest!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Makes a pass at CASSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That thrust had been mine enemy indeed,</div>
                     <div class="line">But that my coat is better than thou know'st</div>
                     <div class="line">I will make proof of thine.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Draws, and wounds RODERIGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, I am slain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>IAGO from behind wounds CASSIO in the leg, and exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am maim'd for ever. Help, ho! murder! murder!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Falls</p>
               <p>Enter OTHELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">The voice of Cassio: Iago keeps his word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, villain that I am!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is even so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, help, ho! light! a surgeon!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis he:--O brave Iago, honest and just,</div>
                     <div class="line">That hast such noble sense of thy friend's wrong!</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou teachest me. Minion, your dear lies dead,</div>
                     <div class="line">And your unblest fate hies: strumpet, I come.</div>
                     <div class="line">Forth of my heart those charms, thine eyes, are blotted;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy bed, lust-stain'd, shall with lust's blood be spotted.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <p>Enter LODOVICO and GRATIANO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, ho! no watch? no passage? murder! murder!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis some mischance; the cry is very direful.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, help!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O wretched villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Two or three groan: it is a heavy night:</div>
                     <div class="line">These may be counterfeits: let's think't unsafe</div>
                     <div class="line">To come in to the cry without more help.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nobody come? then shall I bleed to death.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter IAGO, with a light</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's one comes in his shirt, with light and weapons.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's there? whose noise is this that ones on murder?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">We do not know.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Did not you hear a cry?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, here! for heaven's sake, help me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is Othello's ancient, as I take it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">The same indeed; a very valiant fellow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What are you here that cry so grievously?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Iago? O, I am spoil'd, undone by villains!</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me some help.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O me, lieutenant! what villains have done this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I think that one of them is hereabout,</div>
                     <div class="line">And cannot make away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O treacherous villains!</div>
                     <div class="line">What are you there? come in, and give some help.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>To LODOVICO and GRATIANO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, help me here!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's one of them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O murderous slave! O villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Stabs RODERIGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O damn'd Iago! O inhuman dog!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Kill men i' the dark!--Where be these bloody thieves?--</div>
                     <div class="line">How silent is this town!--Ho! murder! murder!--</div>
                     <div class="line">What may you be? are you of good or evil?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">As you shall prove us, praise us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Lodovico?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">He, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I cry you mercy. Here's Cassio hurt by villains.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">How is't, brother!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My leg is cut in two.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, heaven forbid!</div>
                     <div class="line">Light, gentlemen; I'll bind it with my shirt.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the matter, ho? who is't that cried?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who is't that cried!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">O my dear Cassio! my sweet Cassio! O Cassio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio, Cassio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O notable strumpet! Cassio, may you suspect</div>
                     <div class="line">Who they should be that have thus many led you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am to find you thus: I have been to seek you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lend me a garter. So. O, for a chair,</div>
                     <div class="line">To bear him easily hence!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, he faints! O Cassio, Cassio, Cassio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentlemen all, I do suspect this trash</div>
                     <div class="line">To be a party in this injury.</div>
                     <div class="line">Patience awhile, good Cassio. Come, come;</div>
                     <div class="line">Lend me a light. Know we this face or no?</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas my friend and my dear countryman</div>
                     <div class="line">Roderigo! no:--yes, sure: O heaven! Roderigo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, of Venice?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Even he, sir; did you know him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Know him! ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Gratiano? I cry you gentle pardon;</div>
                     <div class="line">These bloody accidents must excuse my manners,</div>
                     <div class="line">That so neglected you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am glad to see you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">How do you, Cassio? O, a chair, a chair!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Roderigo!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">He, he 'tis he.</div>
                     <p>A chair brought in</p>
                     <div class="line">O, that's well said; the chair!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Some good man bear him carefully from hence;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll fetch the general's surgeon.</div>
                     <p>To BIANCA</p>
                     <div class="line">For you, mistress,</div>
                     <div class="line">Save you your labour. He that lies slain</div>
                     <div class="line">here, Cassio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Was my dear friend: what malice was between you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">None in the world; nor do I know the man.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To BIANCA</span>  What, look you pale? O, bear him out</div>
                     <div class="line">o' the air.</div>
                     <p>CASSIO and RODERIGO are borne off</p>
                     <div class="line">Stay you, good gentlemen. Look you pale, mistress?</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you perceive the gastness of her eye?</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, if you stare, we shall hear more anon.</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold her well; I pray you, look upon her:</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you see, gentlemen? nay, guiltiness will speak,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though tongues were out of use.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter EMILIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Las, what's the matter? what's the matter, husband?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio hath here been set on in the dark</div>
                     <div class="line">By Roderigo and fellows that are scaped:</div>
                     <div class="line">He's almost slain, and Roderigo dead.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, good gentleman! alas, good Cassio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">This is the fruit of whoring. Prithee, Emilia,</div>
                     <div class="line">Go know of Cassio where he supp'd to-night.</div>
                     <p>To BIANCA</p>
                     <div class="line">What, do you shake at that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">He supp'd at my house; but I therefore shake not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, did he so? I charge you, go with me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie, fie upon thee, strumpet!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">I am no strumpet; but of life as honest</div>
                     <div class="line">As you that thus abuse me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">As I! foh! fie upon thee!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Kind gentlemen, let's go see poor Cassio dress'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, mistress, you must tell's another tale.</div>
                     <div class="line">Emilia run you to the citadel,</div>
                     <div class="line">And tell my lord and lady what hath happ'd.</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you go on? I pray.</div>
                     <p>Aside</p>
                     <div class="line">This is the night</div>
                     <div class="line">That either makes me or fordoes me quite.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter OTHELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the cause, it is the cause, my soul,--</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me not name it to you, you chaste stars!--</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the cause. Yet I'll not shed her blood;</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor scar that whiter skin of hers than snow,</div>
                     <div class="line">And smooth as monumental alabaster.</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet she must die, else she'll betray more men.</div>
                     <div class="line">Put out the light, and then put out the light:</div>
                     <div class="line">If I quench thee, thou flaming minister,</div>
                     <div class="line">I can again thy former light restore,</div>
                     <div class="line">Should I repent me: but once put out thy light,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou cunning'st pattern of excelling nature,</div>
                     <div class="line">I know not where is that Promethean heat</div>
                     <div class="line">That can thy light relume. When I have pluck'd the rose,</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot give it vital growth again.</div>
                     <div class="line">It must needs wither: I'll smell it on the tree.</div>
                     <p>Kissing her</p>
                     <div class="line">Ah balmy breath, that dost almost persuade</div>
                     <div class="line">Justice to break her sword! One more, one more.</div>
                     <div class="line">Be thus when thou art dead, and I will kill thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">And love thee after. One more, and this the last:</div>
                     <div class="line">So sweet was ne'er so fatal. I must weep,</div>
                     <div class="line">But they are cruel tears: this sorrow's heavenly;</div>
                     <div class="line">It strikes where it doth love. She wakes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's there? Othello?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay. Desdemona.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you come to bed, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Have you pray'd to-night, Desdemona?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">If you bethink yourself of any crime</div>
                     <div class="line">Unreconciled as yet to heaven and grace,</div>
                     <div class="line">Solicit for it straight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, my lord, what do you mean by that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, do it, and be brief; I will walk by:</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not kill thy unprepared spirit;</div>
                     <div class="line">No; heaven forfend! I would not kill thy soul.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Talk you of killing?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, I do.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">Have mercy on me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Amen, with all my heart!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">If you say so, I hope you will not kill me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hum!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I fear you; for you are fatal then</div>
                     <div class="line">When your eyes roll so: why I should fear I know not,</div>
                     <div class="line">Since guiltiness I know not; but yet I feel I fear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Think on thy sins.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">They are loves I bear to you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and for that thou diest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">That death's unnatural that kills for loving.</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, why gnaw you so your nether lip?</div>
                     <div class="line">Some bloody passion shakes your very frame:</div>
                     <div class="line">These are portents; but yet I hope, I hope,</div>
                     <div class="line">They do not point on me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, and be still!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will so. What's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That handkerchief which I so loved and gave thee</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou gavest to Cassio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, by my life and soul!</div>
                     <div class="line">Send for the man, and ask him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet soul, take heed,</div>
                     <div class="line">Take heed of perjury; thou art on thy deathbed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but not yet to die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, presently:</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore confess thee freely of thy sin;</div>
                     <div class="line">For to deny each article with oath</div>
                     <div class="line">Cannot remove nor choke the strong conception</div>
                     <div class="line">That I do groan withal. Thou art to die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then Lord have mercy on me!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I say, amen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">And have you mercy too! I never did</div>
                     <div class="line">Offend you in my life; never loved Cassio</div>
                     <div class="line">But with such general warranty of heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">As I might love: I never gave him token.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, I saw my handkerchief in's hand.</div>
                     <div class="line">O perjured woman! thou dost stone my heart,</div>
                     <div class="line">And makest me call what I intend to do</div>
                     <div class="line">A murder, which I thought a sacrifice:</div>
                     <div class="line">I saw the handkerchief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">He found it then;</div>
                     <div class="line">I never gave it him: send for him hither;</div>
                     <div class="line">Let him confess a truth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath confess'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, my lord?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That he hath used thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">How? unlawfully?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">He will not say so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, his mouth is stopp'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Honest Iago hath ta'en order for't.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">O! my fear interprets: what, is he dead?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Had all his hairs been lives, my great revenge</div>
                     <div class="line">Had stomach for them all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas! he is betray'd and I undone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Out, strumpet! weep'st thou for him to my face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, banish me, my lord, but kill me not!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Down, strumpet!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
