                     <div class="line">Kill me to-morrow: let me live to-night!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, if you strive--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">But half an hour!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Being done, there is no pause.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">But while I say one prayer!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is too late.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>He stifles her</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  My lord, my lord! what, ho! my lord, my lord!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What noise is this? Not dead? not yet quite dead?</div>
                     <div class="line">I that am cruel am yet merciful;</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not have thee linger in thy pain: So, so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  What, ho! my lord, my lord!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who's there?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  O, good my lord, I would speak a word with you!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes: 'tis Emilia. By and by. She's dead.</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis like she comes to speak of Cassio's death.--</div>
                     <div class="line">The noise was here. Ha! no more moving?</div>
                     <div class="line">Still as the grave. Shall she come in? were't good?--</div>
                     <div class="line">I think she stirs again:--no. What's best to do?</div>
                     <div class="line">If she come in, she'll sure speak to my wife:</div>
                     <div class="line">My wife! my wife! what wife? I have no wife.</div>
                     <div class="line">O insupportable! O heavy hour!</div>
                     <div class="line">Methinks it should be now a huge eclipse</div>
                     <div class="line">Of sun and moon, and that the affrighted globe</div>
                     <div class="line">Should yawn at alteration.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  I do beseech you</div>
                     <div class="line">That I may speak with you, O, good my lord!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I had forgot thee: O, come in, Emilia;</div>
                     <div class="line">Soft; by and by. Let me the curtains draw.</div>
                     <div class="line">Where art thou?</div>
                     <p>Unlocks the door</p>
                     <p>Enter EMILIA</p>
                     <div class="line">What's the matter with thee now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, my good lord, yonder's foul murders done!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, now?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">But now, my lord.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">It is the very error of the moon;</div>
                     <div class="line">She comes more nearer earth than she was wont,</div>
                     <div class="line">And makes men mad.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio, my lord, hath kill'd a young Venetian</div>
                     <div class="line">Call'd Roderigo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Roderigo kill'd!</div>
                     <div class="line">And Cassio kill'd!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, Cassio is not kill'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not Cassio kill'd! then murder's out of tune,</div>
                     <div class="line">And sweet revenge grows harsh.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, falsely, falsely murder'd!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, what cry is that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That! what?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Out, and alas! that was my lady's voice.</div>
                     <div class="line">Help! help, ho! help! O lady, speak again!</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet Desdemona! O sweet mistress, speak!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">A guiltless death I die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, who hath done this deed?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nobody; I myself. Farewell</div>
                     <div class="line">Commend me to my kind lord: O, farewell!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Dies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how should she be murder'd?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas, who knows?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">You heard her say herself, it was not I.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">She said so: I must needs report the truth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">She's, like a liar, gone to burning hell:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twas I that kill'd her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, the more angel she,</div>
                     <div class="line">And you the blacker devil!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">She turn'd to folly, and she was a whore.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou dost belie her, and thou art a devil.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">She was false as water.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou art rash as fire, to say</div>
                     <div class="line">That she was false: O, she was heavenly true!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Cassio did top her; ask thy husband else.</div>
                     <div class="line">O, I were damn'd beneath all depth in hell,</div>
                     <div class="line">But that I did proceed upon just grounds</div>
                     <div class="line">To this extremity. Thy husband knew it all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">That she was false to wedlock?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, with Cassio. Nay, had she been true,</div>
                     <div class="line">If heaven would make me such another world</div>
                     <div class="line">Of one entire and Perfect chrysolite,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'ld not have sold her for it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, 'twas he that told me first:</div>
                     <div class="line">An honest man he is, and hates the slime</div>
                     <div class="line">That sticks on filthy deeds.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What needs this iteration, woman? I say thy husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O mistress, villany hath made mocks with love,</div>
                     <div class="line">My husband say that she was false!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">He, woman;</div>
                     <div class="line">I say thy husband: dost understand the word?</div>
                     <div class="line">My friend, thy husband, honest, honest Iago.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">If he say so, may his pernicious soul</div>
                     <div class="line">Rot half a grain a day! he lies to the heart:</div>
                     <div class="line">She was too fond of her most filthy bargain.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Do thy worst:</div>
                     <div class="line">This deed of thine is no more worthy heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">Than thou wast worthy her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, you were best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast not half that power to do me harm</div>
                     <div class="line">As I have to be hurt. O gull! O dolt!</div>
                     <div class="line">As ignorant as dirt! thou hast done a deed--</div>
                     <div class="line">I care not for thy sword; I'll make thee known,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though I lost twenty lives.--Help! help, ho! help!</div>
                     <div class="line">The Moor hath kill'd my mistress! Murder! murder!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter MONTANO, GRATIANO, IAGO, and others</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the matter? How now, general!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O, are you come, Iago? you have done well,</div>
                     <div class="line">That men must lay their murders on your neck.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Disprove this villain, if thou be'st a man:</div>
                     <div class="line">He says thou told'st him that his wife was false:</div>
                     <div class="line">I know thou didst not, thou'rt not such a villain:</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak, for my heart is full.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I told him what I thought, and told no more</div>
                     <div class="line">Than what he found himself was apt and true.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">But did you ever tell him she was false?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I did.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">You told a lie, an odious, damned lie;</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon my soul, a lie, a wicked lie.</div>
                     <div class="line">She false with Cassio!--did you say with Cassio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">With Cassio, mistress. Go to, charm your tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not charm my tongue; I am bound to speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">My mistress here lies murder'd in her bed,--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">All</div>
                     <div class="line">O heavens forfend!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">And your reports have set the murder on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, stare not, masters: it is true, indeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis a strange truth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                     <div class="line">O monstrous act!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Villany, villany, villany!</div>
                     <div class="line">I think upon't, I think: I smell't: O villany!--</div>
                     <div class="line">I thought so then:--I'll kill myself for grief:--</div>
                     <div class="line">O villany, villany!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, are you mad? I charge you, get you home.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good gentlemen, let me have leave to speak:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis proper I obey him, but not now.</div>
                     <div class="line">Perchance, Iago, I will ne'er go home.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O! O! O!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>He falls on the bed</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, lay thee down and roar;</div>
                     <div class="line">For thou hast kill'd the sweetest innocent</div>
                     <div class="line">That e'er did lift up eye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Rising</span>  O, she was foul!</div>
                     <div class="line">I scarce did know you, uncle: there lies your niece,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose breath, indeed, these hands have newly stopp'd:</div>
                     <div class="line">I know this act shows horrible and grim.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Poor Desdemona! I am glad thy father's dead:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy match was mortal to him, and pure grief</div>
                     <div class="line">Shore his old thread in twain: did he live now,</div>
                     <div class="line">This sight would make him do a desperate turn,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, curse his better angel from his side,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fall to reprobation.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis pitiful; but yet Iago knows</div>
                     <div class="line">That she with Cassio hath the act of shame</div>
                     <div class="line">A thousand times committed; Cassio confess'd it:</div>
                     <div class="line">And she did gratify his amorous works</div>
                     <div class="line">With that recognizance and pledge of love</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I first gave her; I saw it in his hand:</div>
                     <div class="line">It was a handkerchief, an antique token</div>
                     <div class="line">My father gave my mother.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O heaven! O heavenly powers!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, hold your peace.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twill out, 'twill out: I peace!</div>
                     <div class="line">No, I will speak as liberal as the north:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let heaven and men and devils, let them all,</div>
                     <div class="line">All, all, cry shame against me, yet I'll speak.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Be wise, and get you home.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>IAGO offers to stab EMILIA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fie!</div>
                     <div class="line">Your sword upon a woman?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou dull Moor! that handkerchief thou speak'st of</div>
                     <div class="line">I found by fortune and did give my husband;</div>
                     <div class="line">For often, with a solemn earnestness,</div>
                     <div class="line">More than indeed belong'd to such a trifle,</div>
                     <div class="line">He begg'd of me to steal it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Villanous whore!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">She give it Cassio! no, alas! I found it,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I did give't my husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Filth, thou liest!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">By heaven, I do not, I do not, gentlemen.</div>
                     <div class="line">O murderous coxcomb! what should such a fool</div>
                     <div class="line">Do with so good a woman?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Are there no stones in heaven</div>
                     <div class="line">But what serve for the thunder?--Precious villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>He runs at IAGO  IAGO, from behind, stabs EMILIA, and exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">The woman falls; sure, he hath kill'd his wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, ay: O, lay me by my mistress' side.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">He's gone, but his wife's kill'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis a notorious villain. Take you this weapon,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I have here recover'd from the Moor:</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, guard the door without; let him not pass,</div>
                     <div class="line">But kill him rather. I'll after that same villain,</div>
                     <div class="line">For 'tis a damned slave.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt MONTANO and GRATIANO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not valiant neither,</div>
                     <div class="line">But ever puny whipster gets my sword:</div>
                     <div class="line">But why should honour outlive honesty?</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it go all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                     <div class="line">What did thy song bode, lady?</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark, canst thou hear me? I will play the swan.</div>
                     <div class="line">And die in music.</div>
                     <p>Singing</p>
                     <div class="line">Willow, willow, willow,--</div>
                     <div class="line">Moor, she was chaste; she loved thee, cruel Moor;</div>
                     <div class="line">So come my soul to bliss, as I speak true;</div>
                     <div class="line">So speaking as I think, I die, I die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Dies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have another weapon in this chamber;</div>
                     <div class="line">It is a sword of Spain, the ice-brook's temper:--</div>
                     <div class="line">O, here it is. Uncle, I must come forth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Within</span>  If thou attempt it, it will cost thee dear:</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast no weapon, and perforce must suffer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look in upon me then and speak with me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or, naked as I am, I will assault thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter GRATIANO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Behold, I have a weapon;</div>
                     <div class="line">A better never did itself sustain</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon a soldier's thigh: I have seen the day,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, with this little arm and this good sword,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have made my way through more impediments</div>
                     <div class="line">Than twenty times your stop: but, O vain boast!</div>
                     <div class="line">Who can control his fate? 'tis not so now.</div>
                     <div class="line">Be not afraid, though you do see me weapon'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is my journey's end, here is my butt,</div>
                     <div class="line">And very sea-mark of my utmost sail.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you go back dismay'd? 'tis a lost fear;</div>
                     <div class="line">Man but a rush against Othello's breast,</div>
                     <div class="line">And he retires. Where should Othello go?</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, how dost thou look now? O ill-starr'd wench!</div>
                     <div class="line">Pale as thy smock! when we shall meet at compt,</div>
                     <div class="line">This look of thine will hurl my soul from heaven,</div>
                     <div class="line">And fiends will snatch at it. Cold, cold, my girl!</div>
                     <div class="line">Even like thy chastity. O cursed slave!</div>
                     <div class="line">Whip me, ye devils,</div>
                     <div class="line">From the possession of this heavenly sight!</div>
                     <div class="line">Blow me about in winds! roast me in sulphur!</div>
                     <div class="line">Wash me in steep-down gulfs of liquid fire!</div>
                     <div class="line">O Desdemona! Desdemona! dead!</div>
                     <div class="line">Oh! Oh! Oh!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter LODOVICO. MONTANO, CASSIO carried in a chair,
and Officers with IAGO, prisoner</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is this rash and most unfortunate man?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's he that was Othello: here I am.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is that viper? bring the villain forth.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I look down towards his feet; but that's a fable.</div>
                     <div class="line">If that thou best a devil, I cannot kill thee.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Wounds IAGO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Wrench his sword from him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">I bleed, sir; but not kill'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am not sorry neither: I'ld have thee live;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, in my sense, 'tis happiness to die.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">O thou Othello, thou wert once so good,</div>
                     <div class="line">Fall'n in the practise of a damned slave,</div>
                     <div class="line">What shall be said to thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, any thing:</div>
                     <div class="line">An honourable murderer, if you will;</div>
                     <div class="line">For nought I did in hate, but all in honour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">This wretch hath part confess'd his villany:</div>
                     <div class="line">Did you and he consent in Cassio's death?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dear general, I never gave you cause.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do believe it, and I ask your pardon.</div>
                     <div class="line">Will you, I pray, demand that demi-devil</div>
                     <div class="line">Why he hath thus ensnared my soul and body?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                     <div class="line">Demand me nothing: what you know, you know:</div>
                     <div class="line">From this time forth I never will speak word.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, not to pray?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">Torments will ope your lips.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, thou dost best.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you shall understand what hath befall'n,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which, as I think, you know not. Here is a letter</div>
                     <div class="line">Found in the pocket of the slain Roderigo;</div>
                     <div class="line">And here another: the one of them imports</div>
                     <div class="line">The death of Cassio to be undertook</div>
                     <div class="line">By Roderigo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Most heathenish and most gross!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now here's another discontented paper,</div>
                     <div class="line">Found in his pocket too; and this, it seems,</div>
                     <div class="line">Roderigo meant to have sent this damned villain;</div>
                     <div class="line">But that belike Iago in the interim</div>
                     <div class="line">Came in and satisfied him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O the pernicious caitiff!</div>
                     <div class="line">How came you, Cassio, by that handkerchief</div>
                     <div class="line">That was my wife's?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I found it in my chamber:</div>
                     <div class="line">And he himself confess'd but even now</div>
                     <div class="line">That there he dropp'd it for a special purpose</div>
                     <div class="line">Which wrought to his desire.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O fool! fool! fool!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">There is besides in Roderigo's letter,</div>
                     <div class="line">How he upbraids Iago, that he made him</div>
                     <div class="line">Brave me upon the watch; whereon it came</div>
                     <div class="line">That I was cast: and even but now he spake,</div>
                     <div class="line">After long seeming dead, Iago hurt him,</div>
                     <div class="line">Iago set him on.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">You must forsake this room, and go with us:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your power and your command is taken off,</div>
                     <div class="line">And Cassio rules in Cyprus. For this slave,</div>
                     <div class="line">If there be any cunning cruelty</div>
                     <div class="line">That can torment him much and hold him long,</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall be his. You shall close prisoner rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Till that the nature of your fault be known</div>
                     <div class="line">To the Venetian state. Come, bring him away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Soft you; a word or two before you go.</div>
                     <div class="line">I have done the state some service, and they know't.</div>
                     <div class="line">No more of that. I pray you, in your letters,</div>
                     <div class="line">When you shall these unlucky deeds relate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Speak of me as I am; nothing extenuate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor set down aught in malice: then must you speak</div>
                     <div class="line">Of one that loved not wisely but too well;</div>
                     <div class="line">Of one not easily jealous, but being wrought</div>
                     <div class="line">Perplex'd in the extreme; of one whose hand,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like the base Indian, threw a pearl away</div>
                     <div class="line">Richer than all his tribe; of one whose subdued eyes,</div>
                     <div class="line">Albeit unused to the melting mood,</div>
                     <div class="line">Drop tears as fast as the Arabian trees</div>
                     <div class="line">Their medicinal gum. Set you down this;</div>
                     <div class="line">And say besides, that in Aleppo once,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where a malignant and a turban'd Turk</div>
                     <div class="line">Beat a Venetian and traduced the state,</div>
                     <div class="line">I took by the throat the circumcised dog,</div>
                     <div class="line">And smote him, thus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Stabs himself</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">O bloody period!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                     <div class="line">All that's spoke is marr'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I kiss'd thee ere I kill'd thee: no way but this;</div>
                     <div class="line">Killing myself, to die upon a kiss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Falls on the bed, and dies</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">This did I fear, but thought he had no weapon;</div>
                     <div class="line">For he was great of heart.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To IAGO</span>  O Spartan dog,</div>
                     <div class="line">More fell than anguish, hunger, or the sea!</div>
                     <div class="line">Look on the tragic loading of this bed;</div>
                     <div class="line">This is thy work: the object poisons sight;</div>
                     <div class="line">Let it be hid. Gratiano, keep the house,</div>
                     <div class="line">And seize upon the fortunes of the Moor,</div>
                     <div class="line">For they succeed on you. To you, lord governor,</div>
                     <div class="line">Remains the censure of this hellish villain;</div>
                     <div class="line">The time, the place, the torture: O, enforce it!</div>
                     <div class="line">Myself will straight aboard: and to the state</div>
                     <div class="line">This heavy act with heavy heart relate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
      </article>
      <script src="../../resources/js/prism.js"/>
   </body>
</html>

      <link href="../../resources/css/prism.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
      <link href="../../resources/css/publishers.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>

      <meta content="DocBook XSL 2.0 Stylesheets Vxxx" name="generator"/>
      <script src="../../resources/js/dbmodnizr.js" type="text/javascript"/>
      <title>The Tragedy of Othello, the Moor of Venice</title>
   </head>
   <body>
      <article class="book" id="R.1">
         <header class="book-titlepage">
            <h1>The Tragedy of Othello, the Moor of Venice</h1>
         </header>
         <div class="lists-of-titles">

                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>

                           </span>

                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  The garden of the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.6">4. ACT IV</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  Another room In the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
                  <li>
                     <span>
                        <a href="#R.1.7">5. ACT V</a>
                     </span>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </li>
               </ul>
            </div>
         </div>
         <div class="content">
            <article class="preface" id="R.1.2">
               <header class="preface-titlepage">
                  <h2>Dramatis Personae</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="content">
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DUKE OF VENICE</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">BRABANTIO, a senator.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Other Senators.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">GRATIANO, brother to Brabantio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">LODOVICO, kinsman to Brabantio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">OTHELLO, a noble Moor in the service of the Venetian state.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">CASSIO, his lieutenant.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">IAGO, his ancient.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">RODERIGO, a Venetian gentleman.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">MONTANO, Othello's predecessor in the government of Cyprus.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Clown, servant to Othello. </span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">DESDEMONA, daughter to Brabantio and wife to Othello.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">EMILIA, wife to Iago.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">BIANCA, mistress to Cassio.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>
                     <span class="personname">Sailor, Messenger, Herald, Officers, Gentlemen, Musicians, and Attendants.</span>
                  </p>
                  <p>SCENE  Venice: a Sea-port in Cyprus.</p>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.3">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 1. ACT I</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.2">1. SCENE I.  Venice. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.3">2. SCENE II.  Another street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.3.4">3. SCENE III.  A council-chamber.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Venice. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter RODERIGO and IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tush! never tell me; I take it much unkindly</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou, Iago, who hast had my purse</div>
                              <div class="line">As if the strings were thine, shouldst know of this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sblood, but you will not hear me:</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever I did dream of such a matter, Abhor me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou told'st me thou didst hold him in thy hate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Despise me, if I do not. Three great ones of the city,</div>
                              <div class="line">In personal suit to make me his lieutenant,</div>
                              <div class="line">Off-capp'd to him: and, by the faith of man,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know my price, I am worth no worse a place:</div>
                              <div class="line">But he; as loving his own pride and purposes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Evades them, with a bombast circumstance</div>
                              <div class="line">Horribly stuff'd with epithets of war;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, in conclusion,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nonsuits my mediators; for, 'Certes,' says he,</div>
                              <div class="line">'I have already chose my officer.'</div>
                              <div class="line">And what was he?</div>
                              <div class="line">Forsooth, a great arithmetician,</div>
                              <div class="line">One Michael Cassio, a Florentine,</div>
                              <div class="line">A fellow almost damn'd in a fair wife;</div>
                              <div class="line">That never set a squadron in the field,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor the division of a battle knows</div>
                              <div class="line">More than a spinster; unless the bookish theoric,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein the toged consuls can propose</div>
                              <div class="line">As masterly as he: mere prattle, without practise,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is all his soldiership. But he, sir, had the election:</div>
                              <div class="line">And I, of whom his eyes had seen the proof</div>
                              <div class="line">At Rhodes, at Cyprus and on other grounds</div>
                              <div class="line">Christian and heathen, must be be-lee'd and calm'd</div>
                              <div class="line">By debitor and creditor: this counter-caster,</div>
                              <div class="line">He, in good time, must his lieutenant be,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I--God bless the mark!--his Moorship's ancient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I rather would have been his hangman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, there's no remedy; 'tis the curse of service,</div>
                              <div class="line">Preferment goes by letter and affection,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not by old gradation, where each second</div>
                              <div class="line">Stood heir to the first. Now, sir, be judge yourself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether I in any just term am affined</div>
                              <div class="line">To love the Moor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not follow him then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, content you;</div>
                              <div class="line">I follow him to serve my turn upon him:</div>
                              <div class="line">We cannot all be masters, nor all masters</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot be truly follow'd. You shall mark</div>
                              <div class="line">Many a duteous and knee-crooking knave,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, doting on his own obsequious bondage,</div>
                              <div class="line">Wears out his time, much like his master's ass,</div>
                              <div class="line">For nought but provender, and when he's old, cashier'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whip me such honest knaves. Others there are</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, trimm'd in forms and visages of duty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep yet their hearts attending on themselves,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, throwing but shows of service on their lords,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do well thrive by them and when they have lined</div>
                              <div class="line">their coats</div>
                              <div class="line">Do themselves homage: these fellows have some soul;</div>
                              <div class="line">And such a one do I profess myself. For, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is as sure as you are Roderigo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were I the Moor, I would not be Iago:</div>
                              <div class="line">In following him, I follow but myself;</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven is my judge, not I for love and duty,</div>
                              <div class="line">But seeming so, for my peculiar end:</div>
                              <div class="line">For when my outward action doth demonstrate</div>
                              <div class="line">The native act and figure of my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">In compliment extern, 'tis not long after</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will wear my heart upon my sleeve</div>
                              <div class="line">For daws to peck at: I am not what I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What a full fortune does the thicklips owe</div>
                              <div class="line">If he can carry't thus!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Call up her father,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rouse him: make after him, poison his delight,</div>
                              <div class="line">Proclaim him in the streets; incense her kinsmen,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, though he in a fertile climate dwell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Plague him with flies: though that his joy be joy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet throw such changes of vexation on't,</div>
                              <div class="line">As it may lose some colour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is her father's house; I'll call aloud.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, with like timorous accent and dire yell</div>
                              <div class="line">As when, by night and negligence, the fire</div>
                              <div class="line">Is spied in populous cities.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho, Brabantio! Signior Brabantio, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Awake! what, ho, Brabantio! thieves! thieves! thieves!</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to your house, your daughter and your bags!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thieves! thieves!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>BRABANTIO appears above, at a window</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the reason of this terrible summons?</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior, is all your family within?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are your doors lock'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, wherefore ask you this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, sir, you're robb'd; for shame, put on</div>
                              <div class="line">your gown;</div>
                              <div class="line">Your heart is burst, you have lost half your soul;</div>
                              <div class="line">Even now, now, very now, an old black ram</div>
                              <div class="line">Is topping your white ewe. Arise, arise;</div>
                              <div class="line">Awake the snorting citizens with the bell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else the devil will make a grandsire of you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Arise, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have you lost your wits?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most reverend signior, do you know my voice?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I what are you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My name is Roderigo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The worser welcome:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have charged thee not to haunt about my doors:</div>
                              <div class="line">In honest plainness thou hast heard me say</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter is not for thee; and now, in madness,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being full of supper and distempering draughts,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon malicious bravery, dost thou come</div>
                              <div class="line">To start my quiet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, sir, sir,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But thou must needs be sure</div>
                              <div class="line">My spirit and my place have in them power</div>
                              <div class="line">To make this bitter to thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, good sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What tell'st thou me of robbing? this is Venice;</div>
                              <div class="line">My house is not a grange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most grave Brabantio,</div>
                              <div class="line">In simple and pure soul I come to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, sir, you are one of those that will not</div>
                              <div class="line">serve God, if the devil bid you. Because we come to</div>
                              <div class="line">do you service and you think we are ruffians, you'll</div>
                              <div class="line">have your daughter covered with a Barbary horse;</div>
                              <div class="line">you'll have your nephews neigh to you; you'll have</div>
                              <div class="line">coursers for cousins and gennets for germans.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What profane wretch art thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am one, sir, that comes to tell you your daughter</div>
                              <div class="line">and the Moor are now making the beast with two backs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art a villain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are--a senator.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This thou shalt answer; I know thee, Roderigo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, I will answer any thing. But, I beseech you,</div>
                              <div class="line">If't be your pleasure and most wise consent,</div>
                              <div class="line">As partly I find it is, that your fair daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">At this odd-even and dull watch o' the night,</div>
                              <div class="line">Transported, with no worse nor better guard</div>
