                              <div class="line">But with a knave of common hire, a gondolier,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the gross clasps of a lascivious Moor--</div>
                              <div class="line">If this be known to you and your allowance,</div>
                              <div class="line">We then have done you bold and saucy wrongs;</div>
                              <div class="line">But if you know not this, my manners tell me</div>
                              <div class="line">We have your wrong rebuke. Do not believe</div>
                              <div class="line">That, from the sense of all civility,</div>
                              <div class="line">I thus would play and trifle with your reverence:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your daughter, if you have not given her leave,</div>
                              <div class="line">I say again, hath made a gross revolt;</div>
                              <div class="line">Tying her duty, beauty, wit and fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">In an extravagant and wheeling stranger</div>
                              <div class="line">Of here and every where. Straight satisfy yourself:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be in her chamber or your house,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let loose on me the justice of the state</div>
                              <div class="line">For thus deluding you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike on the tinder, ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me a taper! call up all my people!</div>
                              <div class="line">This accident is not unlike my dream:</div>
                              <div class="line">Belief of it oppresses me already.</div>
                              <div class="line">Light, I say! light!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit above</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell; for I must leave you:</div>
                              <div class="line">It seems not meet, nor wholesome to my place,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be produced--as, if I stay, I shall--</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the Moor: for, I do know, the state,</div>
                              <div class="line">However this may gall him with some cheque,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot with safety cast him, for he's embark'd</div>
                              <div class="line">With such loud reason to the Cyprus wars,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which even now stand in act, that, for their souls,</div>
                              <div class="line">Another of his fathom they have none,</div>
                              <div class="line">To lead their business: in which regard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I do hate him as I do hell-pains.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, for necessity of present life,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must show out a flag and sign of love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which is indeed but sign. That you shall surely find him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead to the Sagittary the raised search;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there will I be with him. So, farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter, below, BRABANTIO, and Servants with torches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is too true an evil: gone she is;</div>
                              <div class="line">And what's to come of my despised time</div>
                              <div class="line">Is nought but bitterness. Now, Roderigo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where didst thou see her? O unhappy girl!</div>
                              <div class="line">With the Moor, say'st thou? Who would be a father!</div>
                              <div class="line">How didst thou know 'twas she? O she deceives me</div>
                              <div class="line">Past thought! What said she to you? Get more tapers:</div>
                              <div class="line">Raise all my kindred. Are they married, think you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, I think they are.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O heaven! How got she out? O treason of the blood!</div>
                              <div class="line">Fathers, from hence trust not your daughters' minds</div>
                              <div class="line">By what you see them act. Is there not charms</div>
                              <div class="line">By which the property of youth and maidhood</div>
                              <div class="line">May be abused? Have you not read, Roderigo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of some such thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, sir, I have indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Call up my brother. O, would you had had her!</div>
                              <div class="line">Some one way, some another. Do you know</div>
                              <div class="line">Where we may apprehend her and the Moor?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think I can discover him, if you please,</div>
                              <div class="line">To get good guard and go along with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, lead on. At every house I'll call;</div>
                              <div class="line">I may command at most. Get weapons, ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">And raise some special officers of night.</div>
                              <div class="line">On, good Roderigo: I'll deserve your pains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Another street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO, IAGO, and Attendants with torches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Though in the trade of war I have slain men,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet do I hold it very stuff o' the conscience</div>
                              <div class="line">To do no contrived murder: I lack iniquity</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometimes to do me service: nine or ten times</div>
                              <div class="line">I had thought to have yerk'd him here under the ribs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis better as it is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but he prated,</div>
                              <div class="line">And spoke such scurvy and provoking terms</div>
                              <div class="line">Against your honour</div>
                              <div class="line">That, with the little godliness I have,</div>
                              <div class="line">I did full hard forbear him. But, I pray you, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you fast married? Be assured of this,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the magnifico is much beloved,</div>
                              <div class="line">And hath in his effect a voice potential</div>
                              <div class="line">As double as the duke's: he will divorce you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or put upon you what restraint and grievance</div>
                              <div class="line">The law, with all his might to enforce it on,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will give him cable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him do his spite:</div>
                              <div class="line">My services which I have done the signiory</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall out-tongue his complaints. 'Tis yet to know,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, when I know that boasting is an honour,</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall promulgate--I fetch my life and being</div>
                              <div class="line">From men of royal siege, and my demerits</div>
                              <div class="line">May speak unbonneted to as proud a fortune</div>
                              <div class="line">As this that I have reach'd: for know, Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I love the gentle Desdemona,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not my unhoused free condition</div>
                              <div class="line">Put into circumscription and confine</div>
                              <div class="line">For the sea's worth. But, look! what lights come yond?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Those are the raised father and his friends:</div>
                              <div class="line">You were best go in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I I must be found:</div>
                              <div class="line">My parts, my title and my perfect soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall manifest me rightly. Is it they?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">By Janus, I think no.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSIO, and certain Officers with torches</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The servants of the duke, and my lieutenant.</div>
                              <div class="line">The goodness of the night upon you, friends!</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the news?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke does greet you, general,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he requires your haste-post-haste appearance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even on the instant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter, think you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Something from Cyprus as I may divine:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a business of some heat: the galleys</div>
                              <div class="line">Have sent a dozen sequent messengers</div>
                              <div class="line">This very night at one another's heels,</div>
                              <div class="line">And many of the consuls, raised and met,</div>
                              <div class="line">Are at the duke's already: you have been</div>
                              <div class="line">hotly call'd for;</div>
                              <div class="line">When, being not at your lodging to be found,</div>
                              <div class="line">The senate hath sent about three several guests</div>
                              <div class="line">To search you out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well I am found by you.</div>
                              <div class="line">I will but spend a word here in the house,</div>
                              <div class="line">And go with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ancient, what makes he here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, he to-night hath boarded a land carack:</div>
                              <div class="line">If it prove lawful prize, he's made for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not understand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">He's married.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To who?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter OTHELLO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, to--Come, captain, will you go?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Have with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes another troop to seek for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is Brabantio. General, be advised;</div>
                              <div class="line">He comes to bad intent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BRABANTIO, RODERIGO, and Officers with
torches and weapons</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Holla! stand there!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior, it is the Moor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Down with him, thief!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They draw on both sides</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You, Roderigo! come, sir, I am for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep up your bright swords, for the dew will rust them.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good signior, you shall more command with years</div>
                              <div class="line">Than with your weapons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O thou foul thief, where hast thou stow'd my daughter?</div>
                              <div class="line">Damn'd as thou art, thou hast enchanted her;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I'll refer me to all things of sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">If she in chains of magic were not bound,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whether a maid so tender, fair and happy,</div>
                              <div class="line">So opposite to marriage that she shunned</div>
                              <div class="line">The wealthy curled darlings of our nation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would ever have, to incur a general mock,</div>
                              <div class="line">Run from her guardage to the sooty bosom</div>
                              <div class="line">Of such a thing as thou, to fear, not to delight.</div>
                              <div class="line">Judge me the world, if 'tis not gross in sense</div>
                              <div class="line">That thou hast practised on her with foul charms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Abused her delicate youth with drugs or minerals</div>
                              <div class="line">That weaken motion: I'll have't disputed on;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis probable and palpable to thinking.</div>
                              <div class="line">I therefore apprehend and do attach thee</div>
                              <div class="line">For an abuser of the world, a practiser</div>
                              <div class="line">Of arts inhibited and out of warrant.</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay hold upon him: if he do resist,</div>
                              <div class="line">Subdue him at his peril.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold your hands,</div>
                              <div class="line">Both you of my inclining, and the rest:</div>
                              <div class="line">Were it my cue to fight, I should have known it</div>
                              <div class="line">Without a prompter. Where will you that I go</div>
                              <div class="line">To answer this your charge?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To prison, till fit time</div>
                              <div class="line">Of law and course of direct session</div>
                              <div class="line">Call thee to answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What if I do obey?</div>
                              <div class="line">How may the duke be therewith satisfied,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose messengers are here about my side,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon some present business of the state</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring me to him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true, most worthy signior;</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke's in council and your noble self,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure, is sent for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">How! the duke in council!</div>
                              <div class="line">In this time of the night! Bring him away:</div>
                              <div class="line">Mine's not an idle cause: the duke himself,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or any of my brothers of the state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot but feel this wrong as 'twere their own;</div>
                              <div class="line">For if such actions may have passage free,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bond-slaves and pagans shall our statesmen be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.3.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A council-chamber.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>The DUKE and Senators sitting at a table; Officers
attending</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no composition in these news</div>
                              <div class="line">That gives them credit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, they are disproportion'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">My letters say a hundred and seven galleys.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">And mine, a hundred and forty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">And mine, two hundred:</div>
                              <div class="line">But though they jump not on a just account,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As in these cases, where the aim reports,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis oft with difference--yet do they all confirm</div>
                              <div class="line">A Turkish fleet, and bearing up to Cyprus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is possible enough to judgment:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not so secure me in the error,</div>
                              <div class="line">But the main article I do approve</div>
                              <div class="line">In fearful sense.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What, ho! what, ho! what, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">A messenger from the galleys.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Sailor</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, what's the business?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Sailor</div>
                              <div class="line">The Turkish preparation makes for Rhodes;</div>
                              <div class="line">So was I bid report here to the state</div>
                              <div class="line">By Signior Angelo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">How say you by this change?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">This cannot be,</div>
                              <div class="line">By no assay of reason: 'tis a pageant,</div>
                              <div class="line">To keep us in false gaze. When we consider</div>
                              <div class="line">The importancy of Cyprus to the Turk,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let ourselves again but understand,</div>
                              <div class="line">That as it more concerns the Turk than Rhodes,</div>
                              <div class="line">So may he with more facile question bear it,</div>
                              <div class="line">For that it stands not in such warlike brace,</div>
                              <div class="line">But altogether lacks the abilities</div>
                              <div class="line">That Rhodes is dress'd in: if we make thought of this,</div>
                              <div class="line">We must not think the Turk is so unskilful</div>
                              <div class="line">To leave that latest which concerns him first,</div>
                              <div class="line">Neglecting an attempt of ease and gain,</div>
                              <div class="line">To wake and wage a danger profitless.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, in all confidence, he's not for Rhodes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Officer</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is more news.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a Messenger</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">The Ottomites, reverend and gracious,</div>
                              <div class="line">Steering with due course towards the isle of Rhodes,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have there injointed them with an after fleet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, so I thought. How many, as you guess?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Messenger</div>
                              <div class="line">Of thirty sail: and now they do restem</div>
                              <div class="line">Their backward course, bearing with frank appearance</div>
                              <div class="line">Their purposes toward Cyprus. Signior Montano,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your trusty and most valiant servitor,</div>
                              <div class="line">With his free duty recommends you thus,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prays you to believe him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis certain, then, for Cyprus.</div>
                              <div class="line">Marcus Luccicos, is not he in town?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">He's now in Florence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Write from us to him; post-post-haste dispatch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Brabantio and the valiant Moor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BRABANTIO, OTHELLO, IAGO, RODERIGO, and Officers</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Valiant Othello, we must straight employ you</div>
                              <div class="line">Against the general enemy Ottoman.</div>
                              <p>To BRABANTIO</p>
                              <div class="line">I did not see you; welcome, gentle signior;</div>
                              <div class="line">We lack'd your counsel and your help tonight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">So did I yours. Good your grace, pardon me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Neither my place nor aught I heard of business</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath raised me from my bed, nor doth the general care</div>
                              <div class="line">Take hold on me, for my particular grief</div>
                              <div class="line">Is of so flood-gate and o'erbearing nature</div>
                              <div class="line">That it engluts and swallows other sorrows</div>
                              <div class="line">And it is still itself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter! O, my daughter!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, to me;</div>
                              <div class="line">She is abused, stol'n from me, and corrupted</div>
                              <div class="line">By spells and medicines bought of mountebanks;</div>
                              <div class="line">For nature so preposterously to err,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being not deficient, blind, or lame of sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sans witchcraft could not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Whoe'er he be that in this foul proceeding</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath thus beguiled your daughter of herself</div>
                              <div class="line">And you of her, the bloody book of law</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall yourself read in the bitter letter</div>
                              <div class="line">After your own sense, yea, though our proper son</div>
                              <div class="line">Stood in your action.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Humbly I thank your grace.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is the man, this Moor, whom now, it seems,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your special mandate for the state-affairs</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath hither brought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="speaker">Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">We are very sorry for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To OTHELLO</span>  What, in your own part, can you say to this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing, but this is so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most potent, grave, and reverend signiors,</div>
                              <div class="line">My very noble and approved good masters,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have ta'en away this old man's daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">It is most true; true, I have married her:</div>
                              <div class="line">The very head and front of my offending</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath this extent, no more. Rude am I in my speech,</div>
                              <div class="line">And little bless'd with the soft phrase of peace:</div>
                              <div class="line">For since these arms of mine had seven years' pith,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till now some nine moons wasted, they have used</div>
                              <div class="line">Their dearest action in the tented field,</div>
                              <div class="line">And little of this great world can I speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">More than pertains to feats of broil and battle,</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore little shall I grace my cause</div>
                              <div class="line">In speaking for myself. Yet, by your gracious patience,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will a round unvarnish'd tale deliver</div>
                              <div class="line">Of my whole course of love; what drugs, what charms,</div>
                              <div class="line">What conjuration and what mighty magic,</div>
                              <div class="line">For such proceeding I am charged withal,</div>
                              <div class="line">I won his daughter.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A maiden never bold;</div>
                              <div class="line">Of spirit so still and quiet, that her motion</div>
                              <div class="line">Blush'd at herself; and she, in spite of nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of years, of country, credit, every thing,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fall in love with what she fear'd to look on!</div>
                              <div class="line">It is a judgment maim'd and most imperfect</div>
                              <div class="line">That will confess perfection so could err</div>
                              <div class="line">Against all rules of nature, and must be driven</div>
                              <div class="line">To find out practises of cunning hell,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why this should be. I therefore vouch again</div>
                              <div class="line">That with some mixtures powerful o'er the blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or with some dram conjured to this effect,</div>
                              <div class="line">He wrought upon her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">To vouch this, is no proof,</div>
                              <div class="line">Without more wider and more overt test</div>
                              <div class="line">Than these thin habits and poor likelihoods</div>
                              <div class="line">Of modern seeming do prefer against him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">But, Othello, speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you by indirect and forced courses</div>
                              <div class="line">Subdue and poison this young maid's affections?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or came it by request and such fair question</div>
                              <div class="line">As soul to soul affordeth?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Send for the lady to the Sagittary,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let her speak of me before her father:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you do find me foul in her report,</div>
                              <div class="line">The trust, the office I do hold of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not only take away, but let your sentence</div>
                              <div class="line">Even fall upon my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Fetch Desdemona hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ancient, conduct them: you best know the place.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt IAGO and Attendants</p>
                              <div class="line">And, till she come, as truly as to heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">I do confess the vices of my blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">So justly to your grave ears I'll present</div>
                              <div class="line">How I did thrive in this fair lady's love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And she in mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Say it, Othello.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Her father loved me; oft invited me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Still question'd me the story of my life,</div>
                              <div class="line">From year to year, the battles, sieges, fortunes,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have passed.</div>
                              <div class="line">I ran it through, even from my boyish days,</div>
                              <div class="line">To the very moment that he bade me tell it;</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein I spake of most disastrous chances,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of moving accidents by flood and field</div>
                              <div class="line">Of hair-breadth scapes i' the imminent deadly breach,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of being taken by the insolent foe</div>
                              <div class="line">And sold to slavery, of my redemption thence</div>
                              <div class="line">And portance in my travels' history:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein of antres vast and deserts idle,</div>
                              <div class="line">Rough quarries, rocks and hills whose heads touch heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">It was my hint to speak,--such was the process;</div>
                              <div class="line">And of the Cannibals that each other eat,</div>
                              <div class="line">The Anthropophagi and men whose heads</div>
                              <div class="line">Do grow beneath their shoulders. This to hear</div>
                              <div class="line">Would Desdemona seriously incline:</div>
                              <div class="line">But still the house-affairs would draw her thence:</div>
                              <div class="line">Which ever as she could with haste dispatch,</div>
                              <div class="line">She'ld come again, and with a greedy ear</div>
                              <div class="line">Devour up my discourse: which I observing,</div>
                              <div class="line">Took once a pliant hour, and found good means</div>
                              <div class="line">To draw from her a prayer of earnest heart</div>
                              <div class="line">That I would all my pilgrimage dilate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof by parcels she had something heard,</div>
                              <div class="line">But not intentively: I did consent,</div>
                              <div class="line">And often did beguile her of her tears,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I did speak of some distressful stroke</div>
                              <div class="line">That my youth suffer'd. My story being done,</div>
                              <div class="line">She gave me for my pains a world of sighs:</div>
                              <div class="line">She swore, in faith, twas strange, 'twas passing strange,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas pitiful, 'twas wondrous pitiful:</div>
                              <div class="line">She wish'd she had not heard it, yet she wish'd</div>
                              <div class="line">That heaven had made her such a man: she thank'd me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bade me, if I had a friend that loved her,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should but teach him how to tell my story.</div>
                              <div class="line">And that would woo her. Upon this hint I spake:</div>
                              <div class="line">She loved me for the dangers I had pass'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I loved her that she did pity them.</div>
                              <div class="line">This only is the witchcraft I have used:</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes the lady; let her witness it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DESDEMONA, IAGO, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">I think this tale would win my daughter too.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Brabantio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Take up this mangled matter at the best:</div>
                              <div class="line">Men do their broken weapons rather use</div>
                              <div class="line">Than their bare hands.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, hear her speak:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she confess that she was half the wooer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Destruction on my head, if my bad blame</div>
                              <div class="line">Light on the man! Come hither, gentle mistress:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you perceive in all this noble company</div>
                              <div class="line">Where most you owe obedience?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My noble father,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do perceive here a divided duty:</div>
                              <div class="line">To you I am bound for life and education;</div>
                              <div class="line">My life and education both do learn me</div>
                              <div class="line">How to respect you; you are the lord of duty;</div>
                              <div class="line">I am hitherto your daughter: but here's my husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so much duty as my mother show'd</div>
                              <div class="line">To you, preferring you before her father,</div>
                              <div class="line">So much I challenge that I may profess</div>
                              <div class="line">Due to the Moor my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">God be wi' you! I have done.</div>
                              <div class="line">Please it your grace, on to the state-affairs:</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather to adopt a child than get it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come hither, Moor:</div>
                              <div class="line">I here do give thee that with all my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, but thou hast already, with all my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">I would keep from thee. For your sake, jewel,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad at soul I have no other child:</div>
                              <div class="line">For thy escape would teach me tyranny,</div>
                              <div class="line">To hang clogs on them. I have done, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me speak like yourself, and lay a sentence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which, as a grise or step, may help these lovers</div>
                              <div class="line">Into your favour.</div>
                              <div class="line">When remedies are past, the griefs are ended</div>
                              <div class="line">By seeing the worst, which late on hopes depended.</div>
                              <div class="line">To mourn a mischief that is past and gone</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the next way to draw new mischief on.</div>
                              <div class="line">What cannot be preserved when fortune takes</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience her injury a mockery makes.</div>
                              <div class="line">The robb'd that smiles steals something from the thief;</div>
                              <div class="line">He robs himself that spends a bootless grief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">So let the Turk of Cyprus us beguile;</div>
                              <div class="line">We lose it not, so long as we can smile.</div>
                              <div class="line">He bears the sentence well that nothing bears</div>
                              <div class="line">But the free comfort which from thence he hears,</div>
                              <div class="line">But he bears both the sentence and the sorrow</div>
                              <div class="line">That, to pay grief, must of poor patience borrow.</div>
                              <div class="line">These sentences, to sugar, or to gall,</div>
                              <div class="line">Being strong on both sides, are equivocal:</div>
                              <div class="line">But words are words; I never yet did hear</div>
                              <div class="line">That the bruised heart was pierced through the ear.</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly beseech you, proceed to the affairs of state.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">The Turk with a most mighty preparation makes for</div>
                              <div class="line">Cyprus. Othello, the fortitude of the place is best</div>
                              <div class="line">known to you; and though we have there a substitute</div>
                              <div class="line">of most allowed sufficiency, yet opinion, a</div>
                              <div class="line">sovereign mistress of effects, throws a more safer</div>
                              <div class="line">voice on you: you must therefore be content to</div>
                              <div class="line">slubber the gloss of your new fortunes with this</div>
                              <div class="line">more stubborn and boisterous expedition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The tyrant custom, most grave senators,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath made the flinty and steel couch of war</div>
                              <div class="line">My thrice-driven bed of down: I do agnise</div>
                              <div class="line">A natural and prompt alacrity</div>
                              <div class="line">I find in hardness, and do undertake</div>
                              <div class="line">These present wars against the Ottomites.</div>
                              <div class="line">Most humbly therefore bending to your state,</div>
                              <div class="line">I crave fit disposition for my wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">Due reference of place and exhibition,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such accommodation and besort</div>
                              <div class="line">As levels with her breeding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">If you please,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be't at her father's.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not have it so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I; I would not there reside,</div>
                              <div class="line">To put my father in impatient thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">By being in his eye. Most gracious duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">To my unfolding lend your prosperous ear;</div>
                              <div class="line">And let me find a charter in your voice,</div>
                              <div class="line">To assist my simpleness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">What would You, Desdemona?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">That I did love the Moor to live with him,</div>
                              <div class="line">My downright violence and storm of fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">May trumpet to the world: my heart's subdued</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to the very quality of my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw Othello's visage in his mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to his honour and his valiant parts</div>
                              <div class="line">Did I my soul and fortunes consecrate.</div>
                              <div class="line">So that, dear lords, if I be left behind,</div>
                              <div class="line">A moth of peace, and he go to the war,</div>
                              <div class="line">The rites for which I love him are bereft me,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I a heavy interim shall support</div>
                              <div class="line">By his dear absence. Let me go with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let her have your voices.</div>
                              <div class="line">Vouch with me, heaven, I therefore beg it not,</div>
                              <div class="line">To please the palate of my appetite,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor to comply with heat--the young affects</div>
                              <div class="line">In me defunct--and proper satisfaction.</div>
                              <div class="line">But to be free and bounteous to her mind:</div>
                              <div class="line">And heaven defend your good souls, that you think</div>
                              <div class="line">I will your serious and great business scant</div>
                              <div class="line">For she is with me: no, when light-wing'd toys</div>
                              <div class="line">Of feather'd Cupid seal with wanton dullness</div>
                              <div class="line">My speculative and officed instruments,</div>
                              <div class="line">That my disports corrupt and taint my business,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let housewives make a skillet of my helm,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all indign and base adversities</div>
                              <div class="line">Make head against my estimation!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Be it as you shall privately determine,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either for her stay or going: the affair cries haste,</div>
                              <div class="line">And speed must answer it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">You must away to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">At nine i' the morning here we'll meet again.</div>
                              <div class="line">Othello, leave some officer behind,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he shall our commission bring to you;</div>
                              <div class="line">With such things else of quality and respect</div>
                              <div class="line">As doth import you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">So please your grace, my ancient;</div>
                              <div class="line">A man he is of honest and trust:</div>
                              <div class="line">To his conveyance I assign my wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">With what else needful your good grace shall think</div>
                              <div class="line">To be sent after me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DUKE OF VENICE</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it be so.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night to every one.</div>
                              <p>To BRABANTIO</p>
                              <div class="line">And, noble signior,</div>
                              <div class="line">If virtue no delighted beauty lack,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your son-in-law is far more fair than black.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Senator</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu, brave Moor, use Desdemona well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BRABANTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to her, Moor, if thou hast eyes to see:</div>
                              <div class="line">She has deceived her father, and may thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DUKE OF VENICE, Senators, Officers, &c</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">My life upon her faith! Honest Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">My Desdemona must I leave to thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, let thy wife attend on her:</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring them after in the best advantage.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Desdemona: I have but an hour</div>
                              <div class="line">Of love, of worldly matters and direction,</div>
                              <div class="line">To spend with thee: we must obey the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OTHELLO and DESDEMONA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What say'st thou, noble heart?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What will I do, thinkest thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, go to bed, and sleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will incontinently drown myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou dost, I shall never love thee after. Why,</div>
                              <div class="line">thou silly gentleman!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is silliness to live when to live is torment; and</div>
                              <div class="line">then have we a prescription to die when death is our physician.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O villainous! I have looked upon the world for four</div>
                              <div class="line">times seven years; and since I could distinguish</div>
                              <div class="line">betwixt a benefit and an injury, I never found man</div>
                              <div class="line">that knew how to love himself. Ere I would say, I</div>
                              <div class="line">would drown myself for the love of a guinea-hen, I</div>
                              <div class="line">would change my humanity with a baboon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What should I do? I confess it is my shame to be so</div>
                              <div class="line">fond; but it is not in my virtue to amend it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Virtue! a fig! 'tis in ourselves that we are thus</div>
                              <div class="line">or thus. Our bodies are our gardens, to the which</div>
                              <div class="line">our wills are gardeners: so that if we will plant</div>
                              <div class="line">nettles, or sow lettuce, set hyssop and weed up</div>
                              <div class="line">thyme, supply it with one gender of herbs, or</div>
                              <div class="line">distract it with many, either to have it sterile</div>
                              <div class="line">with idleness, or manured with industry, why, the</div>
                              <div class="line">power and corrigible authority of this lies in our</div>
                              <div class="line">wills. If the balance of our lives had not one</div>
                              <div class="line">scale of reason to poise another of sensuality, the</div>
                              <div class="line">blood and baseness of our natures would conduct us</div>
                              <div class="line">to most preposterous conclusions: but we have</div>
                              <div class="line">reason to cool our raging motions, our carnal</div>
                              <div class="line">stings, our unbitted lusts, whereof I take this that</div>
                              <div class="line">you call love to be a sect or scion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It cannot be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is merely a lust of the blood and a permission of</div>
                              <div class="line">the will. Come, be a man. Drown thyself! drown</div>
                              <div class="line">cats and blind puppies. I have professed me thy</div>
                              <div class="line">friend and I confess me knit to thy deserving with</div>
                              <div class="line">cables of perdurable toughness; I could never</div>
                              <div class="line">better stead thee than now. Put money in thy</div>
                              <div class="line">purse; follow thou the wars; defeat thy favour with</div>
                              <div class="line">an usurped beard; I say, put money in thy purse. It</div>
                              <div class="line">cannot be that Desdemona should long continue her</div>
