                              <div class="line">love to the Moor,-- put money in thy purse,--nor he</div>
                              <div class="line">his to her: it was a violent commencement, and thou</div>
                              <div class="line">shalt see an answerable sequestration:--put but</div>
                              <div class="line">money in thy purse. These Moors are changeable in</div>
                              <div class="line">their wills: fill thy purse with money:--the food</div>
                              <div class="line">that to him now is as luscious as locusts, shall be</div>
                              <div class="line">to him shortly as bitter as coloquintida. She must</div>
                              <div class="line">change for youth: when she is sated with his body,</div>
                              <div class="line">she will find the error of her choice: she must</div>
                              <div class="line">have change, she must: therefore put money in thy</div>
                              <div class="line">purse. If thou wilt needs damn thyself, do it a</div>
                              <div class="line">more delicate way than drowning. Make all the money</div>
                              <div class="line">thou canst: if sanctimony and a frail vow betwixt</div>
                              <div class="line">an erring barbarian and a supersubtle Venetian not</div>
                              <div class="line">too hard for my wits and all the tribe of hell, thou</div>
                              <div class="line">shalt enjoy her; therefore make money. A pox of</div>
                              <div class="line">drowning thyself! it is clean out of the way: seek</div>
                              <div class="line">thou rather to be hanged in compassing thy joy than</div>
                              <div class="line">to be drowned and go without her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Wilt thou be fast to my hopes, if I depend on</div>
                              <div class="line">the issue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art sure of me:--go, make money:--I have told</div>
                              <div class="line">thee often, and I re-tell thee again and again, I</div>
                              <div class="line">hate the Moor: my cause is hearted; thine hath no</div>
                              <div class="line">less reason. Let us be conjunctive in our revenge</div>
                              <div class="line">against him: if thou canst cuckold him, thou dost</div>
                              <div class="line">thyself a pleasure, me a sport. There are many</div>
                              <div class="line">events in the womb of time which will be delivered.</div>
                              <div class="line">Traverse! go, provide thy money. We will have more</div>
                              <div class="line">of this to-morrow. Adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where shall we meet i' the morning?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">At my lodging.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll be with thee betimes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; farewell. Do you hear, Roderigo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">No more of drowning, do you hear?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am changed: I'll go sell all my land.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus do I ever make my fool my purse:</div>
                              <div class="line">For I mine own gain'd knowledge should profane,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I would time expend with such a snipe.</div>
                              <div class="line">But for my sport and profit. I hate the Moor:</div>
                              <div class="line">And it is thought abroad, that 'twixt my sheets</div>
                              <div class="line">He has done my office: I know not if't be true;</div>
                              <div class="line">But I, for mere suspicion in that kind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will do as if for surety. He holds me well;</div>
                              <div class="line">The better shall my purpose work on him.</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio's a proper man: let me see now:</div>
                              <div class="line">To get his place and to plume up my will</div>
                              <div class="line">In double knavery--How, how? Let's see:--</div>
                              <div class="line">After some time, to abuse Othello's ear</div>
                              <div class="line">That he is too familiar with his wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath a person and a smooth dispose</div>
                              <div class="line">To be suspected, framed to make women false.</div>
                              <div class="line">The Moor is of a free and open nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thinks men honest that but seem to be so,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will as tenderly be led by the nose</div>
                              <div class="line">As asses are.</div>
                              <div class="line">I have't. It is engender'd. Hell and night</div>
                              <div class="line">Must bring this monstrous birth to the world's light.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.4">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 2. ACT II</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.2">1. SCENE I.  A Sea-port in Cyprus. An open place near the quay.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.3">2. SCENE II.  A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.4.4">3. SCENE III.  A hall in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  A Sea-port in Cyprus. An open place near the quay.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter MONTANO and two Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What from the cape can you discern at sea?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing at all: it is a highwrought flood;</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot, 'twixt the heaven and the main,</div>
                              <div class="line">Descry a sail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks the wind hath spoke aloud at land;</div>
                              <div class="line">A fuller blast ne'er shook our battlements:</div>
                              <div class="line">If it hath ruffian'd so upon the sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">What ribs of oak, when mountains melt on them,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can hold the mortise? What shall we hear of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">A segregation of the Turkish fleet:</div>
                              <div class="line">For do but stand upon the foaming shore,</div>
                              <div class="line">The chidden billow seems to pelt the clouds;</div>
                              <div class="line">The wind-shaked surge, with high and monstrous mane,</div>
                              <div class="line">seems to cast water on the burning bear,</div>
                              <div class="line">And quench the guards of the ever-fixed pole:</div>
                              <div class="line">I never did like molestation view</div>
                              <div class="line">On the enchafed flood.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the Turkish fleet</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not enshelter'd and embay'd, they are drown'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">It is impossible they bear it out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter a third Gentleman</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">News, lads! our wars are done.</div>
                              <div class="line">The desperate tempest hath so bang'd the Turks,</div>
                              <div class="line">That their designment halts: a noble ship of Venice</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath seen a grievous wreck and sufferance</div>
                              <div class="line">On most part of their fleet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">How! is this true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">The ship is here put in,</div>
                              <div class="line">A Veronesa; Michael Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lieutenant to the warlike Moor Othello,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is come on shore: the Moor himself at sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">And is in full commission here for Cyprus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad on't; 'tis a worthy governor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">But this same Cassio, though he speak of comfort</div>
                              <div class="line">Touching the Turkish loss, yet he looks sadly,</div>
                              <div class="line">And prays the Moor be safe; for they were parted</div>
                              <div class="line">With foul and violent tempest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heavens he be;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I have served him, and the man commands</div>
                              <div class="line">Like a full soldier. Let's to the seaside, ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">As well to see the vessel that's come in</div>
                              <div class="line">As to throw out our eyes for brave Othello,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even till we make the main and the aerial blue</div>
                              <div class="line">An indistinct regard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Third Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let's do so:</div>
                              <div class="line">For every minute is expectancy</div>
                              <div class="line">Of more arrivance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thanks, you the valiant of this warlike isle,</div>
                              <div class="line">That so approve the Moor! O, let the heavens</div>
                              <div class="line">Give him defence against the elements,</div>
                              <div class="line">For I have lost us him on a dangerous sea.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he well shipp'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">His bark is stoutly timber'd, his pilot</div>
                              <div class="line">Of very expert and approved allowance;</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore my hopes, not surfeited to death,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand in bold cure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>A cry within 'A sail, a sail, a sail!'</p>
                        <p>Enter a fourth Gentleman</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What noise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Fourth Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">The town is empty; on the brow o' the sea</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand ranks of people, and they cry 'A sail!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My hopes do shape him for the governor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Guns heard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentlemen</div>
                              <div class="line">They do discharge their shot of courtesy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our friends at least.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, sir, go forth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give us truth who 'tis that is arrived.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">But, good lieutenant, is your general wived?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most fortunately: he hath achieved a maid</div>
                              <div class="line">That paragons description and wild fame;</div>
                              <div class="line">One that excels the quirks of blazoning pens,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in the essential vesture of creation</div>
                              <div class="line">Does tire the ingener.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter second Gentleman</p>
                              <div class="line">How now! who has put in?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis one Iago, ancient to the general.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Has had most favourable and happy speed:</div>
                              <div class="line">Tempests themselves, high seas, and howling winds,</div>
                              <div class="line">The gutter'd rocks and congregated sands--</div>
                              <div class="line">Traitors ensteep'd to clog the guiltless keel,--</div>
                              <div class="line">As having sense of beauty, do omit</div>
                              <div class="line">Their mortal natures, letting go safely by</div>
                              <div class="line">The divine Desdemona.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is she?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She that I spake of, our great captain's captain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Left in the conduct of the bold Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose footing here anticipates our thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">A se'nnight's speed. Great Jove, Othello guard,</div>
                              <div class="line">And swell his sail with thine own powerful breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he may bless this bay with his tall ship,</div>
                              <div class="line">Make love's quick pants in Desdemona's arms,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give renew'd fire to our extincted spirits</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring all Cyprus comfort!</div>
                              <p>Enter DESDEMONA, EMILIA, IAGO, RODERIGO, and
Attendants</p>
                              <div class="line">O, behold,</div>
                              <div class="line">The riches of the ship is come on shore!</div>
                              <div class="line">Ye men of Cyprus, let her have your knees.</div>
                              <div class="line">Hail to thee, lady! and the grace of heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">Before, behind thee, and on every hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Enwheel thee round!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, valiant Cassio.</div>
                              <div class="line">What tidings can you tell me of my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He is not yet arrived: nor know I aught</div>
                              <div class="line">But that he's well and will be shortly here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, but I fear--How lost you company?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The great contention of the sea and skies</div>
                              <div class="line">Parted our fellowship--But, hark! a sail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Within 'A sail, a sail!' Guns heard</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Second Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">They give their greeting to the citadel;</div>
                              <div class="line">This likewise is a friend.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">See for the news.</div>
                              <p>Exit Gentleman</p>
                              <div class="line">Good ancient, you are welcome.</div>
                              <p>To EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, mistress.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let it not gall your patience, good Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I extend my manners; 'tis my breeding</div>
                              <div class="line">That gives me this bold show of courtesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Kissing her</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, would she give you so much of her lips</div>
                              <div class="line">As of her tongue she oft bestows on me,</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll have enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, she has no speech.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">In faith, too much;</div>
                              <div class="line">I find it still, when I have list to sleep:</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, before your ladyship, I grant,</div>
                              <div class="line">She puts her tongue a little in her heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">And chides with thinking.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You have little cause to say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on, come on; you are pictures out of doors,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bells in your parlors, wild-cats in your kitchens,</div>
                              <div class="line">Saints m your injuries, devils being offended,</div>
                              <div class="line">Players in your housewifery, and housewives' in your beds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, fie upon thee, slanderer!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, it is true, or else I am a Turk:</div>
                              <div class="line">You rise to play and go to bed to work.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall not write my praise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, let me not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What wouldst thou write of me, if thou shouldst</div>
                              <div class="line">praise me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O gentle lady, do not put me to't;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am nothing, if not critical.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come on assay. There's one gone to the harbour?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not merry; but I do beguile</div>
                              <div class="line">The thing I am, by seeming otherwise.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, how wouldst thou praise me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am about it; but indeed my invention</div>
                              <div class="line">Comes from my pate as birdlime does from frize;</div>
                              <div class="line">It plucks out brains and all: but my Muse labours,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus she is deliver'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be fair and wise, fairness and wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">The one's for use, the other useth it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well praised! How if she be black and witty?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be black, and thereto have a wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">She'll find a white that shall her blackness fit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Worse and worse.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How if fair and foolish?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">She never yet was foolish that was fair;</div>
                              <div class="line">For even her folly help'd her to an heir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">These are old fond paradoxes to make fools laugh i'</div>
                              <div class="line">the alehouse. What miserable praise hast thou for</div>
                              <div class="line">her that's foul and foolish?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">There's none so foul and foolish thereunto,</div>
                              <div class="line">But does foul pranks which fair and wise ones do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O heavy ignorance! thou praisest the worst best.</div>
                              <div class="line">But what praise couldst thou bestow on a deserving</div>
                              <div class="line">woman indeed, one that, in the authority of her</div>
                              <div class="line">merit, did justly put on the vouch of very malice itself?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">She that was ever fair and never proud,</div>
                              <div class="line">Had tongue at will and yet was never loud,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never lack'd gold and yet went never gay,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fled from her wish and yet said 'Now I may,'</div>
                              <div class="line">She that being anger'd, her revenge being nigh,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bade her wrong stay and her displeasure fly,</div>
                              <div class="line">She that in wisdom never was so frail</div>
                              <div class="line">To change the cod's head for the salmon's tail;</div>
                              <div class="line">She that could think and ne'er disclose her mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">See suitors following and not look behind,</div>
                              <div class="line">She was a wight, if ever such wight were,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">To do what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">To suckle fools and chronicle small beer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O most lame and impotent conclusion! Do not learn</div>
                              <div class="line">of him, Emilia, though he be thy husband. How say</div>
                              <div class="line">you, Cassio? is he not a most profane and liberal</div>
                              <div class="line">counsellor?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He speaks home, madam: You may relish him more in</div>
                              <div class="line">the soldier than in the scholar.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  He takes her by the palm: ay, well said,</div>
                              <div class="line">whisper: with as little a web as this will I</div>
                              <div class="line">ensnare as great a fly as Cassio. Ay, smile upon</div>
                              <div class="line">her, do; I will gyve thee in thine own courtship.</div>
                              <div class="line">You say true; 'tis so, indeed: if such tricks as</div>
                              <div class="line">these strip you out of your lieutenantry, it had</div>
                              <div class="line">been better you had not kissed your three fingers so</div>
                              <div class="line">oft, which now again you are most apt to play the</div>
                              <div class="line">sir in. Very good; well kissed! an excellent</div>
                              <div class="line">courtesy! 'tis so, indeed. Yet again your fingers</div>
                              <div class="line">to your lips? would they were clyster-pipes for your sake!</div>
                              <p>Trumpet within</p>
                              <div class="line">The Moor! I know his trumpet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis truly so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's meet him and receive him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lo, where he comes!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O my fair warrior!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My dear Othello!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">It gives me wonder great as my content</div>
                              <div class="line">To see you here before me. O my soul's joy!</div>
                              <div class="line">If after every tempest come such calms,</div>
                              <div class="line">May the winds blow till they have waken'd death!</div>
                              <div class="line">And let the labouring bark climb hills of seas</div>
                              <div class="line">Olympus-high and duck again as low</div>
                              <div class="line">As hell's from heaven! If it were now to die,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere now to be most happy; for, I fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">My soul hath her content so absolute</div>
                              <div class="line">That not another comfort like to this</div>
                              <div class="line">Succeeds in unknown fate.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">The heavens forbid</div>
                              <div class="line">But that our loves and comforts should increase,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as our days do grow!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen to that, sweet powers!</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot speak enough of this content;</div>
                              <div class="line">It stops me here; it is too much of joy:</div>
                              <div class="line">And this, and this, the greatest discords be</div>
                              <p>Kissing her</p>
                              <div class="line">That e'er our hearts shall make!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  O, you are well tuned now!</div>
                              <div class="line">But I'll set down the pegs that make this music,</div>
                              <div class="line">As honest as I am.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, let us to the castle.</div>
                              <div class="line">News, friends; our wars are done, the Turks</div>
                              <div class="line">are drown'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">How does my old acquaintance of this isle?</div>
                              <div class="line">Honey, you shall be well desired in Cyprus;</div>
                              <div class="line">I have found great love amongst them. O my sweet,</div>
                              <div class="line">I prattle out of fashion, and I dote</div>
                              <div class="line">In mine own comforts. I prithee, good Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to the bay and disembark my coffers:</div>
                              <div class="line">Bring thou the master to the citadel;</div>
                              <div class="line">He is a good one, and his worthiness</div>
                              <div class="line">Does challenge much respect. Come, Desdemona,</div>
                              <div class="line">Once more, well met at Cyprus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OTHELLO, DESDEMONA, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do thou meet me presently at the harbour. Come</div>
                              <div class="line">hither. If thou be'st valiant,-- as, they say, base</div>
                              <div class="line">men being in love have then a nobility in their</div>
                              <div class="line">natures more than is native to them--list me. The</div>
                              <div class="line">lieutenant tonight watches on the court of</div>
                              <div class="line">guard:--first, I must tell thee this--Desdemona is</div>
                              <div class="line">directly in love with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">With him! why, 'tis not possible.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay thy finger thus, and let thy soul be instructed.</div>
                              <div class="line">Mark me with what violence she first loved the Moor,</div>
                              <div class="line">but for bragging and telling her fantastical lies:</div>
                              <div class="line">and will she love him still for prating? let not</div>
                              <div class="line">thy discreet heart think it. Her eye must be fed;</div>
                              <div class="line">and what delight shall she have to look on the</div>
                              <div class="line">devil? When the blood is made dull with the act of</div>
                              <div class="line">sport, there should be, again to inflame it and to</div>
                              <div class="line">give satiety a fresh appetite, loveliness in favour,</div>
                              <div class="line">sympathy in years, manners and beauties; all which</div>
                              <div class="line">the Moor is defective in: now, for want of these</div>
                              <div class="line">required conveniences, her delicate tenderness will</div>
                              <div class="line">find itself abused, begin to heave the gorge,</div>
                              <div class="line">disrelish and abhor the Moor; very nature will</div>
                              <div class="line">instruct her in it and compel her to some second</div>
                              <div class="line">choice. Now, sir, this granted,--as it is a most</div>
                              <div class="line">pregnant and unforced position--who stands so</div>
                              <div class="line">eminent in the degree of this fortune as Cassio</div>
                              <div class="line">does? a knave very voluble; no further</div>
                              <div class="line">conscionable than in putting on the mere form of</div>
                              <div class="line">civil and humane seeming, for the better compassing</div>
                              <div class="line">of his salt and most hidden loose affection? why,</div>
                              <div class="line">none; why, none: a slipper and subtle knave, a</div>
                              <div class="line">finder of occasions, that has an eye can stamp and</div>
                              <div class="line">counterfeit advantages, though true advantage never</div>
                              <div class="line">present itself; a devilish knave. Besides, the</div>
                              <div class="line">knave is handsome, young, and hath all those</div>
                              <div class="line">requisites in him that folly and green minds look</div>
                              <div class="line">after: a pestilent complete knave; and the woman</div>
                              <div class="line">hath found him already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot believe that in her; she's full of</div>
                              <div class="line">most blessed condition.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Blessed fig's-end! the wine she drinks is made of</div>
                              <div class="line">grapes: if she had been blessed, she would never</div>
                              <div class="line">have loved the Moor. Blessed pudding! Didst thou</div>
                              <div class="line">not see her paddle with the palm of his hand? didst</div>
                              <div class="line">not mark that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, that I did; but that was but courtesy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lechery, by this hand; an index and obscure prologue</div>
                              <div class="line">to the history of lust and foul thoughts. They met</div>
                              <div class="line">so near with their lips that their breaths embraced</div>
                              <div class="line">together. Villanous thoughts, Roderigo! when these</div>
                              <div class="line">mutualities so marshal the way, hard at hand comes</div>
                              <div class="line">the master and main exercise, the incorporate</div>
                              <div class="line">conclusion, Pish! But, sir, be you ruled by me: I</div>
                              <div class="line">have brought you from Venice. Watch you to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">for the command, I'll lay't upon you. Cassio knows</div>
                              <div class="line">you not. I'll not be far from you: do you find</div>
                              <div class="line">some occasion to anger Cassio, either by speaking</div>
                              <div class="line">too loud, or tainting his discipline; or from what</div>
                              <div class="line">other course you please, which the time shall more</div>
                              <div class="line">favourably minister.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, he is rash and very sudden in choler, and haply</div>
                              <div class="line">may strike at you: provoke him, that he may; for</div>
                              <div class="line">even out of that will I cause these of Cyprus to</div>
                              <div class="line">mutiny; whose qualification shall come into no true</div>
                              <div class="line">taste again but by the displanting of Cassio. So</div>
                              <div class="line">shall you have a shorter journey to your desires by</div>
                              <div class="line">the means I shall then have to prefer them; and the</div>
                              <div class="line">impediment most profitably removed, without the</div>
                              <div class="line">which there were no expectation of our prosperity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will do this, if I can bring it to any</div>
                              <div class="line">opportunity.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant thee. Meet me by and by at the citadel:</div>
                              <div class="line">I must fetch his necessaries ashore. Farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">That Cassio loves her, I do well believe it;</div>
                              <div class="line">That she loves him, 'tis apt and of great credit:</div>
                              <div class="line">The Moor, howbeit that I endure him not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is of a constant, loving, noble nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">And I dare think he'll prove to Desdemona</div>
                              <div class="line">A most dear husband. Now, I do love her too;</div>
                              <div class="line">Not out of absolute lust, though peradventure</div>
                              <div class="line">I stand accountant for as great a sin,</div>
                              <div class="line">But partly led to diet my revenge,</div>
                              <div class="line">For that I do suspect the lusty Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath leap'd into my seat; the thought whereof</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth, like a poisonous mineral, gnaw my inwards;</div>
                              <div class="line">And nothing can or shall content my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I am even'd with him, wife for wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or failing so, yet that I put the Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">At least into a jealousy so strong</div>
                              <div class="line">That judgment cannot cure. Which thing to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">If this poor trash of Venice, whom I trash</div>
                              <div class="line">For his quick hunting, stand the putting on,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have our Michael Cassio on the hip,</div>
                              <div class="line">Abuse him to the Moor in the rank garb--</div>
                              <div class="line">For I fear Cassio with my night-cap too--</div>
                              <div class="line">Make the Moor thank me, love me and reward me.</div>
                              <div class="line">For making him egregiously an ass</div>
                              <div class="line">And practising upon his peace and quiet</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to madness. 'Tis here, but yet confused:</div>
                              <div class="line">Knavery's plain face is never seen tin used.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter a Herald with a proclamation; People
following</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Herald</div>
                              <div class="line">It is Othello's pleasure, our noble and valiant</div>
                              <div class="line">general, that, upon certain tidings now arrived,</div>
                              <div class="line">importing the mere perdition of the Turkish fleet,</div>
                              <div class="line">every man put himself into triumph; some to dance,</div>
                              <div class="line">some to make bonfires, each man to what sport and</div>
                              <div class="line">revels his addiction leads him: for, besides these</div>
                              <div class="line">beneficial news, it is the celebration of his</div>
                              <div class="line">nuptial. So much was his pleasure should be</div>
                              <div class="line">proclaimed. All offices are open, and there is full</div>
                              <div class="line">liberty of feasting from this present hour of five</div>
                              <div class="line">till the bell have told eleven. Heaven bless the</div>
                              <div class="line">isle of Cyprus and our noble general Othello!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.4.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A hall in the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO, DESDEMONA, CASSIO, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Michael, look you to the guard to-night:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's teach ourselves that honourable stop,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to outsport discretion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago hath direction what to do;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, notwithstanding, with my personal eye</div>
                              <div class="line">Will I look to't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago is most honest.</div>
                              <div class="line">Michael, good night: to-morrow with your earliest</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me have speech with you.</div>
                              <p>To DESDEMONA</p>
                              <div class="line">Come, my dear love,</div>
                              <div class="line">The purchase made, the fruits are to ensue;</div>
                              <div class="line">That profit's yet to come 'tween me and you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OTHELLO, DESDEMONA, and Attendants</p>
                        <p>Enter IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, Iago; we must to the watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not this hour, lieutenant; 'tis not yet ten o' the</div>
                              <div class="line">clock. Our general cast us thus early for the love</div>
                              <div class="line">of his Desdemona; who let us not therefore blame:</div>
                              <div class="line">he hath not yet made wanton the night with her; and</div>
                              <div class="line">she is sport for Jove.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She's a most exquisite lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And, I'll warrant her, fun of game.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed, she's a most fresh and delicate creature.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What an eye she has! methinks it sounds a parley of</div>
                              <div class="line">provocation.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">An inviting eye; and yet methinks right modest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And when she speaks, is it not an alarum to love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She is indeed perfection.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, happiness to their sheets! Come, lieutenant, I</div>
                              <div class="line">have a stoup of wine; and here without are a brace</div>
                              <div class="line">of Cyprus gallants that would fain have a measure to</div>
                              <div class="line">the health of black Othello.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to-night, good Iago: I have very poor and</div>
                              <div class="line">unhappy brains for drinking: I could well wish</div>
                              <div class="line">courtesy would invent some other custom of</div>
                              <div class="line">entertainment.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, they are our friends; but one cup: I'll drink for</div>
                              <div class="line">you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have drunk but one cup to-night, and that was</div>
                              <div class="line">craftily qualified too, and, behold, what innovation</div>
                              <div class="line">it makes here: I am unfortunate in the infirmity,</div>
                              <div class="line">and dare not task my weakness with any more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, man! 'tis a night of revels: the gallants</div>
                              <div class="line">desire it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where are they?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here at the door; I pray you, call them in.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll do't; but it dislikes me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">If I can fasten but one cup upon him,</div>
                              <div class="line">With that which he hath drunk to-night already,</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll be as full of quarrel and offence</div>
                              <div class="line">As my young mistress' dog. Now, my sick fool Roderigo,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom love hath turn'd almost the wrong side out,</div>
                              <div class="line">To Desdemona hath to-night caroused</div>
                              <div class="line">Potations pottle-deep; and he's to watch:</div>
                              <div class="line">Three lads of Cyprus, noble swelling spirits,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hold their honours in a wary distance,</div>
                              <div class="line">The very elements of this warlike isle,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have I to-night fluster'd with flowing cups,</div>
                              <div class="line">And they watch too. Now, 'mongst this flock of drunkards,</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I to put our Cassio in some action</div>
                              <div class="line">That may offend the isle.--But here they come:</div>
                              <div class="line">If consequence do but approve my dream,</div>
                              <div class="line">My boat sails freely, both with wind and stream.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CASSIO; with him MONTANO and Gentlemen;
servants following with wine</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore God, they have given me a rouse already.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good faith, a little one; not past a pint, as I am</div>
                              <div class="line">a soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Some wine, ho!</div>
                              <p>Sings</p>
                              <div class="line">And let me the canakin clink, clink;</div>
                              <div class="line">And let me the canakin clink</div>
                              <div class="line">A soldier's a man;</div>
                              <div class="line">A life's but a span;</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, let a soldier drink.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some wine, boys!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Fore God, an excellent song.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I learned it in England, where, indeed, they are</div>
                              <div class="line">most potent in potting: your Dane, your German, and</div>
                              <div class="line">your swag-bellied Hollander--Drink, ho!--are nothing</div>
                              <div class="line">to your English.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is your Englishman so expert in his drinking?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, he drinks you, with facility, your Dane dead</div>
                              <div class="line">drunk; he sweats not to overthrow your Almain; he</div>
                              <div class="line">gives your Hollander a vomit, ere the next pottle</div>
                              <div class="line">can be filled.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To the health of our general!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am for it, lieutenant; and I'll do you justice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O sweet England!</div>
                              <div class="line">King Stephen was a worthy peer,</div>
                              <div class="line">His breeches cost him but a crown;</div>
                              <div class="line">He held them sixpence all too dear,</div>
                              <div class="line">With that he call'd the tailor lown.</div>
                              <div class="line">He was a wight of high renown,</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou art but of low degree:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis pride that pulls the country down;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then take thine auld cloak about thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">Some wine, ho!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
