                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is a more exquisite song than the other.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you hear't again?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No; for I hold him to be unworthy of his place that</div>
                              <div class="line">does those things. Well, God's above all; and there</div>
                              <div class="line">be souls must be saved, and there be souls must not be saved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It's true, good lieutenant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">For mine own part,--no offence to the general, nor</div>
                              <div class="line">any man of quality,--I hope to be saved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And so do I too, lieutenant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but, by your leave, not before me; the</div>
                              <div class="line">lieutenant is to be saved before the ancient. Let's</div>
                              <div class="line">have no more of this; let's to our affairs.--Forgive</div>
                              <div class="line">us our sins!--Gentlemen, let's look to our business.</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not think, gentlemen. I am drunk: this is my</div>
                              <div class="line">ancient; this is my right hand, and this is my left:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not drunk now; I can stand well enough, and</div>
                              <div class="line">speak well enough.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">All</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, very well then; you must not think then that I am drunk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">To the platform, masters; come, let's set the watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You see this fellow that is gone before;</div>
                              <div class="line">He is a soldier fit to stand by Caesar</div>
                              <div class="line">And give direction: and do but see his vice;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis to his virtue a just equinox,</div>
                              <div class="line">The one as long as the other: 'tis pity of him.</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear the trust Othello puts him in.</div>
                              <div class="line">On some odd time of his infirmity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will shake this island.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">But is he often thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis evermore the prologue to his sleep:</div>
                              <div class="line">He'll watch the horologe a double set,</div>
                              <div class="line">If drink rock not his cradle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">It were well</div>
                              <div class="line">The general were put in mind of it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Perhaps he sees it not; or his good nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Prizes the virtue that appears in Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">And looks not on his evils: is not this true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to him</span>  How now, Roderigo!</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, after the lieutenant; go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'tis great pity that the noble Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">Should hazard such a place as his own second</div>
                              <div class="line">With one of an ingraft infirmity:</div>
                              <div class="line">It were an honest action to say</div>
                              <div class="line">So to the Moor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not I, for this fair island:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do love Cassio well; and would do much</div>
                              <div class="line">To cure him of this evil--But, hark! what noise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Cry within: 'Help! help!'</p>
                        <p>Re-enter CASSIO, driving in RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You rogue! you rascal!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, lieutenant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A knave teach me my duty!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll beat the knave into a twiggen bottle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Beat me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou prate, rogue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Striking RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good lieutenant;</div>
                              <p>Staying him</p>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, sir, hold your hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me go, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I'll knock you o'er the mazzard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come,</div>
                              <div class="line">you're drunk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Drunk!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They fight</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside to RODERIGO</span>  Away, I say; go out, and cry a mutiny.</div>
                              <p>Exit RODERIGO</p>
                              <div class="line">Nay, good lieutenant,--alas, gentlemen;--</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, ho!--Lieutenant,--sir,--Montano,--sir;</div>
                              <div class="line">Help, masters!--Here's a goodly watch indeed!</div>
                              <p>Bell rings</p>
                              <div class="line">Who's that which rings the bell?--Diablo, ho!</div>
                              <div class="line">The town will rise: God's will, lieutenant, hold!</div>
                              <div class="line">You will be shamed for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter OTHELLO and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Zounds, I bleed still; I am hurt to the death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Faints</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, for your lives!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold, ho! Lieutenant,--sir--Montano,--gentlemen,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you forgot all sense of place and duty?</div>
                              <div class="line">Hold! the general speaks to you; hold, hold, for shame!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, ho! from whence ariseth this?</div>
                              <div class="line">Are we turn'd Turks, and to ourselves do that</div>
                              <div class="line">Which heaven hath forbid the Ottomites?</div>
                              <div class="line">For Christian shame, put by this barbarous brawl:</div>
                              <div class="line">He that stirs next to carve for his own rage</div>
                              <div class="line">Holds his soul light; he dies upon his motion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Silence that dreadful bell: it frights the isle</div>
                              <div class="line">From her propriety. What is the matter, masters?</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest Iago, that look'st dead with grieving,</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, who began this? on thy love, I charge thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not know: friends all but now, even now,</div>
                              <div class="line">In quarter, and in terms like bride and groom</div>
                              <div class="line">Devesting them for bed; and then, but now--</div>
                              <div class="line">As if some planet had unwitted men--</div>
                              <div class="line">Swords out, and tilting one at other's breast,</div>
                              <div class="line">In opposition bloody. I cannot speak</div>
                              <div class="line">Any beginning to this peevish odds;</div>
                              <div class="line">And would in action glorious I had lost</div>
                              <div class="line">Those legs that brought me to a part of it!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">How comes it, Michael, you are thus forgot?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, pardon me; I cannot speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy Montano, you were wont be civil;</div>
                              <div class="line">The gravity and stillness of your youth</div>
                              <div class="line">The world hath noted, and your name is great</div>
                              <div class="line">In mouths of wisest censure: what's the matter,</div>
                              <div class="line">That you unlace your reputation thus</div>
                              <div class="line">And spend your rich opinion for the name</div>
                              <div class="line">Of a night-brawler? give me answer to it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Worthy Othello, I am hurt to danger:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your officer, Iago, can inform you,--</div>
                              <div class="line">While I spare speech, which something now</div>
                              <div class="line">offends me,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Of all that I do know: nor know I aught</div>
                              <div class="line">By me that's said or done amiss this night;</div>
                              <div class="line">Unless self-charity be sometimes a vice,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to defend ourselves it be a sin</div>
                              <div class="line">When violence assails us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">My blood begins my safer guides to rule;</div>
                              <div class="line">And passion, having my best judgment collied,</div>
                              <div class="line">Assays to lead the way: if I once stir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or do but lift this arm, the best of you</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall sink in my rebuke. Give me to know</div>
                              <div class="line">How this foul rout began, who set it on;</div>
                              <div class="line">And he that is approved in this offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though he had twinn'd with me, both at a birth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall lose me. What! in a town of war,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet wild, the people's hearts brimful of fear,</div>
                              <div class="line">To manage private and domestic quarrel,</div>
                              <div class="line">In night, and on the court and guard of safety!</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis monstrous. Iago, who began't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">If partially affined, or leagued in office,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost deliver more or less than truth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art no soldier.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Touch me not so near:</div>
                              <div class="line">I had rather have this tongue cut from my mouth</div>
                              <div class="line">Than it should do offence to Michael Cassio;</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, I persuade myself, to speak the truth</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall nothing wrong him. Thus it is, general.</div>
                              <div class="line">Montano and myself being in speech,</div>
                              <div class="line">There comes a fellow crying out for help:</div>
                              <div class="line">And Cassio following him with determined sword,</div>
                              <div class="line">To execute upon him. Sir, this gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">Steps in to Cassio, and entreats his pause:</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself the crying fellow did pursue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest by his clamour--as it so fell out--</div>
                              <div class="line">The town might fall in fright: he, swift of foot,</div>
                              <div class="line">Outran my purpose; and I return'd the rather</div>
                              <div class="line">For that I heard the clink and fall of swords,</div>
                              <div class="line">And Cassio high in oath; which till to-night</div>
                              <div class="line">I ne'er might say before. When I came back--</div>
                              <div class="line">For this was brief--I found them close together,</div>
                              <div class="line">At blow and thrust; even as again they were</div>
                              <div class="line">When you yourself did part them.</div>
                              <div class="line">More of this matter cannot I report:</div>
                              <div class="line">But men are men; the best sometimes forget:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though Cassio did some little wrong to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">As men in rage strike those that wish them best,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet surely Cassio, I believe, received</div>
                              <div class="line">From him that fled some strange indignity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which patience could not pass.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know, Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy honesty and love doth mince this matter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Making it light to Cassio. Cassio, I love thee</div>
                              <div class="line">But never more be officer of mine.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter DESDEMONA, attended</p>
                              <div class="line">Look, if my gentle love be not raised up!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make thee an example.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">All's well now, sweeting; come away to bed.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, for your hurts, myself will be your surgeon:</div>
                              <div class="line">Lead him off.</div>
                              <p>To MONTANO, who is led off</p>
                              <div class="line">Iago, look with care about the town,</div>
                              <div class="line">And silence those whom this vile brawl distracted.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, Desdemona: 'tis the soldiers' life</div>
                              <div class="line">To have their balmy slumbers waked with strife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt all but IAGO and CASSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, are you hurt, lieutenant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, past all surgery.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, heaven forbid!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Reputation, reputation, reputation! O, I have lost</div>
                              <div class="line">my reputation! I have lost the immortal part of</div>
                              <div class="line">myself, and what remains is bestial. My reputation,</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago, my reputation!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">As I am an honest man, I thought you had received</div>
                              <div class="line">some bodily wound; there is more sense in that than</div>
                              <div class="line">in reputation. Reputation is an idle and most false</div>
                              <div class="line">imposition: oft got without merit, and lost without</div>
                              <div class="line">deserving: you have lost no reputation at all,</div>
                              <div class="line">unless you repute yourself such a loser. What, man!</div>
                              <div class="line">there are ways to recover the general again: you</div>
                              <div class="line">are but now cast in his mood, a punishment more in</div>
                              <div class="line">policy than in malice, even so as one would beat his</div>
                              <div class="line">offenceless dog to affright an imperious lion: sue</div>
                              <div class="line">to him again, and he's yours.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will rather sue to be despised than to deceive so</div>
                              <div class="line">good a commander with so slight, so drunken, and so</div>
                              <div class="line">indiscreet an officer. Drunk? and speak parrot?</div>
                              <div class="line">and squabble? swagger? swear? and discourse</div>
                              <div class="line">fustian with one's own shadow? O thou invisible</div>
                              <div class="line">spirit of wine, if thou hast no name to be known by,</div>
                              <div class="line">let us call thee devil!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What was he that you followed with your sword? What</div>
                              <div class="line">had he done to you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I remember a mass of things, but nothing distinctly;</div>
                              <div class="line">a quarrel, but nothing wherefore. O God, that men</div>
                              <div class="line">should put an enemy in their mouths to steal away</div>
                              <div class="line">their brains! that we should, with joy, pleasance</div>
                              <div class="line">revel and applause, transform ourselves into beasts!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, but you are now well enough: how came you thus</div>
                              <div class="line">recovered?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath pleased the devil drunkenness to give place</div>
                              <div class="line">to the devil wrath; one unperfectness shows me</div>
                              <div class="line">another, to make me frankly despise myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, you are too severe a moraler: as the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">the place, and the condition of this country</div>
                              <div class="line">stands, I could heartily wish this had not befallen;</div>
                              <div class="line">but, since it is as it is, mend it for your own good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will ask him for my place again; he shall tell me</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a drunkard! Had I as many mouths as Hydra,</div>
                              <div class="line">such an answer would stop them all. To be now a</div>
                              <div class="line">sensible man, by and by a fool, and presently a</div>
                              <div class="line">beast! O strange! Every inordinate cup is</div>
                              <div class="line">unblessed and the ingredient is a devil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, good wine is a good familiar creature,</div>
                              <div class="line">if it be well used: exclaim no more against it.</div>
                              <div class="line">And, good lieutenant, I think you think I love you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have well approved it, sir. I drunk!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You or any man living may be drunk! at a time, man.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tell you what you shall do. Our general's wife</div>
                              <div class="line">is now the general: may say so in this respect, for</div>
                              <div class="line">that he hath devoted and given up himself to the</div>
                              <div class="line">contemplation, mark, and denotement of her parts and</div>
                              <div class="line">graces: confess yourself freely to her; importune</div>
                              <div class="line">her help to put you in your place again: she is of</div>
                              <div class="line">so free, so kind, so apt, so blessed a disposition,</div>
                              <div class="line">she holds it a vice in her goodness not to do more</div>
                              <div class="line">than she is requested: this broken joint between</div>
                              <div class="line">you and her husband entreat her to splinter; and, my</div>
                              <div class="line">fortunes against any lay worth naming, this</div>
                              <div class="line">crack of your love shall grow stronger than it was before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You advise me well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I protest, in the sincerity of love and honest kindness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it freely; and betimes in the morning I will</div>
                              <div class="line">beseech the virtuous Desdemona to undertake for me:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am desperate of my fortunes if they cheque me here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are in the right. Good night, lieutenant; I</div>
                              <div class="line">must to the watch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night, honest Iago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And what's he then that says I play the villain?</div>
                              <div class="line">When this advice is free I give and honest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Probal to thinking and indeed the course</div>
                              <div class="line">To win the Moor again? For 'tis most easy</div>
                              <div class="line">The inclining Desdemona to subdue</div>
                              <div class="line">In any honest suit: she's framed as fruitful</div>
                              <div class="line">As the free elements. And then for her</div>
                              <div class="line">To win the Moor--were't to renounce his baptism,</div>
                              <div class="line">All seals and symbols of redeemed sin,</div>
                              <div class="line">His soul is so enfetter'd to her love,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she may make, unmake, do what she list,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even as her appetite shall play the god</div>
                              <div class="line">With his weak function. How am I then a villain</div>
                              <div class="line">To counsel Cassio to this parallel course,</div>
                              <div class="line">Directly to his good? Divinity of hell!</div>
                              <div class="line">When devils will the blackest sins put on,</div>
                              <div class="line">They do suggest at first with heavenly shows,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I do now: for whiles this honest fool</div>
                              <div class="line">Plies Desdemona to repair his fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">And she for him pleads strongly to the Moor,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll pour this pestilence into his ear,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she repeals him for her body's lust;</div>
                              <div class="line">And by how much she strives to do him good,</div>
                              <div class="line">She shall undo her credit with the Moor.</div>
                              <div class="line">So will I turn her virtue into pitch,</div>
                              <div class="line">And out of her own goodness make the net</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall enmesh them all.</div>
                              <p>Re-enter RODERIGO</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Roderigo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do follow here in the chase, not like a hound that</div>
                              <div class="line">hunts, but one that fills up the cry. My money is</div>
                              <div class="line">almost spent; I have been to-night exceedingly well</div>
                              <div class="line">cudgelled; and I think the issue will be, I shall</div>
                              <div class="line">have so much experience for my pains, and so, with</div>
                              <div class="line">no money at all and a little more wit, return again to Venice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How poor are they that have not patience!</div>
                              <div class="line">What wound did ever heal but by degrees?</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou know'st we work by wit, and not by witchcraft;</div>
                              <div class="line">And wit depends on dilatory time.</div>
                              <div class="line">Does't not go well? Cassio hath beaten thee.</div>
                              <div class="line">And thou, by that small hurt, hast cashier'd Cassio:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though other things grow fair against the sun,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet fruits that blossom first will first be ripe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Content thyself awhile. By the mass, 'tis morning;</div>
                              <div class="line">Pleasure and action make the hours seem short.</div>
                              <div class="line">Retire thee; go where thou art billeted:</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, I say; thou shalt know more hereafter:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, get thee gone.</div>
                              <p>Exit RODERIGO</p>
                              <div class="line">Two things are to be done:</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife must move for Cassio to her mistress;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll set her on;</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself the while to draw the Moor apart,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring him jump when he may Cassio find</div>
                              <div class="line">Soliciting his wife: ay, that's the way</div>
                              <div class="line">Dull not device by coldness and delay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 3. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.4">3. SCENE III.  The garden of the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.5.5">4. SCENE IV.  Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Before the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter CASSIO and some Musicians</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Masters, play here; I will content your pains;</div>
                              <div class="line">Something that's brief; and bid 'Good morrow, general.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Music</p>
                        <p>Enter Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Why masters, have your instruments been in Naples,</div>
                              <div class="line">that they speak i' the nose thus?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Musician</div>
                              <div class="line">How, sir, how!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Are these, I pray you, wind-instruments?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Musician</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, marry, are they, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">O, thereby hangs a tail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Musician</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereby hangs a tale, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry. sir, by many a wind-instrument that I know.</div>
                              <div class="line">But, masters, here's money for you: and the general</div>
                              <div class="line">so likes your music, that he desires you, for love's</div>
                              <div class="line">sake, to make no more noise with it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Musician</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, we will not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">If you have any music that may not be heard, to't</div>
                              <div class="line">again: but, as they say to hear music the general</div>
                              <div class="line">does not greatly care.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">First Musician</div>
                              <div class="line">We have none such, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">Then put up your pipes in your bag, for I'll away:</div>
                              <div class="line">go; vanish into air; away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt Musicians</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou hear, my honest friend?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">No, I hear not your honest friend; I hear you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, keep up thy quillets. There's a poor piece</div>
                              <div class="line">of gold for thee: if the gentlewoman that attends</div>
                              <div class="line">the general's wife be stirring, tell her there's</div>
                              <div class="line">one Cassio entreats her a little favour of speech:</div>
                              <div class="line">wilt thou do this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">She is stirring, sir: if she will stir hither, I</div>
                              <div class="line">shall seem to notify unto her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do, good my friend.</div>
                              <p>Exit Clown</p>
                              <p>Enter IAGO</p>
                              <div class="line">In happy time, Iago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You have not been a-bed, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, no; the day had broke</div>
                              <div class="line">Before we parted. I have made bold, Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">To send in to your wife: my suit to her</div>
                              <div class="line">Is, that she will to virtuous Desdemona</div>
                              <div class="line">Procure me some access.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send her to you presently;</div>
                              <div class="line">And I'll devise a mean to draw the Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of the way, that your converse and business</div>
                              <div class="line">May be more free.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly thank you for't.</div>
                              <p>Exit IAGO</p>
                              <div class="line">I never knew</div>
                              <div class="line">A Florentine more kind and honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, good Lieutenant: I am sorry</div>
                              <div class="line">For your displeasure; but all will sure be well.</div>
                              <div class="line">The general and his wife are talking of it;</div>
                              <div class="line">And she speaks for you stoutly: the Moor replies,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he you hurt is of great fame in Cyprus,</div>
                              <div class="line">And great affinity, and that in wholesome wisdom</div>
                              <div class="line">He might not but refuse you; but he protests he loves you</div>
                              <div class="line">And needs no other suitor but his likings</div>
                              <div class="line">To take the safest occasion by the front</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring you in again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, I beseech you,</div>
                              <div class="line">If you think fit, or that it may be done,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me advantage of some brief discourse</div>
                              <div class="line">With Desdemona alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, come in;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will bestow you where you shall have time</div>
                              <div class="line">To speak your bosom freely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am much bound to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO, IAGO, and Gentlemen</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">These letters give, Iago, to the pilot;</div>
                              <div class="line">And by him do my duties to the senate:</div>
                              <div class="line">That done, I will be walking on the works;</div>
                              <div class="line">Repair there to me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my good lord, I'll do't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">This fortification, gentlemen, shall we see't?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Gentleman</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll wait upon your lordship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  The garden of the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DESDEMONA, CASSIO, and EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thou assured, good Cassio, I will do</div>
                              <div class="line">All my abilities in thy behalf.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good madam, do: I warrant it grieves my husband,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if the case were his.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that's an honest fellow. Do not doubt, Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">But I will have my lord and you again</div>
                              <div class="line">As friendly as you were.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Bounteous madam,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whatever shall become of Michael Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">He's never any thing but your true servant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know't; I thank you. You do love my lord:</div>
                              <div class="line">You have known him long; and be you well assured</div>
                              <div class="line">He shall in strangeness stand no further off</div>
                              <div class="line">Than in a polite distance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but, lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">That policy may either last so long,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or feed upon such nice and waterish diet,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or breed itself so out of circumstance,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, I being absent and my place supplied,</div>
                              <div class="line">My general will forget my love and service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not doubt that; before Emilia here</div>
                              <div class="line">I give thee warrant of thy place: assure thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do vow a friendship, I'll perform it</div>
                              <div class="line">To the last article: my lord shall never rest;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll watch him tame and talk him out of patience;</div>
                              <div class="line">His bed shall seem a school, his board a shrift;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll intermingle every thing he does</div>
                              <div class="line">With Cassio's suit: therefore be merry, Cassio;</div>
                              <div class="line">For thy solicitor shall rather die</div>
                              <div class="line">Than give thy cause away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, here comes my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, I'll take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, stay, and hear me speak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, not now: I am very ill at ease,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unfit for mine own purposes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, do your discretion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit CASSIO</p>
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO and IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! I like not that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou say?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nothing, my lord: or if--I know not what.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Was not that Cassio parted from my wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio, my lord! No, sure, I cannot think it,</div>
                              <div class="line">That he would steal away so guilty-like,</div>
                              <div class="line">Seeing you coming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do believe 'twas he.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lord!</div>
                              <div class="line">I have been talking with a suitor here,</div>
                              <div class="line">A man that languishes in your displeasure.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is't you mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, your lieutenant, Cassio. Good my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I have any grace or power to move you,</div>
                              <div class="line">His present reconciliation take;</div>
                              <div class="line">For if he be not one that truly loves you,</div>
                              <div class="line">That errs in ignorance and not in cunning,</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no judgment in an honest face:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, call him back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Went he hence now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sooth; so humbled</div>
                              <div class="line">That he hath left part of his grief with me,</div>
                              <div class="line">To suffer with him. Good love, call him back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not now, sweet Desdemona; some other time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">But shall't be shortly?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The sooner, sweet, for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall't be to-night at supper?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not to-night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">To-morrow dinner, then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I shall not dine at home;</div>
                              <div class="line">I meet the captains at the citadel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, to-morrow night; or Tuesday morn;</div>
                              <div class="line">On Tuesday noon, or night; on Wednesday morn:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, name the time, but let it not</div>
                              <div class="line">Exceed three days: in faith, he's penitent;</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet his trespass, in our common reason--</div>
                              <div class="line">Save that, they say, the wars must make examples</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of their best--is not almost a fault</div>
                              <div class="line">To incur a private cheque. When shall he come?</div>
                              <div class="line">Tell me, Othello: I wonder in my soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">What you would ask me, that I should deny,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or stand so mammering on. What! Michael Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">That came a-wooing with you, and so many a time,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I have spoke of you dispraisingly,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath ta'en your part; to have so much to do</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring him in! Trust me, I could do much,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, no more: let him come when he will;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will deny thee nothing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this is not a boon;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis as I should entreat you wear your gloves,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or feed on nourishing dishes, or keep you warm,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or sue to you to do a peculiar profit</div>
                              <div class="line">To your own person: nay, when I have a suit</div>
                              <div class="line">Wherein I mean to touch your love indeed,</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be full of poise and difficult weight</div>
                              <div class="line">And fearful to be granted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will deny thee nothing:</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereon, I do beseech thee, grant me this,</div>
                              <div class="line">To leave me but a little to myself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I deny you? no: farewell, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, my Desdemona: I'll come to thee straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Emilia, come. Be as your fancies teach you;</div>
                              <div class="line">Whate'er you be, I am obedient.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DESDEMONA and EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent wretch! Perdition catch my soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">But I do love thee! and when I love thee not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Chaos is come again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My noble lord--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou say, Iago?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did Michael Cassio, when you woo'd my lady,</div>
                              <div class="line">Know of your love?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">He did, from first to last: why dost thou ask?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
