                              <div class="line">But for a satisfaction of my thought;</div>
                              <div class="line">No further harm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why of thy thought, Iago?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not think he had been acquainted with her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, yes; and went between us very oft.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed! ay, indeed: discern'st thou aught in that?</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he not honest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest! ay, honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, for aught I know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou think?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Think, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Think, my lord!</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, he echoes me,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if there were some monster in his thought</div>
                              <div class="line">Too hideous to be shown. Thou dost mean something:</div>
                              <div class="line">I heard thee say even now, thou likedst not that,</div>
                              <div class="line">When Cassio left my wife: what didst not like?</div>
                              <div class="line">And when I told thee he was of my counsel</div>
                              <div class="line">In my whole course of wooing, thou criedst 'Indeed!'</div>
                              <div class="line">And didst contract and purse thy brow together,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if thou then hadst shut up in thy brain</div>
                              <div class="line">Some horrible conceit: if thou dost love me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Show me thy thought.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, you know I love you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think thou dost;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for I know thou'rt full of love and honesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">And weigh'st thy words before thou givest them breath,</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore these stops of thine fright me the more:</div>
                              <div class="line">For such things in a false disloyal knave</div>
                              <div class="line">Are tricks of custom, but in a man that's just</div>
                              <div class="line">They are close delations, working from the heart</div>
                              <div class="line">That passion cannot rule.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">For Michael Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare be sworn I think that he is honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think so too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Men should be what they seem;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or those that be not, would they might seem none!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Certain, men should be what they seem.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, I think Cassio's an honest man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, yet there's more in this:</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, speak to me as to thy thinkings,</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou dost ruminate, and give thy worst of thoughts</div>
                              <div class="line">The worst of words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good my lord, pardon me:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I am bound to every act of duty,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am not bound to that all slaves are free to.</div>
                              <div class="line">Utter my thoughts? Why, say they are vile and false;</div>
                              <div class="line">As where's that palace whereinto foul things</div>
                              <div class="line">Sometimes intrude not? who has a breast so pure,</div>
                              <div class="line">But some uncleanly apprehensions</div>
                              <div class="line">Keep leets and law-days and in session sit</div>
                              <div class="line">With meditations lawful?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost conspire against thy friend, Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou but think'st him wrong'd and makest his ear</div>
                              <div class="line">A stranger to thy thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you--</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I perchance am vicious in my guess,</div>
                              <div class="line">As, I confess, it is my nature's plague</div>
                              <div class="line">To spy into abuses, and oft my jealousy</div>
                              <div class="line">Shapes faults that are not--that your wisdom yet,</div>
                              <div class="line">From one that so imperfectly conceits,</div>
                              <div class="line">Would take no notice, nor build yourself a trouble</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of his scattering and unsure observance.</div>
                              <div class="line">It were not for your quiet nor your good,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor for my manhood, honesty, or wisdom,</div>
                              <div class="line">To let you know my thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What dost thou mean?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good name in man and woman, dear my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is the immediate jewel of their souls:</div>
                              <div class="line">Who steals my purse steals trash; 'tis something, nothing;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas mine, 'tis his, and has been slave to thousands:</div>
                              <div class="line">But he that filches from me my good name</div>
                              <div class="line">Robs me of that which not enriches him</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes me poor indeed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I'll know thy thoughts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You cannot, if my heart were in your hand;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor shall not, whilst 'tis in my custody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, beware, my lord, of jealousy;</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the green-eyed monster which doth mock</div>
                              <div class="line">The meat it feeds on; that cuckold lives in bliss</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, certain of his fate, loves not his wronger;</div>
                              <div class="line">But, O, what damned minutes tells he o'er</div>
                              <div class="line">Who dotes, yet doubts, suspects, yet strongly loves!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O misery!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor and content is rich and rich enough,</div>
                              <div class="line">But riches fineless is as poor as winter</div>
                              <div class="line">To him that ever fears he shall be poor.</div>
                              <div class="line">Good heaven, the souls of all my tribe defend</div>
                              <div class="line">From jealousy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, why is this?</div>
                              <div class="line">Think'st thou I'ld make a lie of jealousy,</div>
                              <div class="line">To follow still the changes of the moon</div>
                              <div class="line">With fresh suspicions? No; to be once in doubt</div>
                              <div class="line">Is once to be resolved: exchange me for a goat,</div>
                              <div class="line">When I shall turn the business of my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">To such exsufflicate and blown surmises,</div>
                              <div class="line">Matching thy inference. 'Tis not to make me jealous</div>
                              <div class="line">To say my wife is fair, feeds well, loves company,</div>
                              <div class="line">Is free of speech, sings, plays and dances well;</div>
                              <div class="line">Where virtue is, these are more virtuous:</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor from mine own weak merits will I draw</div>
                              <div class="line">The smallest fear or doubt of her revolt;</div>
                              <div class="line">For she had eyes, and chose me. No, Iago;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll see before I doubt; when I doubt, prove;</div>
                              <div class="line">And on the proof, there is no more but this,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Away at once with love or jealousy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad of it; for now I shall have reason</div>
                              <div class="line">To show the love and duty that I bear you</div>
                              <div class="line">With franker spirit: therefore, as I am bound,</div>
                              <div class="line">Receive it from me. I speak not yet of proof.</div>
                              <div class="line">Look to your wife; observe her well with Cassio;</div>
                              <div class="line">Wear your eye thus, not jealous nor secure:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not have your free and noble nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of self-bounty, be abused; look to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">I know our country disposition well;</div>
                              <div class="line">In Venice they do let heaven see the pranks</div>
                              <div class="line">They dare not show their husbands; their best conscience</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not to leave't undone, but keep't unknown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou say so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">She did deceive her father, marrying you;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when she seem'd to shake and fear your looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">She loved them most.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">And so she did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, go to then;</div>
                              <div class="line">She that, so young, could give out such a seeming,</div>
                              <div class="line">To seal her father's eyes up close as oak-</div>
                              <div class="line">He thought 'twas witchcraft--but I am much to blame;</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly do beseech you of your pardon</div>
                              <div class="line">For too much loving you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am bound to thee for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I see this hath a little dash'd your spirits.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not a jot, not a jot.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I' faith, I fear it has.</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope you will consider what is spoke</div>
                              <div class="line">Comes from my love. But I do see you're moved:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am to pray you not to strain my speech</div>
                              <div class="line">To grosser issues nor to larger reach</div>
                              <div class="line">Than to suspicion.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Should you do so, my lord,</div>
                              <div class="line">My speech should fall into such vile success</div>
                              <div class="line">As my thoughts aim not at. Cassio's my worthy friend--</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I see you're moved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not much moved:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not think but Desdemona's honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Long live she so! and long live you to think so!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet, how nature erring from itself,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, there's the point: as--to be bold with you--</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to affect many proposed matches</div>
                              <div class="line">Of her own clime, complexion, and degree,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereto we see in all things nature tends--</div>
                              <div class="line">Foh! one may smell in such a will most rank,</div>
                              <div class="line">Foul disproportion thoughts unnatural.</div>
                              <div class="line">But pardon me; I do not in position</div>
                              <div class="line">Distinctly speak of her; though I may fear</div>
                              <div class="line">Her will, recoiling to her better judgment,</div>
                              <div class="line">May fall to match you with her country forms</div>
                              <div class="line">And happily repent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell, farewell:</div>
                              <div class="line">If more thou dost perceive, let me know more;</div>
                              <div class="line">Set on thy wife to observe: leave me, Iago:</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Going</span>  My lord, I take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why did I marry? This honest creature doubtless</div>
                              <div class="line">Sees and knows more, much more, than he unfolds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Returning</span>  My lord, I would I might entreat</div>
                              <div class="line">your honour</div>
                              <div class="line">To scan this thing no further; leave it to time:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though it be fit that Cassio have his place,</div>
                              <div class="line">For sure, he fills it up with great ability,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet, if you please to hold him off awhile,</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall by that perceive him and his means:</div>
                              <div class="line">Note, if your lady strain his entertainment</div>
                              <div class="line">With any strong or vehement importunity;</div>
                              <div class="line">Much will be seen in that. In the mean time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me be thought too busy in my fears--</div>
                              <div class="line">As worthy cause I have to fear I am--</div>
                              <div class="line">And hold her free, I do beseech your honour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear not my government.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I once more take my leave.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">This fellow's of exceeding honesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">And knows all qualities, with a learned spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Of human dealings. If I do prove her haggard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though that her jesses were my dear heartstrings,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'ld whistle her off and let her down the wind,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pray at fortune. Haply, for I am black</div>
                              <div class="line">And have not those soft parts of conversation</div>
                              <div class="line">That chamberers have, or for I am declined</div>
                              <div class="line">Into the vale of years,--yet that's not much--</div>
                              <div class="line">She's gone. I am abused; and my relief</div>
                              <div class="line">Must be to loathe her. O curse of marriage,</div>
                              <div class="line">That we can call these delicate creatures ours,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not their appetites! I had rather be a toad,</div>
                              <div class="line">And live upon the vapour of a dungeon,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than keep a corner in the thing I love</div>
                              <div class="line">For others' uses. Yet, 'tis the plague of great ones;</div>
                              <div class="line">Prerogatived are they less than the base;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis destiny unshunnable, like death:</div>
                              <div class="line">Even then this forked plague is fated to us</div>
                              <div class="line">When we do quicken. Desdemona comes:</div>
                              <p>Re-enter DESDEMONA and EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">If she be false, O, then heaven mocks itself!</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not believe't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my dear Othello!</div>
                              <div class="line">Your dinner, and the generous islanders</div>
                              <div class="line">By you invited, do attend your presence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am to blame.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you speak so faintly?</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you not well?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a pain upon my forehead here.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, that's with watching; 'twill away again:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me but bind it hard, within this hour</div>
                              <div class="line">It will be well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Your napkin is too little:</div>
                              <p>He puts the handkerchief from him; and it drops</p>
                              <div class="line">Let it alone. Come, I'll go in with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am very sorry that you are not well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OTHELLO and DESDEMONA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad I have found this napkin:</div>
                              <div class="line">This was her first remembrance from the Moor:</div>
                              <div class="line">My wayward husband hath a hundred times</div>
                              <div class="line">Woo'd me to steal it; but she so loves the token,</div>
                              <div class="line">For he conjured her she should ever keep it,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she reserves it evermore about her</div>
                              <div class="line">To kiss and talk to. I'll have the work ta'en out,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give't Iago: what he will do with it</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven knows, not I;</div>
                              <div class="line">I nothing but to please his fantasy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter Iago</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now! what do you here alone?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not you chide; I have a thing for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">A thing for me? it is a common thing--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">To have a foolish wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, is that all? What will you give me now</div>
                              <div class="line">For the same handkerchief?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What handkerchief?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What handkerchief?</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, that the Moor first gave to Desdemona;</div>
                              <div class="line">That which so often you did bid me steal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hast stol'n it from her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, 'faith; she let it drop by negligence.</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to the advantage, I, being here, took't up.</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, here it is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">A good wench; give it me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">What will you do with 't, that you have been</div>
                              <div class="line">so earnest</div>
                              <div class="line">To have me filch it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Snatching it</span>  Why, what's that to you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be not for some purpose of import,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give't me again: poor lady, she'll run mad</div>
                              <div class="line">When she shall lack it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not acknown on 't; I have use for it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, leave me.</div>
                              <p>Exit EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">I will in Cassio's lodging lose this napkin,</div>
                              <div class="line">And let him find it. Trifles light as air</div>
                              <div class="line">Are to the jealous confirmations strong</div>
                              <div class="line">As proofs of holy writ: this may do something.</div>
                              <div class="line">The Moor already changes with my poison:</div>
                              <div class="line">Dangerous conceits are, in their natures, poisons.</div>
                              <div class="line">Which at the first are scarce found to distaste,</div>
                              <div class="line">But with a little act upon the blood.</div>
                              <div class="line">Burn like the mines of Sulphur. I did say so:</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, where he comes!</div>
                              <p>Re-enter OTHELLO</p>
                              <div class="line">Not poppy, nor mandragora,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor all the drowsy syrups of the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall ever medicine thee to that sweet sleep</div>
                              <div class="line">Which thou owedst yesterday.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! ha! false to me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, general! no more of that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Avaunt! be gone! thou hast set me on the rack:</div>
                              <div class="line">I swear 'tis better to be much abused</div>
                              <div class="line">Than but to know't a little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What sense had I of her stol'n hours of lust?</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw't not, thought it not, it harm'd not me:</div>
                              <div class="line">I slept the next night well, was free and merry;</div>
                              <div class="line">I found not Cassio's kisses on her lips:</div>
                              <div class="line">He that is robb'd, not wanting what is stol'n,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him not know't, and he's not robb'd at all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry to hear this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I had been happy, if the general camp,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pioners and all, had tasted her sweet body,</div>
                              <div class="line">So I had nothing known. O, now, for ever</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell the tranquil mind! farewell content!</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell the plumed troop, and the big wars,</div>
                              <div class="line">That make ambition virtue! O, farewell!</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell the neighing steed, and the shrill trump,</div>
                              <div class="line">The spirit-stirring drum, the ear-piercing fife,</div>
                              <div class="line">The royal banner, and all quality,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pride, pomp and circumstance of glorious war!</div>
                              <div class="line">And, O you mortal engines, whose rude throats</div>
                              <div class="line">The immortal Jove's dead clamours counterfeit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Farewell! Othello's occupation's gone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Villain, be sure thou prove my love a whore,</div>
                              <div class="line">Be sure of it; give me the ocular proof:</div>
                              <div class="line">Or by the worth of man's eternal soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hadst been better have been born a dog</div>
                              <div class="line">Than answer my waked wrath!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't come to this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Make me to see't; or, at the least, so prove it,</div>
                              <div class="line">That the probation bear no hinge nor loop</div>
                              <div class="line">To hang a doubt on; or woe upon thy life!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My noble lord,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">If thou dost slander her and torture me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never pray more; abandon all remorse;</div>
                              <div class="line">On horror's head horrors accumulate;</div>
                              <div class="line">Do deeds to make heaven weep, all earth amazed;</div>
                              <div class="line">For nothing canst thou to damnation add</div>
                              <div class="line">Greater than that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O grace! O heaven forgive me!</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you a man? have you a soul or sense?</div>
                              <div class="line">God be wi' you; take mine office. O wretched fool.</div>
                              <div class="line">That livest to make thine honesty a vice!</div>
                              <div class="line">O monstrous world! Take note, take note, O world,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be direct and honest is not safe.</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you for this profit; and from hence</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll love no friend, sith love breeds such offence.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, stay: thou shouldst be honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I should be wise, for honesty's a fool</div>
                              <div class="line">And loses that it works for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">By the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">I think my wife be honest and think she is not;</div>
                              <div class="line">I think that thou art just and think thou art not.</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have some proof. Her name, that was as fresh</div>
                              <div class="line">As Dian's visage, is now begrimed and black</div>
                              <div class="line">As mine own face. If there be cords, or knives,</div>
                              <div class="line">Poison, or fire, or suffocating streams,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not endure it. Would I were satisfied!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I see, sir, you are eaten up with passion:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do repent me that I put it to you.</div>
                              <div class="line">You would be satisfied?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Would! nay, I will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And may: but, how? how satisfied, my lord?</div>
                              <div class="line">Would you, the supervisor, grossly gape on--</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold her topp'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Death and damnation! O!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It were a tedious difficulty, I think,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bring them to that prospect: damn them then,</div>
                              <div class="line">If ever mortal eyes do see them bolster</div>
                              <div class="line">More than their own! What then? how then?</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall I say? Where's satisfaction?</div>
                              <div class="line">It is impossible you should see this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were they as prime as goats, as hot as monkeys,</div>
                              <div class="line">As salt as wolves in pride, and fools as gross</div>
                              <div class="line">As ignorance made drunk. But yet, I say,</div>
                              <div class="line">If imputation and strong circumstances,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which lead directly to the door of truth,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will give you satisfaction, you may have't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me a living reason she's disloyal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not like the office:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, sith I am enter'd in this cause so far,</div>
                              <div class="line">Prick'd to't by foolish honesty and love,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will go on. I lay with Cassio lately;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, being troubled with a raging tooth,</div>
                              <div class="line">I could not sleep.</div>
                              <div class="line">There are a kind of men so loose of soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">That in their sleeps will mutter their affairs:</div>
                              <div class="line">One of this kind is Cassio:</div>
                              <div class="line">In sleep I heard him say 'Sweet Desdemona,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us be wary, let us hide our loves;'</div>
                              <div class="line">And then, sir, would he gripe and wring my hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cry 'O sweet creature!' and then kiss me hard,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if he pluck'd up kisses by the roots</div>
                              <div class="line">That grew upon my lips: then laid his leg</div>
                              <div class="line">Over my thigh, and sigh'd, and kiss'd; and then</div>
                              <div class="line">Cried 'Cursed fate that gave thee to the Moor!'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O monstrous! monstrous!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, this was but his dream.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">But this denoted a foregone conclusion:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis a shrewd doubt, though it be but a dream.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And this may help to thicken other proofs</div>
                              <div class="line">That do demonstrate thinly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll tear her all to pieces.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, but be wise: yet we see nothing done;</div>
                              <div class="line">She may be honest yet. Tell me but this,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you not sometimes seen a handkerchief</div>
                              <div class="line">Spotted with strawberries in your wife's hand?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I gave her such a one; 'twas my first gift.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not that; but such a handkerchief--</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure it was your wife's--did I to-day</div>
                              <div class="line">See Cassio wipe his beard with.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be that--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">If it be that, or any that was hers,</div>
                              <div class="line">It speaks against her with the other proofs.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, that the slave had forty thousand lives!</div>
                              <div class="line">One is too poor, too weak for my revenge.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now do I see 'tis true. Look here, Iago;</div>
                              <div class="line">All my fond love thus do I blow to heaven.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis gone.</div>
                              <div class="line">Arise, black vengeance, from thy hollow cell!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yield up, O love, thy crown and hearted throne</div>
                              <div class="line">To tyrannous hate! Swell, bosom, with thy fraught,</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'tis of aspics' tongues!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet be content.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, blood, blood, blood!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, I say; your mind perhaps may change.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, Iago: Like to the Pontic sea,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose icy current and compulsive course</div>
                              <div class="line">Ne'er feels retiring ebb, but keeps due on</div>
                              <div class="line">To the Propontic and the Hellespont,</div>
                              <div class="line">Even so my bloody thoughts, with violent pace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall ne'er look back, ne'er ebb to humble love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Till that a capable and wide revenge</div>
                              <div class="line">Swallow them up. Now, by yond marble heaven,</div>
                              <p>Kneels</p>
                              <div class="line">In the due reverence of a sacred vow</div>
                              <div class="line">I here engage my words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not rise yet.</div>
                              <p>Kneels</p>
                              <div class="line">Witness, you ever-burning lights above,</div>
                              <div class="line">You elements that clip us round about,</div>
                              <div class="line">Witness that here Iago doth give up</div>
                              <div class="line">The execution of his wit, hands, heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">To wrong'd Othello's service! Let him command,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to obey shall be in me remorse,</div>
                              <div class="line">What bloody business ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>They rise</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I greet thy love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not with vain thanks, but with acceptance bounteous,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will upon the instant put thee to't:</div>
                              <div class="line">Within these three days let me hear thee say</div>
                              <div class="line">That Cassio's not alive.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My friend is dead; 'tis done at your request:</div>
                              <div class="line">But let her live.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Damn her, lewd minx! O, damn her!</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, go with me apart; I will withdraw,</div>
                              <div class="line">To furnish me with some swift means of death</div>
                              <div class="line">For the fair devil. Now art thou my lieutenant.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am your own for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.5.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Before the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter DESDEMONA, EMILIA, and Clown</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you know, sirrah, where Lieutenant Cassio lies?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare not say he lies any where.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, man?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">He's a soldier, and for one to say a soldier lies,</div>
                              <div class="line">is stabbing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to: where lodges he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell you where he lodges, is to tell you where I lie.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Can any thing be made of this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not where he lodges, and for me to devise a</div>
                              <div class="line">lodging and say he lies here or he lies there, were</div>
                              <div class="line">to lie in mine own throat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Can you inquire him out, and be edified by report?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">I will catechise the world for him; that is, make</div>
                              <div class="line">questions, and by them answer.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Seek him, bid him come hither: tell him I have</div>
                              <div class="line">moved my lord on his behalf, and hope all will be well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Clown</div>
                              <div class="line">To do this is within the compass of man's wit: and</div>
                              <div class="line">therefore I will attempt the doing it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Where should I lose that handkerchief, Emilia?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Believe me, I had rather have lost my purse</div>
                              <div class="line">Full of crusadoes: and, but my noble Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">Is true of mind and made of no such baseness</div>
                              <div class="line">As jealous creatures are, it were enough</div>
                              <div class="line">To put him to ill thinking.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is he not jealous?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, he? I think the sun where he was born</div>
                              <div class="line">Drew all such humours from him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, where he comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not leave him now till Cassio</div>
                              <div class="line">Be call'd to him.</div>
                              <p>Enter OTHELLO</p>
                              <div class="line">How is't with you, my lord</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my good lady.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">O, hardness to dissemble!--</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you, Desdemona?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, my good lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me your hand: this hand is moist, my lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">It yet hath felt no age nor known no sorrow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">This argues fruitfulness and liberal heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">Hot, hot, and moist: this hand of yours requires</div>
                              <div class="line">A sequester from liberty, fasting and prayer,</div>
                              <div class="line">Much castigation, exercise devout;</div>
                              <div class="line">For here's a young and sweating devil here,</div>
                              <div class="line">That commonly rebels. 'Tis a good hand,</div>
                              <div class="line">A frank one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">You may, indeed, say so;</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'twas that hand that gave away my heart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">A liberal hand: the hearts of old gave hands;</div>
                              <div class="line">But our new heraldry is hands, not hearts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot speak of this. Come now, your promise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What promise, chuck?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have sent to bid Cassio come speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a salt and sorry rheum offends me;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lend me thy handkerchief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
