                              <div class="line">That which I gave you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have it not about me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, indeed, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That is a fault.</div>
                              <div class="line">That handkerchief</div>
                              <div class="line">Did an Egyptian to my mother give;</div>
                              <div class="line">She was a charmer, and could almost read</div>
                              <div class="line">The thoughts of people: she told her, while</div>
                              <div class="line">she kept it,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twould make her amiable and subdue my father</div>
                              <div class="line">Entirely to her love, but if she lost it</div>
                              <div class="line">Or made gift of it, my father's eye</div>
                              <div class="line">Should hold her loathed and his spirits should hunt</div>
                              <div class="line">After new fancies: she, dying, gave it me;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid me, when my fate would have me wive,</div>
                              <div class="line">To give it her. I did so: and take heed on't;</div>
                              <div class="line">Make it a darling like your precious eye;</div>
                              <div class="line">To lose't or give't away were such perdition</div>
                              <div class="line">As nothing else could match.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis true: there's magic in the web of it:</div>
                              <div class="line">A sibyl, that had number'd in the world</div>
                              <div class="line">The sun to course two hundred compasses,</div>
                              <div class="line">In her prophetic fury sew'd the work;</div>
                              <div class="line">The worms were hallow'd that did breed the silk;</div>
                              <div class="line">And it was dyed in mummy which the skilful</div>
                              <div class="line">Conserved of maidens' hearts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed! is't true?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Most veritable; therefore look to't well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then would to God that I had never seen't!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha! wherefore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why do you speak so startingly and rash?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't lost? is't gone? speak, is it out</div>
                              <div class="line">o' the way?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven bless us!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Say you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not lost; but what an if it were?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">How!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, it is not lost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fetch't, let me see't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, so I can, sir, but I will not now.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a trick to put me from my suit:</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray you, let Cassio be received again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fetch me the handkerchief: my mind misgives.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come;</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll never meet a more sufficient man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The handkerchief!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray, talk me of Cassio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The handkerchief!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">A man that all his time</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath founded his good fortunes on your love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shared dangers with you,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The handkerchief!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">In sooth, you are to blame.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Is not this man jealous?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I ne'er saw this before.</div>
                              <div class="line">Sure, there's some wonder in this handkerchief:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am most unhappy in the loss of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis not a year or two shows us a man:</div>
                              <div class="line">They are all but stomachs, and we all but food;</div>
                              <div class="line">To eat us hungerly, and when they are full,</div>
                              <div class="line">They belch us. Look you, Cassio and my husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSIO and IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">There is no other way; 'tis she must do't:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, lo, the happiness! go, and importune her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, good Cassio! what's the news with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, my former suit: I do beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">That by your virtuous means I may again</div>
                              <div class="line">Exist, and be a member of his love</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom I with all the office of my heart</div>
                              <div class="line">Entirely honour: I would not be delay'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">If my offence be of such mortal kind</div>
                              <div class="line">That nor my service past, nor present sorrows,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor purposed merit in futurity,</div>
                              <div class="line">Can ransom me into his love again,</div>
                              <div class="line">But to know so must be my benefit;</div>
                              <div class="line">So shall I clothe me in a forced content,</div>
                              <div class="line">And shut myself up in some other course,</div>
                              <div class="line">To fortune's alms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, thrice-gentle Cassio!</div>
                              <div class="line">My advocation is not now in tune;</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord is not my lord; nor should I know him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Were he in favour as in humour alter'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">So help me every spirit sanctified,</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have spoken for you all my best</div>
                              <div class="line">And stood within the blank of his displeasure</div>
                              <div class="line">For my free speech! you must awhile be patient:</div>
                              <div class="line">What I can do I will; and more I will</div>
                              <div class="line">Than for myself I dare: let that suffice you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is my lord angry?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He went hence but now,</div>
                              <div class="line">And certainly in strange unquietness.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Can he be angry? I have seen the cannon,</div>
                              <div class="line">When it hath blown his ranks into the air,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, like the devil, from his very arm</div>
                              <div class="line">Puff'd his own brother:--and can he be angry?</div>
                              <div class="line">Something of moment then: I will go meet him:</div>
                              <div class="line">There's matter in't indeed, if he be angry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee, do so.</div>
                              <p>Exit IAGO</p>
                              <div class="line">Something, sure, of state,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either from Venice, or some unhatch'd practise</div>
                              <div class="line">Made demonstrable here in Cyprus to him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath puddled his clear spirit: and in such cases</div>
                              <div class="line">Men's natures wrangle with inferior things,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though great ones are their object. 'Tis even so;</div>
                              <div class="line">For let our finger ache, and it indues</div>
                              <div class="line">Our other healthful members even to that sense</div>
                              <div class="line">Of pain: nay, we must think men are not gods,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor of them look for such observances</div>
                              <div class="line">As fit the bridal. Beshrew me much, Emilia,</div>
                              <div class="line">I was, unhandsome warrior as I am,</div>
                              <div class="line">Arraigning his unkindness with my soul;</div>
                              <div class="line">But now I find I had suborn'd the witness,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he's indicted falsely.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray heaven it be state-matters, as you think,</div>
                              <div class="line">And no conception nor no jealous toy</div>
                              <div class="line">Concerning you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas the day! I never gave him cause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">But jealous souls will not be answer'd so;</div>
                              <div class="line">They are not ever jealous for the cause,</div>
                              <div class="line">But jealous for they are jealous: 'tis a monster</div>
                              <div class="line">Begot upon itself, born on itself.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven keep that monster from Othello's mind!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Lady, amen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will go seek him. Cassio, walk hereabout:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do find him fit, I'll move your suit</div>
                              <div class="line">And seek to effect it to my uttermost.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I humbly thank your ladyship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt DESDEMONA and EMILIA</p>
                        <p>Enter BIANCA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you, friend Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What make you from home?</div>
                              <div class="line">How is it with you, my most fair Bianca?</div>
                              <div class="line">I' faith, sweet love, I was coming to your house.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">And I was going to your lodging, Cassio.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, keep a week away? seven days and nights?</div>
                              <div class="line">Eight score eight hours? and lovers' absent hours,</div>
                              <div class="line">More tedious than the dial eight score times?</div>
                              <div class="line">O weary reckoning!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, Bianca:</div>
                              <div class="line">I have this while with leaden thoughts been press'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">But I shall, in a more continuate time,</div>
                              <div class="line">Strike off this score of absence. Sweet Bianca,</div>
                              <p>Giving her DESDEMONA's handkerchief</p>
                              <div class="line">Take me this work out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">O Cassio, whence came this?</div>
                              <div class="line">This is some token from a newer friend:</div>
                              <div class="line">To the felt absence now I feel a cause:</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't come to this? Well, well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to, woman!</div>
                              <div class="line">Throw your vile guesses in the devil's teeth,</div>
                              <div class="line">From whence you have them. You are jealous now</div>
                              <div class="line">That this is from some mistress, some remembrance:</div>
                              <div class="line">No, in good troth, Bianca.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, whose is it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not, sweet: I found it in my chamber.</div>
                              <div class="line">I like the work well: ere it be demanded--</div>
                              <div class="line">As like enough it will--I'ld have it copied:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take it, and do't; and leave me for this time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave you! wherefore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do attend here on the general;</div>
                              <div class="line">And think it no addition, nor my wish,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have him see me woman'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I pray you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not that I love you not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">But that you do not love me.</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, bring me on the way a little,</div>
                              <div class="line">And say if I shall see you soon at night.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but a little way that I can bring you;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I attend here: but I'll see you soon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis very good; I must be circumstanced.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT IV</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. Before the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.4">3. SCENE III.  Another room In the castle.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. Before the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO and IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you think so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Think so, Iago!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What,</div>
                              <div class="line">To kiss in private?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">An unauthorized kiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Or to be naked with her friend in bed</div>
                              <div class="line">An hour or more, not meaning any harm?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Naked in bed, Iago, and not mean harm!</div>
                              <div class="line">It is hypocrisy against the devil:</div>
                              <div class="line">They that mean virtuously, and yet do so,</div>
                              <div class="line">The devil their virtue tempts, and they tempt heaven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">So they do nothing, 'tis a venial slip:</div>
                              <div class="line">But if I give my wife a handkerchief,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then, 'tis hers, my lord; and, being hers,</div>
                              <div class="line">She may, I think, bestow't on any man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">She is protectress of her honour too:</div>
                              <div class="line">May she give that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Her honour is an essence that's not seen;</div>
                              <div class="line">They have it very oft that have it not:</div>
                              <div class="line">But, for the handkerchief,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I would most gladly have forgot it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou said'st, it comes o'er my memory,</div>
                              <div class="line">As doth the raven o'er the infected house,</div>
                              <div class="line">Boding to all--he had my handkerchief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, what of that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not so good now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What,</div>
                              <div class="line">If I had said I had seen him do you wrong?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or heard him say,--as knaves be such abroad,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who having, by their own importunate suit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or voluntary dotage of some mistress,</div>
                              <div class="line">Convinced or supplied them, cannot choose</div>
                              <div class="line">But they must blab--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath he said any thing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath, my lord; but be you well assured,</div>
                              <div class="line">No more than he'll unswear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What hath he said?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, that he did--I know not what he did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What? what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">With her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">With her, on her; what you will.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lie with her! lie on her! We say lie on her, when</div>
                              <div class="line">they belie her. Lie with her! that's fulsome.</div>
                              <div class="line">--Handkerchief--confessions--handkerchief!--To</div>
                              <div class="line">confess, and be hanged for his labour;--first, to be</div>
                              <div class="line">hanged, and then to confess.--I tremble at it.</div>
                              <div class="line">Nature would not invest herself in such shadowing</div>
                              <div class="line">passion without some instruction. It is not words</div>
                              <div class="line">that shake me thus. Pish! Noses, ears, and lips.</div>
                              <div class="line">--Is't possible?--Confess--handkerchief!--O devil!--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Falls in a trance</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Work on,</div>
                              <div class="line">My medicine, work! Thus credulous fools are caught;</div>
                              <div class="line">And many worthy and chaste dames even thus,</div>
                              <div class="line">All guiltless, meet reproach. What, ho! my lord!</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, I say! Othello!</div>
                              <p>Enter CASSIO</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord is fall'n into an epilepsy:</div>
                              <div class="line">This is his second fit; he had one yesterday.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Rub him about the temples.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, forbear;</div>
                              <div class="line">The lethargy must have his quiet course:</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, he foams at mouth and by and by</div>
                              <div class="line">Breaks out to savage madness. Look he stirs:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you withdraw yourself a little while,</div>
                              <div class="line">He will recover straight: when he is gone,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would on great occasion speak with you.</div>
                              <p>Exit CASSIO</p>
                              <div class="line">How is it, general? have you not hurt your head?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou mock me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I mock you! no, by heaven.</div>
                              <div class="line">Would you would bear your fortune like a man!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">A horned man's a monster and a beast.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">There's many a beast then in a populous city,</div>
                              <div class="line">And many a civil monster.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did he confess it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good sir, be a man;</div>
                              <div class="line">Think every bearded fellow that's but yoked</div>
                              <div class="line">May draw with you: there's millions now alive</div>
                              <div class="line">That nightly lie in those unproper beds</div>
                              <div class="line">Which they dare swear peculiar: your case is better.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, 'tis the spite of hell, the fiend's arch-mock,</div>
                              <div class="line">To lip a wanton in a secure couch,</div>
                              <div class="line">And to suppose her chaste! No, let me know;</div>
                              <div class="line">And knowing what I am, I know what she shall be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, thou art wise; 'tis certain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand you awhile apart;</div>
                              <div class="line">Confine yourself but in a patient list.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whilst you were here o'erwhelmed with your grief--</div>
                              <div class="line">A passion most unsuiting such a man--</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio came hither: I shifted him away,</div>
                              <div class="line">And laid good 'scuse upon your ecstasy,</div>
                              <div class="line">Bade him anon return and here speak with me;</div>
                              <div class="line">The which he promised. Do but encave yourself,</div>
                              <div class="line">And mark the fleers, the gibes, and notable scorns,</div>
                              <div class="line">That dwell in every region of his face;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I will make him tell the tale anew,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where, how, how oft, how long ago, and when</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath, and is again to cope your wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, but mark his gesture. Marry, patience;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I shall say you are all in all in spleen,</div>
                              <div class="line">And nothing of a man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou hear, Iago?</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be found most cunning in my patience;</div>
                              <div class="line">But--dost thou hear?--most bloody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's not amiss;</div>
                              <div class="line">But yet keep time in all. Will you withdraw?</div>
                              <p>OTHELLO retires</p>
                              <div class="line">Now will I question Cassio of Bianca,</div>
                              <div class="line">A housewife that by selling her desires</div>
                              <div class="line">Buys herself bread and clothes: it is a creature</div>
                              <div class="line">That dotes on Cassio; as 'tis the strumpet's plague</div>
                              <div class="line">To beguile many and be beguiled by one:</div>
                              <div class="line">He, when he hears of her, cannot refrain</div>
                              <div class="line">From the excess of laughter. Here he comes:</div>
                              <p>Re-enter CASSIO</p>
                              <div class="line">As he shall smile, Othello shall go mad;</div>
                              <div class="line">And his unbookish jealousy must construe</div>
                              <div class="line">Poor Cassio's smiles, gestures and light behavior,</div>
                              <div class="line">Quite in the wrong. How do you now, lieutenant?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The worser that you give me the addition</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose want even kills me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ply Desdemona well, and you are sure on't.</div>
                              <p>Speaking lower</p>
                              <div class="line">Now, if this suit lay in Bianco's power,</div>
                              <div class="line">How quickly should you speed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor caitiff!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, how he laughs already!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I never knew woman love man so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, poor rogue! I think, i' faith, she loves me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now he denies it faintly, and laughs it out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you hear, Cassio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now he importunes him</div>
                              <div class="line">To tell it o'er: go to; well said, well said.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">She gives it out that you shall marry hey:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you intend it?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you triumph, Roman? do you triumph?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I marry her! what? a customer! Prithee, bear some</div>
                              <div class="line">charity to my wit: do not think it so unwholesome.</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha, ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">So, so, so, so: they laugh that win.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, the cry goes that you shall marry her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, say true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a very villain else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you scored me? Well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the monkey's own giving out: she is</div>
                              <div class="line">persuaded I will marry her, out of her own love and</div>
                              <div class="line">flattery, not out of my promise.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago beckons me; now he begins the story.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">She was here even now; she haunts me in every place.</div>
                              <div class="line">I was the other day talking on the sea-bank with</div>
                              <div class="line">certain Venetians; and thither comes the bauble,</div>
                              <div class="line">and, by this hand, she falls me thus about my neck--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Crying 'O dear Cassio!' as it were: his gesture</div>
                              <div class="line">imports it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">So hangs, and lolls, and weeps upon me; so hales,</div>
                              <div class="line">and pulls me: ha, ha, ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now he tells how she plucked him to my chamber. O,</div>
                              <div class="line">I see that nose of yours, but not that dog I shall</div>
                              <div class="line">throw it to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I must leave her company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Before me! look, where she comes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis such another fitchew! marry a perfumed one.</div>
                              <p>Enter BIANCA</p>
                              <div class="line">What do you mean by this haunting of me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let the devil and his dam haunt you! What did you</div>
                              <div class="line">mean by that same handkerchief you gave me even now?</div>
                              <div class="line">I was a fine fool to take it. I must take out the</div>
                              <div class="line">work?--A likely piece of work, that you should find</div>
                              <div class="line">it in your chamber, and not know who left it there!</div>
                              <div class="line">This is some minx's token, and I must take out the</div>
                              <div class="line">work? There; give it your hobby-horse: wheresoever</div>
                              <div class="line">you had it, I'll take out no work on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my sweet Bianca! how now! how now!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, that should be my handkerchief!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">An you'll come to supper to-night, you may; an you</div>
                              <div class="line">will not, come when you are next prepared for.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">After her, after her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, I must; she'll rail in the street else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you sup there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, I intend so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, I may chance to see you; for I would very fain</div>
                              <div class="line">speak with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, come; will you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go to; say no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit CASSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Advancing</span>  How shall I murder him, Iago?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did you perceive how he laughed at his vice?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O Iago!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And did you see the handkerchief?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Was that mine?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yours by this hand: and to see how he prizes the</div>
                              <div class="line">foolish woman your wife! she gave it him, and he</div>
                              <div class="line">hath given it his whore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I would have him nine years a-killing.</div>
                              <div class="line">A fine woman! a fair woman! a sweet woman!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, you must forget that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, let her rot, and perish, and be damned to-night;</div>
                              <div class="line">for she shall not live: no, my heart is turned to</div>
                              <div class="line">stone; I strike it, and it hurts my hand. O, the</div>
                              <div class="line">world hath not a sweeter creature: she might lie by</div>
                              <div class="line">an emperor's side and command him tasks.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that's not your way.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hang her! I do but say what she is: so delicate</div>
                              <div class="line">with her needle: an admirable musician: O! she</div>
                              <div class="line">will sing the savageness out of a bear: of so high</div>
                              <div class="line">and plenteous wit and invention:--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">She's the worse for all this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, a thousand thousand times: and then, of so</div>
                              <div class="line">gentle a condition!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, too gentle.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that's certain: but yet the pity of it, Iago!</div>
                              <div class="line">O Iago, the pity of it, Iago!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">If you are so fond over her iniquity, give her</div>
                              <div class="line">patent to offend; for, if it touch not you, it comes</div>
                              <div class="line">near nobody.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will chop her into messes: cuckold me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, 'tis foul in her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">With mine officer!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's fouler.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Get me some poison, Iago; this night: I'll not</div>
                              <div class="line">expostulate with her, lest her body and beauty</div>
                              <div class="line">unprovide my mind again: this night, Iago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do it not with poison, strangle her in her bed, even</div>
                              <div class="line">the bed she hath contaminated.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good, good: the justice of it pleases: very good.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And for Cassio, let me be his undertaker: you</div>
                              <div class="line">shall hear more by midnight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Excellent good.</div>
                              <p>A trumpet within</p>
                              <div class="line">What trumpet is that same?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Something from Venice, sure. 'Tis Lodovico</div>
                              <div class="line">Come from the duke: and, see, your wife is with him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you, worthy general!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">With all my heart, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">The duke and senators of Venice greet you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Gives him a letter</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I kiss the instrument of their pleasures.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Opens the letter, and reads</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">And what's the news, good cousin Lodovico?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am very glad to see you, signior</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome to Cyprus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you. How does Lieutenant Cassio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lives, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cousin, there's fall'n between him and my lord</div>
                              <div class="line">An unkind breach: but you shall make all well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you sure of that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'This fail you not to do, as you will--'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
