                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">He did not call; he's busy in the paper.</div>
                              <div class="line">Is there division 'twixt my lord and Cassio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">A most unhappy one: I would do much</div>
                              <div class="line">To atone them, for the love I bear to Cassio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fire and brimstone!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you wise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, is he angry?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">May be the letter moved him;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, as I think, they do command him home,</div>
                              <div class="line">Deputing Cassio in his government.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Trust me, I am glad on't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Indeed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sweet Othello,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Striking her</span>  Devil!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have not deserved this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, this would not be believed in Venice,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I should swear I saw't: 'tis very much:</div>
                              <div class="line">Make her amends; she weeps.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O devil, devil!</div>
                              <div class="line">If that the earth could teem with woman's tears,</div>
                              <div class="line">Each drop she falls would prove a crocodile.</div>
                              <div class="line">Out of my sight!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not stay to offend you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Going</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Truly, an obedient lady:</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech your lordship, call her back.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What would you with her, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who, I, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay; you did wish that I would make her turn:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, she can turn, and turn, and yet go on,</div>
                              <div class="line">And turn again; and she can weep, sir, weep;</div>
                              <div class="line">And she's obedient, as you say, obedient,</div>
                              <div class="line">Very obedient. Proceed you in your tears.</div>
                              <div class="line">Concerning this, sir,--O  well-painted passion!--</div>
                              <div class="line">I am commanded home. Get you away;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll send for you anon. Sir, I obey the mandate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will return to Venice. Hence, avaunt!</div>
                              <p>Exit DESDEMONA</p>
                              <div class="line">Cassio shall have my place. And, sir, tonight,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do entreat that we may sup together:</div>
                              <div class="line">You are welcome, sir, to Cyprus.--Goats and monkeys!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this the noble Moor whom our full senate</div>
                              <div class="line">Call all in all sufficient? Is this the nature</div>
                              <div class="line">Whom passion could not shake? whose solid virtue</div>
                              <div class="line">The shot of accident, nor dart of chance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Could neither graze nor pierce?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">He is much changed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are his wits safe? is he not light of brain?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">He's that he is: I may not breathe my censure</div>
                              <div class="line">What he might be: if what he might he is not,</div>
                              <div class="line">I would to heaven he were!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, strike his wife!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, that was not so well; yet would I knew</div>
                              <div class="line">That stroke would prove the worst!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is it his use?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or did the letters work upon his blood,</div>
                              <div class="line">And new-create this fault?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, alas!</div>
                              <div class="line">It is not honesty in me to speak</div>
                              <div class="line">What I have seen and known. You shall observe him,</div>
                              <div class="line">And his own courses will denote him so</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may save my speech: do but go after,</div>
                              <div class="line">And mark how he continues.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sorry that I am deceived in him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A room in the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO and EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">You have seen nothing then?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor ever heard, nor ever did suspect.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, you have seen Cassio and she together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">But then I saw no harm, and then I heard</div>
                              <div class="line">Each syllable that breath made up between them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, did they never whisper?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor send you out o' the way?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Never.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">To fetch her fan, her gloves, her mask, nor nothing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Never, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's strange.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I durst, my lord, to wager she is honest,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay down my soul at stake: if you think other,</div>
                              <div class="line">Remove your thought; it doth abuse your bosom.</div>
                              <div class="line">If any wretch have put this in your head,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let heaven requite it with the serpent's curse!</div>
                              <div class="line">For, if she be not honest, chaste, and true,</div>
                              <div class="line">There's no man happy; the purest of their wives</div>
                              <div class="line">Is foul as slander.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Bid her come hither: go.</div>
                              <p>Exit EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">She says enough; yet she's a simple bawd</div>
                              <div class="line">That cannot say as much. This is a subtle whore,</div>
                              <div class="line">A closet lock and key of villanous secrets</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet she'll kneel and pray; I have seen her do't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter DESDEMONA with EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord, what is your will?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pray, chuck, come hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your pleasure?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me see your eyes;</div>
                              <div class="line">Look in my face.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What horrible fancy's this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To EMILIA</span>  Some of your function, mistress;</div>
                              <div class="line">Leave procreants alone and shut the door;</div>
                              <div class="line">Cough, or cry 'hem,' if any body come:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your mystery, your mystery: nay, dispatch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon my knees, what doth your speech import?</div>
                              <div class="line">I understand a fury in your words.</div>
                              <div class="line">But not the words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what art thou?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Your wife, my lord; your true</div>
                              <div class="line">And loyal wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, swear it, damn thyself</div>
                              <div class="line">Lest, being like one of heaven, the devils themselves</div>
                              <div class="line">Should fear to seize thee: therefore be double damn'd:</div>
                              <div class="line">Swear thou art honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven doth truly know it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven truly knows that thou art false as hell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">To whom, my lord? with whom? how am I false?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O Desdemona! away! away! away!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas the heavy day! Why do you weep?</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I the motive of these tears, my lord?</div>
                              <div class="line">If haply you my father do suspect</div>
                              <div class="line">An instrument of this your calling back,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay not your blame on me: If you have lost him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, I have lost him too.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Had it pleased heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">To try me with affliction; had they rain'd</div>
                              <div class="line">All kinds of sores and shames on my bare head.</div>
                              <div class="line">Steep'd me in poverty to the very lips,</div>
                              <div class="line">Given to captivity me and my utmost hopes,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should have found in some place of my soul</div>
                              <div class="line">A drop of patience: but, alas, to make me</div>
                              <div class="line">A fixed figure for the time of scorn</div>
                              <div class="line">To point his slow unmoving finger at!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet could I bear that too; well, very well:</div>
                              <div class="line">But there, where I have garner'd up my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where either I must live, or bear no life;</div>
                              <div class="line">The fountain from the which my current runs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else dries up; to be discarded thence!</div>
                              <div class="line">Or keep it as a cistern for foul toads</div>
                              <div class="line">To knot and gender in! Turn thy complexion there,</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience, thou young and rose-lipp'd cherubin,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, there, look grim as hell!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I hope my noble lord esteems me honest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, ay; as summer flies are in the shambles,</div>
                              <div class="line">That quicken even with blowing. O thou weed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Who art so lovely fair and smell'st so sweet</div>
                              <div class="line">That the sense aches at thee, would thou hadst</div>
                              <div class="line">ne'er been born!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, what ignorant sin have I committed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Was this fair paper, this most goodly book,</div>
                              <div class="line">Made to write 'whore' upon? What committed!</div>
                              <div class="line">Committed! O thou public commoner!</div>
                              <div class="line">I should make very forges of my cheeks,</div>
                              <div class="line">That would to cinders burn up modesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Did I but speak thy deeds. What committed!</div>
                              <div class="line">Heaven stops the nose at it and the moon winks,</div>
                              <div class="line">The bawdy wind that kisses all it meets</div>
                              <div class="line">Is hush'd within the hollow mine of earth,</div>
                              <div class="line">And will not hear it. What committed!</div>
                              <div class="line">Impudent strumpet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, you do me wrong.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you not a strumpet?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, as I am a Christian:</div>
                              <div class="line">If to preserve this vessel for my lord</div>
                              <div class="line">From any other foul unlawful touch</div>
                              <div class="line">Be not to be a strumpet, I am none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, not a whore?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, as I shall be saved.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, heaven forgive us!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I cry you mercy, then:</div>
                              <div class="line">I took you for that cunning whore of Venice</div>
                              <div class="line">That married with Othello.</div>
                              <p>Raising his voice</p>
                              <div class="line">You, mistress,</div>
                              <div class="line">That have the office opposite to Saint Peter,</div>
                              <div class="line">And keep the gate of hell!</div>
                              <p>Re-enter EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">You, you, ay, you!</div>
                              <div class="line">We have done our course; there's money for your pains:</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, turn the key and keep our counsel.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, what does this gentleman conceive?</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you, madam? how do you, my good lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, half asleep.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good madam, what's the matter with my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">With who?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, with my lord, madam.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is thy lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He that is yours, sweet lady.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have none: do not talk to me, Emilia;</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot weep; nor answer have I none,</div>
                              <div class="line">But what should go by water. Prithee, tonight</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay on my bed my wedding sheets: remember;</div>
                              <div class="line">And call thy husband hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's a change indeed!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis meet I should be used so, very meet.</div>
                              <div class="line">How have I been behaved, that he might stick</div>
                              <div class="line">The small'st opinion on my least misuse?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter EMILIA with IAGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your pleasure, madam?</div>
                              <div class="line">How is't with you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot tell. Those that do teach young babes</div>
                              <div class="line">Do it with gentle means and easy tasks:</div>
                              <div class="line">He might have chid me so; for, in good faith,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a child to chiding.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter, lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, Iago, my lord hath so bewhored her.</div>
                              <div class="line">Thrown such despite and heavy terms upon her,</div>
                              <div class="line">As true hearts cannot bear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I that name, Iago?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What name, fair lady?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Such as she says my lord did say I was.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">He call'd her whore: a beggar in his drink</div>
                              <div class="line">Could not have laid such terms upon his callat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why did he so?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not know; I am sure I am none such.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Do not weep, do not weep. Alas the day!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath she forsook so many noble matches,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her father and her country and her friends,</div>
                              <div class="line">To be call'd whore? would it not make one weep?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is my wretched fortune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew him for't!</div>
                              <div class="line">How comes this trick upon him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, heaven doth know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be hang'd, if some eternal villain,</div>
                              <div class="line">Some busy and insinuating rogue,</div>
                              <div class="line">Some cogging, cozening slave, to get some office,</div>
                              <div class="line">Have not devised this slander; I'll be hang'd else.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, there is no such man; it is impossible.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">If any such there be, heaven pardon him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">A halter pardon him! and hell gnaw his bones!</div>
                              <div class="line">Why should he call her whore? who keeps her company?</div>
                              <div class="line">What place? what time? what form? what likelihood?</div>
                              <div class="line">The Moor's abused by some most villanous knave,</div>
                              <div class="line">Some base notorious knave, some scurvy fellow.</div>
                              <div class="line">O heaven, that such companions thou'ldst unfold,</div>
                              <div class="line">And put in every honest hand a whip</div>
                              <div class="line">To lash the rascals naked through the world</div>
                              <div class="line">Even from the east to the west!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak within door.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, fie upon them! Some such squire he was</div>
                              <div class="line">That turn'd your wit the seamy side without,</div>
                              <div class="line">And made you to suspect me with the Moor.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are a fool; go to.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O good Iago,</div>
                              <div class="line">What shall I do to win my lord again?</div>
                              <div class="line">Good friend, go to him; for, by this light of heaven,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not how I lost him. Here I kneel:</div>
                              <div class="line">If e'er my will did trespass 'gainst his love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Either in discourse of thought or actual deed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or that mine eyes, mine ears, or any sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">Delighted them in any other form;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or that I do not yet, and ever did.</div>
                              <div class="line">And ever will--though he do shake me off</div>
                              <div class="line">To beggarly divorcement--love him dearly,</div>
                              <div class="line">Comfort forswear me! Unkindness may do much;</div>
                              <div class="line">And his unkindness may defeat my life,</div>
                              <div class="line">But never taint my love. I cannot say 'whore:'</div>
                              <div class="line">It does abhor me now I speak the word;</div>
                              <div class="line">To do the act that might the addition earn</div>
                              <div class="line">Not the world's mass of vanity could make me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, be content; 'tis but his humour:</div>
                              <div class="line">The business of the state does him offence,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he does chide with you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">If 'twere no other--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but so, I warrant.</div>
                              <p>Trumpets within</p>
                              <div class="line">Hark, how these instruments summon to supper!</div>
                              <div class="line">The messengers of Venice stay the meat;</div>
                              <div class="line">Go in, and weep not; all things shall be well.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt DESDEMONA and EMILIA</p>
                              <p>Enter RODERIGO</p>
                              <div class="line">How now, Roderigo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not find that thou dealest justly with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What in the contrary?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Every day thou daffest me with some device, Iago;</div>
                              <div class="line">and rather, as it seems to me now, keepest from me</div>
                              <div class="line">all conveniency than suppliest me with the least</div>
                              <div class="line">advantage of hope. I will indeed no longer endure</div>
                              <div class="line">it, nor am I yet persuaded to put up in peace what</div>
                              <div class="line">already I have foolishly suffered.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you hear me, Roderigo?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Faith, I have heard too much, for your words and</div>
                              <div class="line">performances are no kin together.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You charge me most unjustly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">With nought but truth. I have wasted myself out of</div>
                              <div class="line">my means. The jewels you have had from me to</div>
                              <div class="line">deliver to Desdemona would half have corrupted a</div>
                              <div class="line">votarist: you have told me she hath received them</div>
                              <div class="line">and returned me expectations and comforts of sudden</div>
                              <div class="line">respect and acquaintance, but I find none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well; go to; very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well! go to! I cannot go to, man; nor 'tis</div>
                              <div class="line">not very well: nay, I think it is scurvy, and begin</div>
                              <div class="line">to find myself fobbed in it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Very well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell you 'tis not very well. I will make myself</div>
                              <div class="line">known to Desdemona: if she will return me my</div>
                              <div class="line">jewels, I will give over my suit and repent my</div>
                              <div class="line">unlawful solicitation; if not, assure yourself I</div>
                              <div class="line">will seek satisfaction of you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">You have said now.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and said nothing but what I protest intendment of doing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, now I see there's mettle in thee, and even from</div>
                              <div class="line">this instant to build on thee a better opinion than</div>
                              <div class="line">ever before. Give me thy hand, Roderigo: thou hast</div>
                              <div class="line">taken against me a most just exception; but yet, I</div>
                              <div class="line">protest, I have dealt most directly in thy affair.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">It hath not appeared.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I grant indeed it hath not appeared, and your</div>
                              <div class="line">suspicion is not without wit and judgment. But,</div>
                              <div class="line">Roderigo, if thou hast that in thee indeed, which I</div>
                              <div class="line">have greater reason to believe now than ever, I mean</div>
                              <div class="line">purpose, courage and valour, this night show it: if</div>
                              <div class="line">thou the next night following enjoy not Desdemona,</div>
                              <div class="line">take me from this world with treachery and devise</div>
                              <div class="line">engines for my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, what is it? is it within reason and compass?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, there is especial commission come from Venice</div>
                              <div class="line">to depute Cassio in Othello's place.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is that true? why, then Othello and Desdemona</div>
                              <div class="line">return again to Venice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, no; he goes into Mauritania and takes away with</div>
                              <div class="line">him the fair Desdemona, unless his abode be</div>
                              <div class="line">lingered here by some accident: wherein none can be</div>
                              <div class="line">so determinate as the removing of Cassio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you mean, removing of him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, by making him uncapable of Othello's place;</div>
                              <div class="line">knocking out his brains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And that you would have me to do?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, if you dare do yourself a profit and a right.</div>
                              <div class="line">He sups to-night with a harlotry, and thither will I</div>
                              <div class="line">go to him: he knows not yet of his horrorable</div>
                              <div class="line">fortune. If you will watch his going thence, which</div>
                              <div class="line">I will fashion to fall out between twelve and one,</div>
                              <div class="line">you may take him at your pleasure: I will be near</div>
                              <div class="line">to second your attempt, and he shall fall between</div>
                              <div class="line">us. Come, stand not amazed at it, but go along with</div>
                              <div class="line">me; I will show you such a necessity in his death</div>
                              <div class="line">that you shall think yourself bound to put it on</div>
                              <div class="line">him. It is now high suppertime, and the night grows</div>
                              <div class="line">to waste: about it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I will hear further reason for this.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">And you shall be satisfied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  Another room In the castle.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO, LODOVICO, DESDEMONA, EMILIA and
Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">I do beseech you, sir, trouble yourself no further.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, pardon me: 'twill do me good to walk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, good night; I humbly thank your ladyship.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Your honour is most welcome.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you walk, sir?</div>
                              <div class="line">O,--Desdemona,--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Get you to bed on the instant; I will be returned</div>
                              <div class="line">forthwith: dismiss your attendant there: look it be done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt OTHELLO, LODOVICO, and Attendants</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">How goes it now? he looks gentler than he did.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">He says he will return incontinent:</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath commanded me to go to bed,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bade me to dismiss you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Dismiss me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">It was his bidding: therefore, good Emilia,.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me my nightly wearing, and adieu:</div>
                              <div class="line">We must not now displease him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I would you had never seen him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">So would not I my love doth so approve him,</div>
                              <div class="line">That even his stubbornness, his cheques, his frowns--</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, unpin me,--have grace and favour in them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have laid those sheets you bade me on the bed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">All's one. Good faith, how foolish are our minds!</div>
                              <div class="line">If I do die before thee prithee, shroud me</div>
                              <div class="line">In one of those same sheets.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come you talk.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">My mother had a maid call'd Barbara:</div>
                              <div class="line">She was in love, and he she loved proved mad</div>
                              <div class="line">And did forsake her: she had a song of 'willow;'</div>
                              <div class="line">An old thing 'twas, but it express'd her fortune,</div>
                              <div class="line">And she died singing it: that song to-night</div>
                              <div class="line">Will not go from my mind; I have much to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">But to go hang my head all at one side,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sing it like poor Barbara. Prithee, dispatch.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall I go fetch your night-gown?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, unpin me here.</div>
                              <div class="line">This Lodovico is a proper man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">A very handsome man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">He speaks well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know a lady in Venice would have walked barefoot</div>
                              <div class="line">to Palestine for a touch of his nether lip.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Singing</span>  The poor soul sat sighing by a sycamore tree,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing all a green willow:</div>
                              <div class="line">Her hand on her bosom, her head on her knee,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow:</div>
                              <div class="line">The fresh streams ran by her, and murmur'd her moans;</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow;</div>
                              <div class="line">Her salt tears fell from her, and soften'd the stones;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay by these:--</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow;</div>
                              <div class="line">Prithee, hie thee; he'll come anon:--</div>
                              <p>Singing</p>
                              <div class="line">Sing all a green willow must be my garland.</div>
                              <div class="line">Let nobody blame him; his scorn I approve,-</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, that's not next.--Hark! who is't that knocks?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">It's the wind.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Singing</span>  I call'd my love false love; but what</div>
                              <div class="line">said he then?</div>
                              <div class="line">Sing willow, willow, willow:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I court moe women, you'll couch with moe men!</div>
                              <div class="line">So, get thee gone; good night Ate eyes do itch;</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth that bode weeping?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis neither here nor there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have heard it said so. O, these men, these men!</div>
                              <div class="line">Dost thou in conscience think,--tell me, Emilia,--</div>
                              <div class="line">That there be women do abuse their husbands</div>
                              <div class="line">In such gross kind?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">There be some such, no question.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, would not you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by this heavenly light!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor I neither by this heavenly light;</div>
                              <div class="line">I might do't as well i' the dark.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Wouldst thou do such a deed for all the world?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">The world's a huge thing: it is a great price.</div>
                              <div class="line">For a small vice.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">In troth, I think thou wouldst not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">In troth, I think I should; and undo't when I had</div>
                              <div class="line">done. Marry, I would not do such a thing for a</div>
                              <div class="line">joint-ring, nor for measures of lawn, nor for</div>
                              <div class="line">gowns, petticoats, nor caps, nor any petty</div>
                              <div class="line">exhibition; but for the whole world,--why, who would</div>
                              <div class="line">not make her husband a cuckold to make him a</div>
                              <div class="line">monarch? I should venture purgatory for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Beshrew me, if I would do such a wrong</div>
                              <div class="line">For the whole world.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
