                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why the wrong is but a wrong i' the world: and</div>
                              <div class="line">having the world for your labour, tis a wrong in your</div>
                              <div class="line">own world, and you might quickly make it right.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I do not think there is any such woman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, a dozen; and as many to the vantage as would</div>
                              <div class="line">store the world they played for.</div>
                              <div class="line">But I do think it is their husbands' faults</div>
                              <div class="line">If wives do fall: say that they slack their duties,</div>
                              <div class="line">And pour our treasures into foreign laps,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else break out in peevish jealousies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Throwing restraint upon us; or say they strike us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or scant our former having in despite;</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, we have galls, and though we have some grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet have we some revenge. Let husbands know</div>
                              <div class="line">Their wives have sense like them: they see and smell</div>
                              <div class="line">And have their palates both for sweet and sour,</div>
                              <div class="line">As husbands have. What is it that they do</div>
                              <div class="line">When they change us for others? Is it sport?</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it is: and doth affection breed it?</div>
                              <div class="line">I think it doth: is't frailty that thus errs?</div>
                              <div class="line">It is so too: and have not we affections,</div>
                              <div class="line">Desires for sport, and frailty, as men have?</div>
                              <div class="line">Then let them use us well: else let them know,</div>
                              <div class="line">The ills we do, their ills instruct us so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good night, good night: heaven me such uses send,</div>
                              <div class="line">Not to pick bad from bad, but by bad mend!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.7">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 5. ACT V</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.2">1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. A street.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.7.3">2. SCENE II.  A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Cyprus. A street.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter IAGO and RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, stand behind this bulk; straight will he come:</div>
                              <div class="line">Wear thy good rapier bare, and put it home:</div>
                              <div class="line">Quick, quick; fear nothing; I'll be at thy elbow:</div>
                              <div class="line">It makes us, or it mars us; think on that,</div>
                              <div class="line">And fix most firm thy resolution.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be near at hand; I may miscarry in't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, at thy hand: be bold, and take thy stand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Retires</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have no great devotion to the deed;</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet he hath given me satisfying reasons:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis but a man gone. Forth, my sword: he dies.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I have rubb'd this young quat almost to the sense,</div>
                              <div class="line">And he grows angry. Now, whether he kill Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or Cassio him, or each do kill the other,</div>
                              <div class="line">Every way makes my gain: live Roderigo,</div>
                              <div class="line">He calls me to a restitution large</div>
                              <div class="line">Of gold and jewels that I bobb'd from him,</div>
                              <div class="line">As gifts to Desdemona;</div>
                              <div class="line">It must not be: if Cassio do remain,</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath a daily beauty in his life</div>
                              <div class="line">That makes me ugly; and, besides, the Moor</div>
                              <div class="line">May unfold me to him; there stand I in much peril:</div>
                              <div class="line">No, he must die. But so: I hear him coming.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter CASSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I know his gait, 'tis he.--Villain, thou diest!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Makes a pass at CASSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That thrust had been mine enemy indeed,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that my coat is better than thou know'st</div>
                              <div class="line">I will make proof of thine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Draws, and wounds RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I am slain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>IAGO from behind wounds CASSIO in the leg, and exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am maim'd for ever. Help, ho! murder! murder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Falls</p>
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">The voice of Cassio: Iago keeps his word.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, villain that I am!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is even so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, help, ho! light! a surgeon!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis he:--O brave Iago, honest and just,</div>
                              <div class="line">That hast such noble sense of thy friend's wrong!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou teachest me. Minion, your dear lies dead,</div>
                              <div class="line">And your unblest fate hies: strumpet, I come.</div>
                              <div class="line">Forth of my heart those charms, thine eyes, are blotted;</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy bed, lust-stain'd, shall with lust's blood be spotted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <p>Enter LODOVICO and GRATIANO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, ho! no watch? no passage? murder! murder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis some mischance; the cry is very direful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, help!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O wretched villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Two or three groan: it is a heavy night:</div>
                              <div class="line">These may be counterfeits: let's think't unsafe</div>
                              <div class="line">To come in to the cry without more help.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nobody come? then shall I bleed to death.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter IAGO, with a light</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's one comes in his shirt, with light and weapons.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there? whose noise is this that ones on murder?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">We do not know.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did not you hear a cry?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, here! for heaven's sake, help me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is Othello's ancient, as I take it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">The same indeed; a very valiant fellow.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">What are you here that cry so grievously?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Iago? O, I am spoil'd, undone by villains!</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me some help.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O me, lieutenant! what villains have done this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think that one of them is hereabout,</div>
                              <div class="line">And cannot make away.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O treacherous villains!</div>
                              <div class="line">What are you there? come in, and give some help.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>To LODOVICO and GRATIANO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, help me here!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's one of them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O murderous slave! O villain!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Stabs RODERIGO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">RODERIGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O damn'd Iago! O inhuman dog!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Kill men i' the dark!--Where be these bloody thieves?--</div>
                              <div class="line">How silent is this town!--Ho! murder! murder!--</div>
                              <div class="line">What may you be? are you of good or evil?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">As you shall prove us, praise us.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Lodovico?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LODOVICO</div>
                              <div class="line">He, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I cry you mercy. Here's Cassio hurt by villains.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How is't, brother!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My leg is cut in two.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, heaven forbid!</div>
                              <div class="line">Light, gentlemen; I'll bind it with my shirt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BIANCA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter, ho? who is't that cried?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who is't that cried!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">O my dear Cassio! my sweet Cassio! O Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio, Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O notable strumpet! Cassio, may you suspect</div>
                              <div class="line">Who they should be that have thus many led you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am to find you thus: I have been to seek you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Lend me a garter. So. O, for a chair,</div>
                              <div class="line">To bear him easily hence!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, he faints! O Cassio, Cassio, Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Gentlemen all, I do suspect this trash</div>
                              <div class="line">To be a party in this injury.</div>
                              <div class="line">Patience awhile, good Cassio. Come, come;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lend me a light. Know we this face or no?</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas my friend and my dear countryman</div>
                              <div class="line">Roderigo! no:--yes, sure: O heaven! Roderigo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, of Venice?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Even he, sir; did you know him?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Know him! ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Gratiano? I cry you gentle pardon;</div>
                              <div class="line">These bloody accidents must excuse my manners,</div>
                              <div class="line">That so neglected you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am glad to see you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">How do you, Cassio? O, a chair, a chair!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Roderigo!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">He, he 'tis he.</div>
                              <p>A chair brought in</p>
                              <div class="line">O, that's well said; the chair!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">Some good man bear him carefully from hence;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll fetch the general's surgeon.</div>
                              <p>To BIANCA</p>
                              <div class="line">For you, mistress,</div>
                              <div class="line">Save you your labour. He that lies slain</div>
                              <div class="line">here, Cassio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Was my dear friend: what malice was between you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CASSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">None in the world; nor do I know the man.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>To BIANCA</span>  What, look you pale? O, bear him out</div>
                              <div class="line">o' the air.</div>
                              <p>CASSIO and RODERIGO are borne off</p>
                              <div class="line">Stay you, good gentlemen. Look you pale, mistress?</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you perceive the gastness of her eye?</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, if you stare, we shall hear more anon.</div>
                              <div class="line">Behold her well; I pray you, look upon her:</div>
                              <div class="line">Do you see, gentlemen? nay, guiltiness will speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though tongues were out of use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter EMILIA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Las, what's the matter? what's the matter, husband?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio hath here been set on in the dark</div>
                              <div class="line">By Roderigo and fellows that are scaped:</div>
                              <div class="line">He's almost slain, and Roderigo dead.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, good gentleman! alas, good Cassio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">This is the fruit of whoring. Prithee, Emilia,</div>
                              <div class="line">Go know of Cassio where he supp'd to-night.</div>
                              <p>To BIANCA</p>
                              <div class="line">What, do you shake at that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">He supp'd at my house; but I therefore shake not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, did he so? I charge you, go with me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie, fie upon thee, strumpet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no strumpet; but of life as honest</div>
                              <div class="line">As you that thus abuse me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">As I! foh! fie upon thee!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">Kind gentlemen, let's go see poor Cassio dress'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, mistress, you must tell's another tale.</div>
                              <div class="line">Emilia run you to the citadel,</div>
                              <div class="line">And tell my lord and lady what hath happ'd.</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you go on? I pray.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">This is the night</div>
                              <div class="line">That either makes me or fordoes me quite.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  A bedchamber in the castle: DESDEMONA in bed asleep; a light burning.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter OTHELLO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the cause, it is the cause, my soul,--</div>
                              <div class="line">Let me not name it to you, you chaste stars!--</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the cause. Yet I'll not shed her blood;</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor scar that whiter skin of hers than snow,</div>
                              <div class="line">And smooth as monumental alabaster.</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet she must die, else she'll betray more men.</div>
                              <div class="line">Put out the light, and then put out the light:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I quench thee, thou flaming minister,</div>
                              <div class="line">I can again thy former light restore,</div>
                              <div class="line">Should I repent me: but once put out thy light,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou cunning'st pattern of excelling nature,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not where is that Promethean heat</div>
                              <div class="line">That can thy light relume. When I have pluck'd the rose,</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot give it vital growth again.</div>
                              <div class="line">It must needs wither: I'll smell it on the tree.</div>
                              <p>Kissing her</p>
                              <div class="line">Ah balmy breath, that dost almost persuade</div>
                              <div class="line">Justice to break her sword! One more, one more.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be thus when thou art dead, and I will kill thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">And love thee after. One more, and this the last:</div>
                              <div class="line">So sweet was ne'er so fatal. I must weep,</div>
                              <div class="line">But they are cruel tears: this sorrow's heavenly;</div>
                              <div class="line">It strikes where it doth love. She wakes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there? Othello?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay. Desdemona.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Will you come to bed, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you pray'd to-night, Desdemona?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">If you bethink yourself of any crime</div>
                              <div class="line">Unreconciled as yet to heaven and grace,</div>
                              <div class="line">Solicit for it straight.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, my lord, what do you mean by that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, do it, and be brief; I will walk by:</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not kill thy unprepared spirit;</div>
                              <div class="line">No; heaven forfend! I would not kill thy soul.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Talk you of killing?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, I do.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">Have mercy on me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, with all my heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">If you say so, I hope you will not kill me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hum!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet I fear you; for you are fatal then</div>
                              <div class="line">When your eyes roll so: why I should fear I know not,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since guiltiness I know not; but yet I feel I fear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Think on thy sins.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">They are loves I bear to you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and for that thou diest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">That death's unnatural that kills for loving.</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, why gnaw you so your nether lip?</div>
                              <div class="line">Some bloody passion shakes your very frame:</div>
                              <div class="line">These are portents; but yet I hope, I hope,</div>
                              <div class="line">They do not point on me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, and be still!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">I will so. What's the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That handkerchief which I so loved and gave thee</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou gavest to Cassio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, by my life and soul!</div>
                              <div class="line">Send for the man, and ask him.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet soul, take heed,</div>
                              <div class="line">Take heed of perjury; thou art on thy deathbed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but not yet to die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes, presently:</div>
                              <div class="line">Therefore confess thee freely of thy sin;</div>
                              <div class="line">For to deny each article with oath</div>
                              <div class="line">Cannot remove nor choke the strong conception</div>
                              <div class="line">That I do groan withal. Thou art to die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then Lord have mercy on me!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I say, amen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">And have you mercy too! I never did</div>
                              <div class="line">Offend you in my life; never loved Cassio</div>
                              <div class="line">But with such general warranty of heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">As I might love: I never gave him token.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">By heaven, I saw my handkerchief in's hand.</div>
                              <div class="line">O perjured woman! thou dost stone my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">And makest me call what I intend to do</div>
                              <div class="line">A murder, which I thought a sacrifice:</div>
                              <div class="line">I saw the handkerchief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">He found it then;</div>
                              <div class="line">I never gave it him: send for him hither;</div>
                              <div class="line">Let him confess a truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">He hath confess'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, my lord?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That he hath used thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">How? unlawfully?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">He will not say so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, his mouth is stopp'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">Honest Iago hath ta'en order for't.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O! my fear interprets: what, is he dead?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Had all his hairs been lives, my great revenge</div>
                              <div class="line">Had stomach for them all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas! he is betray'd and I undone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, strumpet! weep'st thou for him to my face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, banish me, my lord, but kill me not!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Down, strumpet!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Kill me to-morrow: let me live to-night!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, if you strive--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">But half an hour!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Being done, there is no pause.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">But while I say one prayer!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is too late.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>He stifles her</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  My lord, my lord! what, ho! my lord, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What noise is this? Not dead? not yet quite dead?</div>
                              <div class="line">I that am cruel am yet merciful;</div>
                              <div class="line">I would not have thee linger in thy pain: So, so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  What, ho! my lord, my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who's there?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  O, good my lord, I would speak a word with you!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes: 'tis Emilia. By and by. She's dead.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis like she comes to speak of Cassio's death.--</div>
                              <div class="line">The noise was here. Ha! no more moving?</div>
                              <div class="line">Still as the grave. Shall she come in? were't good?--</div>
                              <div class="line">I think she stirs again:--no. What's best to do?</div>
                              <div class="line">If she come in, she'll sure speak to my wife:</div>
                              <div class="line">My wife! my wife! what wife? I have no wife.</div>
                              <div class="line">O insupportable! O heavy hour!</div>
                              <div class="line">Methinks it should be now a huge eclipse</div>
                              <div class="line">Of sun and moon, and that the affrighted globe</div>
                              <div class="line">Should yawn at alteration.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Within</span>  I do beseech you</div>
                              <div class="line">That I may speak with you, O, good my lord!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I had forgot thee: O, come in, Emilia;</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft; by and by. Let me the curtains draw.</div>
                              <div class="line">Where art thou?</div>
                              <p>Unlocks the door</p>
                              <p>Enter EMILIA</p>
                              <div class="line">What's the matter with thee now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, my good lord, yonder's foul murders done!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, now?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">But now, my lord.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is the very error of the moon;</div>
                              <div class="line">She comes more nearer earth than she was wont,</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes men mad.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio, my lord, hath kill'd a young Venetian</div>
                              <div class="line">Call'd Roderigo.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Roderigo kill'd!</div>
                              <div class="line">And Cassio kill'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">No, Cassio is not kill'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Not Cassio kill'd! then murder's out of tune,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sweet revenge grows harsh.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, falsely, falsely murder'd!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, what cry is that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">That! what?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Out, and alas! that was my lady's voice.</div>
                              <div class="line">Help! help, ho! help! O lady, speak again!</div>
                              <div class="line">Sweet Desdemona! O sweet mistress, speak!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">A guiltless death I die.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, who hath done this deed?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">DESDEMONA</div>
                              <div class="line">Nobody; I myself. Farewell</div>
                              <div class="line">Commend me to my kind lord: O, farewell!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Dies</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how should she be murder'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas, who knows?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">You heard her say herself, it was not I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">She said so: I must needs report the truth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">She's, like a liar, gone to burning hell:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas I that kill'd her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, the more angel she,</div>
                              <div class="line">And you the blacker devil!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">She turn'd to folly, and she was a whore.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou dost belie her, and thou art a devil.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">She was false as water.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou art rash as fire, to say</div>
                              <div class="line">That she was false: O, she was heavenly true!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Cassio did top her; ask thy husband else.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, I were damn'd beneath all depth in hell,</div>
                              <div class="line">But that I did proceed upon just grounds</div>
                              <div class="line">To this extremity. Thy husband knew it all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">That she was false to wedlock?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, with Cassio. Nay, had she been true,</div>
                              <div class="line">If heaven would make me such another world</div>
                              <div class="line">Of one entire and Perfect chrysolite,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'ld not have sold her for it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, 'twas he that told me first:</div>
                              <div class="line">An honest man he is, and hates the slime</div>
                              <div class="line">That sticks on filthy deeds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">What needs this iteration, woman? I say thy husband.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O mistress, villany hath made mocks with love,</div>
                              <div class="line">My husband say that she was false!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">He, woman;</div>
                              <div class="line">I say thy husband: dost understand the word?</div>
                              <div class="line">My friend, thy husband, honest, honest Iago.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">If he say so, may his pernicious soul</div>
                              <div class="line">Rot half a grain a day! he lies to the heart:</div>
                              <div class="line">She was too fond of her most filthy bargain.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ha!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Do thy worst:</div>
                              <div class="line">This deed of thine is no more worthy heaven</div>
                              <div class="line">Than thou wast worthy her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">OTHELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Peace, you were best.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast not half that power to do me harm</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have to be hurt. O gull! O dolt!</div>
                              <div class="line">As ignorant as dirt! thou hast done a deed--</div>
                              <div class="line">I care not for thy sword; I'll make thee known,</div>
                              <div class="line">Though I lost twenty lives.--Help! help, ho! help!</div>
                              <div class="line">The Moor hath kill'd my mistress! Murder! murder!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter MONTANO, GRATIANO, IAGO, and others</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">MONTANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter? How now, general!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">O, are you come, Iago? you have done well,</div>
                              <div class="line">That men must lay their murders on your neck.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRATIANO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the matter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
                              <div class="line">Disprove this villain, if thou be'st a man:</div>
                              <div class="line">He says thou told'st him that his wife was false:</div>
                              <div class="line">I know thou didst not, thou'rt not such a villain:</div>
                              <div class="line">Speak, for my heart is full.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">IAGO</div>
                              <div class="line">I told him what I thought, and told no more</div>
                              <div class="line">Than what he found himself was apt and true.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">EMILIA</div>
